Property Title: Private Room with a view in a New Townhouse
Description:
Bright and airy private bedroom for rent in a new townhouse on Middleton Mountain. The room is furnished with a single bed that converts to a king and a small dresser, and can be unfurnished as well. 

The view from the room looks northwest over the city of Vernon and towards Swan Lake. The neighbourhood is quiet, with close access to trails and Kal Lake beach and the rail trail. It’s a 7 minute drive to downtown Vernon and only 4 minutes to the nearest grocery store. Only a 30 minute drive to Silver Star Resort area too. 

The townhouse is spacious and bright with a good sized fully stocked kitchen, and a big deck perfect for lounging.

Property Title: Clean, quiet, safe and good bus route home for a male student in Glenmore-Room B of 2
Description:
It is a single floor independent house with separate entrance in a detached house (3 floors) in the quiet and safe Strata complex of Kelowna, consisting of 2 bedrooms, kitchen, toilet, shower, laundry room and living room.  
It is open to male office workers or students who will live in one of these rooms.
Currently, there is one professional living in the area. The another room has been occupied by UBCO students for 3 years, but we are looking forward to welcoming new residents as he have recently moved abroad as exchange students.
In other words, each room on the first floor is used by each person, and other facilities are shared. 

The living conditions here are as follows: 
Bus: Access to UBCO (6), Downtown (18) and Mall (19) in less than 15 minutes.
Within 10 minutes, you can find Save on, IGA, Shoppers, Timhorton, McNonald's and Korean restaurants.

Description: Your room is on the top floor over-looking the shared veggie garden. You are welcome to have your own garden area. The house is a heritage style, located a few mins. walk to KGH and within walking distance to downtown and Pandosy Village. Very cozy living room, kitchen with lots of cupboard space and all dishes, pots and pans and cutlery.Your room is fully furnished with a pine computer desk, two dressers with lots of storage, a cozy chair and comfy bed. Light blocking new curtains. There is a full laundry and large pantry.  The back garden is peacefully private with a bbq and garden furniture for relaxing. A herb garden and veggies to share. You can store your bicycle and extras in the large garden shed. Linens and towels can be supplied if you wish. I have happily shared my home for several years with wonderful students. There is usually a healthy batch of vegetarian soup made weekly.

Property Title: Great Location! Walk everywhere! ( Female only )
Description:
Great Location! Walk everywhere!
One furnished room is available in this beautiful all Female shared house in Kelowna! We are looking for 1 Female to join our group. 

A 7 minute walk from Okanagan Collage, 3 1/2 blocks from the nearest beach, 2 1/2 blocks from Pandosy Village with lots of shopping, restaurants/pubs and minutes from the hospital & downtown.

 This charming, bright, midsized room that looks west to the back garden is available Now. It is fully furnished and it gets beautiful afternoon & evening sun. This room also has a coffee & toast bar with a small but large capacity fridge. 

 This room is very well suited to female students or Female working professionals, no need for a car! There are bike lanes everywhere here.

2 shared bathrooms, a common TV/living room, kitchen & laundry.
A beautiful yard with a large patio & a peaceful place to sit at the table & benches built around the hazelnut tree, great place for relaxing, studying, or eating on a nice sunny day.

Cablevision & some utilities are included.
This is a Friendly, No Smoking, No vaping, No Drug, shared house looking for 1 clean, no drama, chill & happy Female. Must be clean & not messy.
 ( sorry no pets )
Rooms are single occupancy only.
( more pics by request )

We're looking for a working someone or a student who is responsible, quiet, and non-smoking. It's important to stress that we have a 2 year old who is lovely and sleeps through the night, etc. but he still makes toddler noises. He wakes around 7am and though he won't be knocking on your door, you may hear him playing in the living room or kitchen. 

Available March 15th.

Property Title: Private room in a positive, safe family home in beautiful Steveston, Richmond
Description:
We offer a safe, positive and stable environment for learning and living. The Language spoken is English.

We have one bedroom on the 2nd floor level of our town house, very clean, quiet and private. The pricing includes all meals, utilities, laundry, high speed internet, and outdoor heated swimming pool through the summer. The room features a double bed, bedding, desk, closet, dresser, lamp, 42’ wall mounted Tv, towels & shared bathroom.

We are within walking distance or short bus ride to parks, Steveston village and fisherman’s warf, nature walkway beside the ocean ,library, community & shopping centres, groceries ( including ethnic grocery shops) and excellent restaurants.  There is easy access to the trendy Steveston village area,  Vancouver downtown , shops, theatres, beaches, hiking, swimming etc…
The Canada line skytrain station (which is a quick 15min bus ride to the train) connects you to downtown Vancouver within 23mins, YVR Airport, Shopping malls, Waterfront. The bus is only 2 min walk from our home to go to Canada line. I work for the school board downtown Vancouver for the last 12 years, and take the Canada line train everyday till the end of June when school year ends. 
 
We have hosted international exchange students thru our daughter’s high school, from France, Italy and Qubec in the past. We are a warm and friendly family of 3, with 1 teen boy 17yrs part-time here,  and no pets.  

We are both working professionals who work in the hospitality industry.  We also love to travel and have been to places like Portugal, Croatia, Spain, France, Italy, Across Canada, Mexico, Jamaica, California, and thru United States. 

If you have any more questions for us, we would be happy to answer.

Property Title: Room in Gorgeous Orchard House
Description:
Looking for responsible, clean, trustworthy roommates to share our gorgeous 4 bed 3 bath house in east Kelowna (around the corner from mcollogh stn) 
BUT you need a car. 
10 mins to town. 
Only 1 person /room. No couples. 
Smoking outside, 1 pet welcome. There's a huge yard for dogs. 
We have an indoor cat & a dog, so ONLY someone cat/dog friendly & any animals MUST have compatible temperament. Negotiable. 
Looking for working person or full time student ONLY, with good references, income verified, credit check etc.
Please... 
NO HOMEBOUND, DISABILITY (PWD) WELFARE or RETIRED, just not compatible. 
We're hard working, clean guys. 
Clubhouse/garage with pool table & media center, 2 living rooms (one with theatre), gourmet kitchen, split level. 
Lotsa parking. Available March 15th & April 1st. 
650/mo unfurnished or furnished for 700/mo. Utilities surcharge may apply. 
Text or call Chris 250.863.5997

Property Title: Clean room in Burnaby near SFU
Description:
Fully equipped kitchen available for students (light cooking only)
: Fully furnished room with study desk, full size bed, plus linens. Includes heat, hot water and laundry. We offer a great study environment and a quick bus ride to SFU, FIC, BCIT and VCC universities and colleges and walking distance to high school.

International students are welcome in our Beautiful North Burnaby Home close to Simon Fraser University (SFU), FIC, BCIT and many Metro Vancouver English placement schools including Global Village. It is my pleasure to be your host in Vancouver while you are away from home. I also give you an orientation of Vancouver and the Metro Area transit system to help you adapt to your new home faster.


Our location is the best for any public transit user. Bus Stop steps from our front door!! *Less than 10 minutes by bus to SFU and FIC! We are very centrally located in the heart of Vancouver's Lower Mainland. Only 30 minutes to downtown Vancouver by bus or less to most of Vancouver's top attractions and English placement schools.*Only 5 minutes by bus to Skytrain station. *Only 5 minute walk to shopping center and coffee shops. *Bus Stop outside front door.
Very safe for Girls coming and going to classes on our dark and rainy Vancouver evenings.
*Quiet House to study or relax and no young children running around disturbing your privacy.

We look forward to hearing from you :)
Mari Ann

Property Title: Room #1. Private king bedroom furnished
Description:
Student rental. September 1 - April 30. Rent 1-4 rooms in this lower level walkout 4 bedroom suite fully furnished and equipped, 4 king beds, 2 full bathrooms (2 suite-mates per bathroom), common areas include a full kitchen, dining area, and laundry room. The full kitchen includes a full-size refrigerator freezer, 4 burner electric stove and oven, dishwasher, in-suite washer, and dryer. 4-seat dining room counter height table, small and large appliances, coffee maker, microwave, cookware, dishes, glasses, mugs, and cutlery. There are cleaning supplies and a vacuum provided. Each bedroom has its own sitting area, office desk, chair, king-size pillowtop bed with linens, 2 night stands with lamps. 

This private suite is in a very quiet owner-occupied residential home. The homeowner lives upstairs in another self-contained unit. Perfect for serious and quiet students. No parties, no smoking inside or near open doors or windows, no pets. 

The outside has a private patio balcony with patio furniture, BBQ, and amazing Okanagan Lake & Kelowna City views. Plenty of street parking on a wide no-thru street in a quiet cul-de-sac. All utilities included. Internet shaw 1.5gig Wifi. 

If important please check the Kelowna BC Bus Transit Maps and Schedule.

The rental address is at:
916 Ackerman Court Kelowna BC V1X7L2

A vehicle is recommended however it's just 2 blocks from the public transit bus stop. Approximately 15 minutes drive to anywhere in Kelowna International Airport (YLW), University of British Columbia Okanagan (UBCO), Okanagan College Kelowna Campus, Centre for Arts and Technology Kelowna, Kelowna General Hospital (KGH), Kelowna International Airport YLW. Bring your own group of friends, acquaintances, classmates. Tell us about yourself, when, and what you require in a rental.

Property Title: Oceanfront Retreat
Description:
Cozy quiet home, oceanfront on a beach. Fitness, yoga & meditation household. Near U Vic, groceries, cafes. Enjoy ocean view sunrises & sunsets view Mt Baker & San Juan Islands from the kitchen/breakfast nook , living room/dining room. Wrap up in front of the wood burning fireplace or take in the view on the large deck. View bald eagles, seals, sea lions, otters, water birds, whales (sometimes). A pet (to joins ours) is welcome in your application. The house sits on a lot that is just over an acre, two sides are oceanfront. A grassy yard meets low bank drift wood on a rocky
beach. Suitable for kayaking, SUP or (chilly) ocean dips. Around the corner is a small sandy beach at Telegraph Cove, access to Gyro Beach in Cadboro Bay is a 12 minute walk. as well as the nearest bus stop. 20 minute walk to Pepper's
Grocery market, pub, sushi, 2 cafes and a Thai restaurant. 15-25 minute drive to anywhere downtown Victoria. Your unfurnished or furnished room has hardwood flooring, high ceiling, closet. Furnished common areas as shown. Parking and laundry on site.

Property Title: Beautiful and Clean Downtown Condo w Waterfront View - Solarium
Description:
Hi! I have an amazing furnished solarium for rent in my condo. The place is fully furnished, including a brand new bed in your room. You have a beautiful view of False Creek right from your bed, with two windows that open. Less than 30 second walk away from Stadium Chinatown Skytrain!

The suite includes a washer and dryer in unit, high ceilings, dishwasher, fully stocked kitchen, shower and bath tub, balcony, and a gorgeous view of False Creek. The rent includes furnishings, utilities, household items (fully stocked kitchen, bathroom, and cleaning supplies), in-suite washer and dryer, and Wi-Fi.

The building is very secure and has a 24/7 concierge. 

Underground secured parking available at an additional cost.


* Balcony
* Amazing False Creek and City views from 15th floor!
* Right above a Costco Wholesale, groceries are only a few steps away
* Unbeatable location, by Stadium-Chinatown SkyTrain Station, unlimited shopping and restaurants, heart of Downtown Vancouver, only a few blocks from Pacific Centre Shopping Mall, Hudson’s Bay, and Nordstrom
* Hardwood Floors in entry, living room, dining room, and kitchen
* Kitchen has laminated countertops 
* Modern white cabinetry with brushed chrome hardware
* Euro-style single lever chrome faucets and stainless steel sink with garburator
* In-suite Laundry
* Parking & Amenities
* Bike room
* Sorry, No Pets

About me: I am a mid-20's female in a graduate program in the healthcare field. The condo will be shared with me and another female roommate.

Property Title: Beautiful Mountain View Room in Lovely Family Home
Description:
COVID- 19 Provincial Health precautions must be followed and respected to protect you and our family
We have a bright and beautiful furnished bedroom for rent in our fully appointed family home.  The room has a lovely view of the mountains from the upper floor, a shared space, in our three-bathroom home. 

Ideally, we are looking for a student . We are a  family with two children (10 and 12) looking for a quiet, clean, respectful, and friendly person who loves kids, is okay with cats and is comfortable in a family setting.  Available July 1st. This is an ideal short-term rental and for a student.

If this looks like a good fit for you, please contact us to coordinate a meeting (Skype or FaceTime will work if you are far away) to see if this is a good fit for you and for our family.

No smoking! Sorry, we can’t accommodate any other pets. Our family speaks French at home but we also speak English. Wi-Fi included, food not included, but we have a dedicated fridge.

*MUST be Prepared to meet all the COVID-19 requirements and be responsible for respecting a new social circle.


Belle chambre - étudiant - Vue sur la montagne!

Court terme - Juillet Nous avons une belle et lumineuse chambre meublée à louer dans notre maison de famille entièrement aménagée. La chambre a une vue magnifique sur les montagnes depuis l'étage supérieur, un espace partagé, dans notre maison de trois salles de bain.

Idéalement, nous recherchons un/e jeune étudiante. Nous sommes une jeune famille avec deux enfants (10 et 12 ans) à la recherche d'une personne calme, propre, respectueuse et sympathique qui aime les enfants, qui est comfortable avec les chats et qui est à l'aise dans un cadre familial. Disponible du 1er juillet à l'automne. Il s’agit d’une location à court terme idéale. 

Si cela vous convient, veuillez nous contacter pour coordonner une réunion (Skype ou FaceTime fonctionneront si vous êtes loin) pour savoir si cela vous convient, à vous et à notre famille.

Non Fumeur Seulement! Désolé, nous ne pouvons accueillir aucun autre animal de compagnie. Notre famille parle français à la maison mais nous parlons aussi anglais. Wi-Fi inclus, nourriture non incluse, mais nous avons un réfrigérateur dédié.

Property Title: One furnished bedroom available in 2 bedroom Apt Close to Cook Street Village
Description:
909 Prendergast Apartment (Across from Beacon Hill Park)

Apartment Info

I have one room available in my 2-bedroom apartment. I will be occupying the other room.  2 bathrooms. One half bathroom in one bedroom and one full bathroom with bathtub. The apartment is across the street from beautiful Beacon Hill Park, 3 blocks from Dallas Road and the beach, and one block from vibrant Cook Street Village. James bay is only 3 blocks away. All amenities are within close proximity. The apartment is fully furnished as well as a fully furnished bedroom suite. 

It is a second floor apartment with elevator and with excellent light and sun during the day with a big patio for plants and gardening. Patio looks onto the park. 

Laundry is shared and one floor below apartment at a cost. 

Rent: 1000$ (Includes all bills, internet, cable, water and heat)

Parking: Covered Parking 30$ a month. No covered is 20$ a month. Street Parking for free. 

Bike: Bike room is available. (not the best room) deck can also have bikes. 

No BBQ’s

No Smoking allowed on site. I am 420 friendly but not in the house. 

No Pets Allowed

About Me: 

I am 41-year-old male who teaches in Victoria School District 61. I have been teaching overseas for the past 20 years and have returned to Victoria last year. I am very easy going, respectful of peoples’ space and privacy.  I drink socially, love the outdoors and live a very active lifestyle biking, swimming and hiking. I enjoy having friends over for dinner, sing-alongs or yoga. I am not OCD but I do like to keep a tidy and clean place with no dishes left overnight from dinner. Respecting that the apartment is a common area is important. 

About You: 

I do not discriminate against gender, sexually orientation, age or ethnicity. I would prefer a mature and financially secure person who plans on being in Victoria for a longer period of time.  Helping to foster a positive living environment with common meals when possible, being mindful of the space, discussions and other things would be ideal but not fully essential. 


If you think you might be a good fit then let get together for a talk. My cell is 236-882-2460.

**WELCOME**______________________________________________________
I'd like to introduce you to this beautiful 4 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom bi-level
home in the center of Brentwood. A couple of rooms are available for rent.

What's the house like:
This house has a bright kitchen with a dishwasher, microwave, oven, and stove. You can use all the utilities, plates, cups, forks, etc. that we have. You will have your own separate, private cupboard where you can keep your food. There are 2 fridges. The living rooms have a TV, computer area, reading area. You can use a computer in the living room, and you can also use the computer and TV set that you have in your room. We also have a nice patio with a BBQ. Multiple fridges, washers & dryers.

Who lives here:
There are 2 levels. There is a nice kitchen and a good living room area too. On the upper level, one room is rented out to a responsible guy working full time, 2 jobs. You will be sharing a bathroom with only one (1) more roommate (the other one has his/her own private en-suite) -please note - it depends on the room. Your bathroom has a bathtub and excellent shower pressure. Our roommates are all very mature, genuinely good guys in their late 20s-late 30s.

What's your room like:
Your room has a nice, roomy open-style closet where you can keep your clothes. You will have a modern double-king/single sized bed with a good mattress. Your room will have a computer that you can use and a very large HD TV screen. The owner of the house is a computer technician/analyst, and all of the computers run extremely fast. A networked all in one printer is available to use as well.


View More Pictures here:  http://www.picturetrail.com/gid24423542

Quiet/Study time/Friends:
You will definitely have enough quiet time/private time for yourself because our roommates study/work a lot, and sometimes you will be all alone in the house. We do not allow any drinking parties in this house. Quiet wine parties/dinners are fine as long as you are respectful towards other tenants.This is a house for professionals/serious students.

 

Parking:
We have a designated parking area. Additionally, plenty of parking on the street.

Location: This location is very safe. It is safe to walk at night. The house is set between 2 parks - Brenner Park and Nose Hill Park.

What's close to us:
Dalhousie Station is the closest(about a 25min walk. This place is ideal
for students and professionals. Relatively close to University of Calgary, SAIT and Foothills Hospital.

Around us:
Safeway, Co-Op, 2 malls - Northland Mall, Market Mall, Canadian Tire, Walmart, Nose Hill Park, Brenner Park.

BY CAR:
-Dalhousie station is literally 4 minutes away (timed with an iPhone timer)
-Brentwood station is 5 minutes away
-Northland Mall is 2 minutes away (the house is very close to it)
-John Laurie Blvd/Nosehill Park is 1 min away.

BY BUS:
-the closest bus stop is the one next to Northland mall. It would take you about 10-13 min walk to get there.

Walking:
-Dalhousie station - would be approximately 25 min walk and probably about 8-minute bike ride
-Northland mall is 13 minutes away

We are currently looking for a responsible, tidy roommate (male/female) to share this beautiful home with.

Some basic rules:
-Month to Month (the first month is to see if you like living there/fit into the house structure)
-One month's down payment required
-ideally no smoking, absolutely no smoking indoors, no pets (big or small sorry); no recreational drugs.
-international students are VERY welcome!!
-male or female
-no drama
-respect, love, and consideration for others
-positive attitude 

Requirements:
-You are a mature, responsible professional/student/self-employed who is respectful, tidy and cleans up after herself/himself. You don't play loud TV/music/games in the middle of the night and you are considerate towards other tenants.
- You follow house rules and show respect for the house and our roommates.
-You will treat this place like your home - don't leave the lights on, don't leave the water running, put your dishes in the dishwasher, recycle, etc.
-Month to Month only; we have strict rules that you have to follow; once the rule is broken twice, we will have the right to move you out. Please take it seriously. Home security and respect for other roommates is a priority for us.
-My past roommates have been living at this house for over 3 years each. Why?

Because of these things: excellent location, beautiful home with all the amenities, and the fact that I truly care about your living experience at this house. I will do my best to help you out within reasonable means.

If you are interested in our home or if you have any questions, please give me a call, send me a text or write me a quick email. We will then invite you to visit our home at your earliest convenience. Please do apply, and I will ask you to tell me a little bit more about yourself, to read over my contract and fill out a basic questionnaire. A good fit is a priority for us. To show us that you've read this message in full, please mention the words "detached brenner house" in your response. I do not want to waste anyone's time, and I wanted to be as honest as possible when writing this listing. We are looking for great people to share this house with!

Property Title: BR FOR RENT ON ACREAGE 5MIN DRIVE TO CALGARY NE. ALL INCLUSIVE!
Description:
Hello. Thanks for visiting my posting.


HOUSE AREA AND LOCATION

This large house (~2700 sq ft) sits on a huge acreage (20 acre), from which 4 acre belong to this property. It is a bi-level located 5 minute further east than Stoney Trail NE @ Country Hills Blvd NE intersection, close to Skyview and Cornerstone communities. The bedroom available for rent is located in the upper lever but there will be more rooms available downstairs soon. Please note that there is No Public Transit coming to the property. Some pics were taken in the summer; some other in the wintertime.


INSIDE THE HOUSE

There are 2 washrooms and 2 kitchens in the house: 1 washroom and 1 kitchen per level. There is a nice deck and sunroom. I believe it is easier for male individuals to share this house, as females may find it difficult to meet their privacy needs (there is 2 washrooms only, and willing to be 6 persons at the house once basement is repaired). Parking is immense on the acreage but we have parking rules so that the house looks spacious and beautiful. You may set up a shelter for your vehicle after we agree upon a convenient spot.


SOME RULES

This is a non-smoking house. No RVs allowed. We don't allow overnight visits. No pets allowed. Shared areas are to be kept clean (without OCD). One person per room only: sorry, no couples.


INSIDE THE BEDROOM AND UTILITIES

There is a flat screen TV in each bedroom with Chrome Cast. It can be furnished or you can bring your own furnitures; either works. All utilities included and very fast internet, too. You won't pay extra for water, heating, electricity, gas, garbage service, or internet... Except if you use more utilities than a normal person, or dispose more garbage than our average [we have our monthly records so we know our use].


PERSONS AT THE HOUSE

The basement is under repair but once finished, we will be 6 persons at the house, including my wife and myself. Only working people are allowed. Quiet hours between 11pm and 7am. My wife and I (28yo) sell furniture and are in and out all day almost every day. I spend around 8 days in Edmonton per month. The house feels spacious, as most people go to work or have fun outdoors.


OUR ROOMMATE MUST:

*Rent a room by him or herself (no couples)

*Be flexible

*Be adaptable

*Like it tidy and clean without having OCD

*Have a normal amount of stuff (no hoarders)

*Be able to communicate in fluent English, Spanish, Czech, Polish, or French

*Be experienced sharing a house with other people

*Be ok with sharing meals and drinks occasionally

*Appreciate and promote other persons' privacy

*Be young-spirited, regardless of age.

*Have a very good attitude towards life and bring good vibe to the house

*Have a car and a valid driver's license

*Respect for social rules

*Be a follower of society as is [no independent/alternative thinkers allowed]

*Have a good credit score, which demonstrates you like to follow social rules the same way we do.


FINANCIAL INFO

Security deposit is only half a month's rent. We can only offer month to month rental; it is an ideal setting to see if things work out or not, without a strict commitment. Simply contact me for further info!

Bedroom
Big bedroom has a queen bed with metal frame. Large closet with organizer provides great storage. This room also has lots of natural light and neutral colours.

Bathroom 
From your room you direct access to this full bath. Tiled shower and deep soaker tub combo, toilet, and cherry vanity glittering granite counters. 

Laundry included. High efficiency washer and dryer.

Utilities include: Digital Cable (with PVR), High Speed Internet (wifi), Electricity, & Gas.  Central A/C in summer.
Tile and hardwood throughout the main floor, ultra high end finishes, beautiful lake views and location on quiet cul de sac, and has utilities included for an unbelievable price.

A very unique opportunity to live in luxury in a million-dollar neighborhood! Don’t let this one pass you by it will not last long! Available NOW. North East Edmonton in Fraser right off the Henday. 5 minute drive to the LRT, 10 minutes to Sherwood Park or Capilano. New neighborhood without the south side traffic! Easy commuting. All adult roommates.

Kitchen
Featuring cherry cabinets, glittering granite counter-tops, gas stove, so much space and storage with lots of pot drawers, full pantry cupboard, beautiful big double sink and detachable faucet, glass front frosted upper cabinets, eat in table and chairs.  Full set of professional cookware for your shared use! Utensils, dishes, many small appliances, and bake ware also included.

Outdoor Space
Huge balcony off the eat in kitchen with gas BBQ and outdoor seating overlooking beautiful man-made pond. Perfect for soaking in some sun and/or entertaining in summer.

Living Room
Huge windows built ins with gas fireplace. Great space for relaxing.

Dining Room
Seating for 12 in this open dining room with beautiful cherry wood table and chairs.

Sitting Room
At the front of this house 20 ft ceilings and grand foyer bring in light and provide space that is breath taking. Its light-colored leather couches and custom chairs for lounging allows for flawless social gatherings and quiet lounging.

Lots of community amenities and access to the ravine and river valley trail systems steps away. You would really need to see it to appreciate all the details and real feel of this wonderful home!

I have 3 medium dogs, so must be a dog lover. Will not accept any other pets sorry.  1 months rent damage deposit required. Max 4 adults in the home (including you).  No couples no children.

Room Available Immediately

Thank you for considering renting from us. Good luck in your search and we hope to hear from you!

The rent is $750 per month and it includes all the bills and Wi-fi while the deposit will be $375 fully refunded at the end of the lease if no damage occurs.

Property Title: Private living room in 1 bedroom apartment
Description:
Hi! 

About the place

The place is a 1 bedroom flat, i live in the main bedroom and i am renting the living room. The living room has curtains so you have full privacy(also looking into getting doors installed). It also has a big sofa, TV, desk and cupboards for your clothes. (note: bed is not included but i do have a queen blowup you can use)
The building has a huge storage space for your belongings (i dont need it) and it also has a place to store bycicles and a washer/dryer. Rent includes all utilities and bills.

About the area

The location is very central, walking distance to everything in Vancouver and close to bus-stops which can take you to skytrain. We are close to Stanley Park and the beaches so in the Summer it is very convenient and a nice way to spend the day / evening after work.

About me

I am a 29 year old guy from London (England), i work in IT for Lululemon Mon-Fri and sometimes on the weekend.I am a quiet person, clean and outgoing but i also like to spend time and relax in my room. I go to the gym 4-5 times per week, and i study japanese but i am a beginner, so having someone in the house that can speak japanese might help me to improve mine.

Availability

My roommate leaves september 13th, so its available from then or from October 1st - i'm happy to show around whenever.

Thank you!

*Note pictures were taken before current roommate, bed in picture is no longer here. Also curtains are much longer so no gaps at the bottom.

p.s. No couples allowed

Dan

Property Title: Private bedroom and shared bathroom and laundry
Description:
Upper 3 bedroom suite in a 7 bedroom home.  The downstairs is rented out separately and my husband and I rent the upstairs portion of the home.  We do connect with our downstairs neighbours and have games nights and visit sometimes. 

My husband and I are a newly married couple in our early 30s.  My husband works for Kelowna Ready Mix as a concrete mixer driver and crane operator and I contract work and study at Okanagan College.  We enjoy the outdoors and community.  Our home typically has some kind of company over at least once a week at the moment enjoying games, my husbands cooking or just visiting.  My husband really enjoys cooking meat treats and other goodies on his Traeger BBQ smoker.

There are bus stops, Okanagan College, Kelowna General Hospital, grocery shopping, beach and restaurants within walking distance of our rental.  Our landlords are very kind and laid back and we have a good relationship with them.  The home has parking, a large shared back yard, shared laundry, large shared kitchen and private bedroom and guest bedroom for our friends and family when/if they visit.  The downstairs unit only shares the back yard and internet with us.

We are looking for someone good with people being around and is okay being independent.  My husband and I have fairly active and busy lives.  Introverts work great too as your room will always be your private space.

This room is only available Jan 1 to May 1, 2022.  We are looking to extend our lease with our landlords and if they allows the extension then we would be open to a guest extension to May 31.  We will not know this until the new year.

Roommates are responsible for their own groceries, laundry detergent and extras.

Roommates will be responsible to helping clean the shared space.  We can discuss what this would look like as well as other details in a phone interview if this looks like it could be a good host/guest match.

Property Title: Beautiful House with Lovely People
Description:
Our home is a gorgeous two story attached garage with all the amenities! It is a 2200 sq.ft. home with four bed rooms and 2.5 bathrooms. You enter this beautiful home, welcomed by a spacious and inviting foyer with 25 foot ceilings. The kitchen and living room are very inviting and comfortable areas, where one can relax after a long day. The kitchen will be a place were it will be a pleasure to prepare a delicious home cooked meal. Granite counter tops and hardwood cabinets, along with stainless steal appliances make this kitchen a great and convenient place to prepare your food. This home also features a great amount of storage areas that include the kitchen pantry, wet room to the garage, downstairs basement and the garage itself. The open concept to the dining room and living room, give the main floor a feeling of endless room. If dining inside is not enough, how about a meal on the adjacent deck, whether you can devour your home cooked meal on the comfortable patio furniture enjoying the crisp fresh air. After your wonderful meal relax in the living room and watch some TV or that movie you have been dying to see. After a long day you have the option of retreating to the bonus room upstairs or your own room for greater privacy. Some other conveniences in the upstairs, include a separate bathroom with granite and hardwood cabinetry and a deep tub, where you can relax and refresh. Also, very conveniently placed is the upstairs laundry room with a modern washer and dyer. No more going up and down two flights of stairs to the basement to do your laundry! 

Not only are you choosing a beautiful and comfortable place to live, but one that is very convenient to a lot of amenities. There are numerous walk ways and parks around the area including a dog park if you have a fury friend! Yes pets are welcomed! Shopping is also very accessible, with groceries stores, restaurants, movie theaters,  and other shops only minutes away! The residential area also has great access to major freeways that give you access to the all of Edmonton, the international airport and surrounding municipalities. This community also allows quick access to escape the hassle-and-bustle of city life,  if you wanted to take off for the weekend to Calgary, Banff, or Jasper. 

This home definitely has a lot to offer, but most importantly, is that you will be welcomed by very loving and accommodating people. We are individuals that have a passion for people and building long-lasting relationships! You are not only finding a place to live, but you are also finding a place to call home, where you are not seen as a tenant, but as a member of the family! 

We hope to see you soon!

Property Title: WEEKLY RENTAL, SUITE OF ROOMS, PRIVATE BATH, DOWNTOWN KELOWNA
Description: DO YOU NEED AN AFFORDABLE,  BEAUTIFUL PLACE TO LIVE WHILE LOOKING FOR MORE PERMANENT HOUSING OR AWAY ON BUSINESS? I HAVE A BEAUTIFUL FURNISHED SUITE OF ROOMS THAT MIGHT WORK FOR YOU.  $325 PER WEEK (REDUCED RATES FOR LONGER STAYS). ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED, BEDDING AND USE OF LAUNDRY INCLUDED. Located close to Downtown Kelowna, my quiet home comprises two levels and I am offering for rent on a weekly basis or longer the entire newly renovated lower level where you will have your own fully furnished and nicely decorated suite of rooms. This will include your own TV lounge, bedroom,  bathroom as well as an integrated kitchenette/laundry area with refridgerator, sink, convection oven/microwave, coffee maker, kettle, dishes and utensils. You will also have your own direct access to a beautiful, private garden where you can use the BBQ and outdoor patio. Your lounge area is tastefully decorated and includes a loveseat, sofa chair, coffee table, 48 inch TV, end tables, shelving, table lamps and a reading lamp. Your bedroom is also nicely decorated and includes a new queen size bed, all bedding, mirrored wardrobes with ample sets of drawers, bedside tables, lamps and a desk/workspace.  The bathroom is also newly renovated and includes a modern shower, bathtub, toilet and sink and granite top vanity.  All utilities are included as well as reliable Wifi with free Amazon Fire streaming for Netflix, Amazon Video, YouTube etc. Use of the laundry is also free and there is some limited on-site storage. Please note that this is a quiet home that will appeal to quiet and respectful guests who like their privacy.

Property Title: Spacious Main Floor Room Now or Nov 1-31, or until March 31, 2021 1 Person NS
Description:
Responsible Adult to join our household. Bright Fully Furnished Main floor RM in furnished shared home, November 1 or sooner, (available now) until end November, 2020 or end of March, 2021.

We are friends, males and females, seeking to share our CLEAN, TIDY home with a professional person or mature student, someone who would like a real home, with responsible, aware, healthy housemates. Upscale residential neighbourhood on quiet cul-de-sac. 

LOCATION: Close to Lougheed Mall (and Skytrain Station) 5 minute bus ride. Shaw Avenue at Walker St., Coquitlam. 15 minute walk or 5 minute bus ride to Lougheed Skytrain Station. Close to SFU, Douglas College, BCIT. 10 minute drive to Boundary Rd., (Vancouver), 10 minute drive to Burnaby, 10 minutes to New West. 21 minute Skytrain to Broadway and Commercial. ROOM: Main floor room. Southern Exposure. Loads of light. 5 panel Bay window.

Room comes with: desk, bed, dresser, couch. Suits single CLEAN TIDY professional or full-time mature student, traveling light, who is willing to contribute to keeping the house beautiful and functional.

HOUSE:, Large kitchen with glass topped stove, 2 available fridges, Bathroom with bathtub, shower, heater. Second bathroom downstairs. The house is our Sanctuary, clean, tidy and full of plants, peaceful and homey. Washer and dryer, (line in warm weather)

Backyard: Great garden space with Organic Fruit Vegetable, Herb and Flower Gardens. Patio with BBQ’s. Close to everything you need.

ROOMIES: Committed Nonsmokers (NOT outside smokers). Semi-Vegetarian (chicken and fish only, cooked inside). Peaceful non-party home. Seeking roomie who regards our home as a community, not a hotel or a rooming house. SHARE HOME WITH: Healthy, conscious, clean community-minded roomies. Into Media, Music, Arts, Alternative Healing, Meditation, Yoga, Gardening and World Travel.

PETS: One cat here. Sorry, no more pets. $695 plus UTILITIES for the month.

PLEASE LEAVE AN EMAIL and A CALL BACK NUMBER! Or WhatsApp contact.

Relax & clean living with all utilities included in a Furnished Bedroom for rent in a great neighborhood within a short walking distance to recreational parks, the Bow river, grocery shopping, the South Health Campus and Cranston  community sports center. Highways 22x (Stoney Trail) and Deerfoot are within two minutes.

The bedroom are 11' x 9' with lots of light. Each room has a secure and private key path in the door.

 Amenities include; fully equipped kitchen, share full size bathroom, hi-speed internet, washer and dryer, and weekly  professional cleaning service .

perfect for a quiet respectful tenant - Single Occupant - with out pets who is employed full-time or is a student. I enjoy living a healthy life-style and am looking for a like minded individual. Make sure you like dogs :) as I have one! She's really cute and friendly!!

First and last months rent (as damage deposit) must be paid in full when you move in and for our safety an up-to-date background check is required.

also if you need extra space in site a small storage its also available for $50 a month

Property Title: Country in the City.  Bedroom in family home. (Room 1 of 2)
Description:
Built in 2016, this Country Style House exudes a welcoming and relaxed atmosphere.  My husband and I, who are both semi-retired, live on the main floor with more family in the basement suite.  We have two rooms  available upstairs (rented separately) that share between them a bathroom and sitting/cooking area (with hotplate, microwave but no oven). Laundry is on the main floor and is shared with us.  
Entry is through the front living room door. 
Both rooms have access to a large private deck overlooking Mission Creek.  Property is 4 acres of natural looking landscape.
Location is 20 minute drive from UBC-O and is not on a public transit route so a vehicle would be required.  Okanagan College is about 7 minutes by car. 
Our home tends to be very quiet except for when the grandchildren visit!
Wifi and utilities are included.

Property Title: Basment room and bathroom
Description:
The furnished room located in the basement of a 3500 square foot rancher situated on a 5 acres in Langley and is an active hobby goat farm. The neighborhood is quiet and the property is gorgeous. 

There is no mandatory farm work required, however, I will pay you for any labour you do around the farm such as; cutting lawns, cutting fields, cleaning the barn and feeding animals. In addition, this includes work performed with respect to household chores like, shopping, cooking, vacuuming and doing laundry. Unfortunately you will not get any remuneration for keeping your rented room and bathroom clean.  

The property address is not serviced by transit and you must have a vehicle to live here as it is a 15 minutes drive from down town Langley and KPU.

Property Title: Room for Rent in Vancouver
Description:
There will be a room available in a brand new house in Vancouver on *** Feb 1st, 2022 ***.  If this ad is up that means still looking. Looking for a male roommate. Sorry ladies!!

1.) about themselves
2.) What you do for work or are you a student and working?
3.) What are your hobbies and interests?
4.) Bonus points if you had a face picture, it would be cool to see who I will potentially be living with
5.) What do you look for in a roommate?

House:
-Brand new built 2/3 years ago
-Basement suite-kitchen, shared bath with other roommate, laundry and your own room with a closet, private entrance
-Looking for a male roommate who is clean
-no smoking allowed
-No pets
-5 min walk from Renfrew Skytrain station and 2-3 min walk from 99 B-Line. 10 mins away from downtown Vancouver and 1-2 min walk from bus 16
-Walmart, Superstore, Tim Hortons, Mexican food, Fried chicken place, Asian restaurant all within a 5 min walk
-House sits on a hill over looking the city
-Bedroom in pic has a closet in it 

You:
-a person who is clean and cleans up after yourself
-No couples allowed
-doesn’t smoke or do drugs
-you have to be a working male or a student and working.
-preferably someone who is chill and easy going with good vibes 
-would be cool if you worked out. Wouldn’t mind a gym buddy.
-You must be responsible and sane and normal mature and accountable person.

All other utilities included
Available end of April or May 1rst

Property Title: Newer Country House on Acreage - Room 2
Description:
Built in 2016, this Country Style House exudes a welcoming and relaxed atmosphere.  This is the second room that shares a bathroom and cooking area (with hotplate, microwave but no oven) with a female roommate. The room is available for a single person only, no couples please.  Laundry is on the main floor in a shared space.  Entry is through the front living room door.  Both rooms have access to a large private deck overlooking Mission Creek.  Property is 4 acres of natural looking landscape.  

There is no easy access to a bus route so it is best if you have your own vehicle.  UBC-O is 20 minutes away by car.

We prefer Students!

Description:
HELLO SINGLES, MATURE STUDENTS AND PROFESSIONALS!!! THIS IS PERFECT PLACE FOR SOMEONE WHO NEEDS A QUIET PLACE TO REST  AND STUDY.

It is a very cozy FULLY FURNISHED Room on the main floor in private well-maintained house.  Shares with one more person ONLY. Min 6 months stay and  Longer term preferred!

This would  suit for single mature responsible male who is a non smoker very clean, quiet, extremely tidy and private, who has no furniture and no car but small car is ok for the right person. 
The house rules dont allow Pets,  Parties or Visitors, No Smoking only and  light cooking preferred.

*  Female students or working professionals. LGBTQIA2S+ friendly. 

This room is available:
Sep 1st, 2025 to April 30, 2026

Room 3 includes a twin-size bed, desk, chair, desk lamp, TV, and storage area (cubes and a garment rack).

This single-family detached home with four bedrooms and two bathrooms is right on Gordon Dr. It is 12 minutes by bike to Downtown, 6 minutes walking to Okanagan College (OC), and 13 minutes by bike to H2O and several other business stores and restaurants.

Bus Route 5 is a 1-minute walk, and other routes from OC that go to UBCO, downtown, malls, and other major areas are 6 minutes walking. 

Shared: Two washrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, washer and dryer, dining table, and a deck. We will be happy to lend you a bike for commuting or leisure.

Your rent includes utilities and unlimited Wi-Fi.

Property Title: Clean bedroom with 1+ females in Penticton
Description:
Large family home with large yard located in the Uplands area of Penticton.  Close to beaches, downtown and wineries.
One clean bedroom available with shared bathroom and kitchen/living areas on main and upper floors. Basement not available for use.  There are two resident cats and my sister’s 1 dog (white lab) and one cat come to visit/stay regularly.  My sister visits and stays regularly.  I am looking for someone to assist with house cleaning, light yard care and feeding cats (sometimes the dog if it is here) if I’m away. Yard work would be light weeding, watering flowers, raking leaves in fall and shovelling snow in winter. House work would be standard cleaning ie cleaning floors, bathrooms and dusting.
Rent would normally be $1000 but because I am looking for up to 10 hours per week in home care and animal care in exchange for living here, there would be reduced rent.

Description:
Fully furnished bedroom with view in the heart of Vancouver's West End/Lost Lagoon. Crazy quiet but within 4 minute walk of shops, restaurants, beach and library! Close to transit, Evo options and 
Stanley Park. My place includes wifi and cable tv, and has laundry in the building and a locked bike-room in the basement. 

You'll share with me only, and have the option of sharing meals (ideal if you don't like cooking, too busy working or studying, or simply prefer to not deal with meal planning and grocery shopping!).  

Looking for an easygoing, tidy roomie. Would be perfect for a student or someone travelling! The perfect roommate would not need to be fastidious about cleaning but be organized and someone that always cleans up after themselves as I am the same way.

At this time am preferring a roomie that will stay until February 2022 at least, possibly until the end of the school year. Feel free to reach out though and we can discuss.

Please note:
If you have a vehicle you will need to purchase a West End parking pass in order to park in the area. I do not have a parking spot within the building unfortunately.

 Hope to hear from you!

Description:
Large room that is fully furnished
-Queen bed (bedding included)
-2 dressers 
-Bedside table
-large closet
-Private toilet
-Shower is in the hallway bathroom

Included in the house:
-Full size kitchen
-Washer and dryer
-Wifi
-Cable in living room shared by all renters
-Back deck that includes BBQ and furniture
-Cleaning services twice a month in common areas. 

House is shared by 2 young adult male renters. They both work full time and have been great renters. There is a cat inside, a dog outside that is friendly, and a few cows that graze in the back field.

This place would be ideal for a single person who works downtown or the hospital, or for a student, or someone who wants a central location to live. I have allergies to animal dander so I am not encouraging pets. I may be able to rent for longer, but not sure at this point.

Property Title: Private bedroom and shared bathroom and laundry (2)
Description:
Upper 3 bedroom suite in a 7 bedroom home.  The downstairs is rented out separately and my husband and I rent the upstairs portion of the home.  We do connect with our downstairs neighbours and have games nights and visit sometimes. 

My husband and I are a newly married couple in our early 30s.  My husband works for Kelowna Ready Mix as a concrete mixer driver and crane operator and I contract work and study at Okanagan College.  We enjoy the outdoors and community.  Our home typically has some kind of company over at least once a week at the moment enjoying games, my husbands cooking or just visiting.  My husband really enjoys cooking meat treats and other goodies on his Traeger BBQ smoker.

There are bus stops, Okanagan College, Kelowna General Hospital, grocery shopping, beach and restaurants within walking distance of our rental.  Our landlords are very kind and laid back and we have a good relationship with them.  The home has parking, a large shared back yard, shared laundry, large shared kitchen and private bedroom and guest bedroom for our friends and family when/if they visit.  The downstairs unit only shares the back yard and internet with us.

We are looking for someone good with people being around and is okay being independent.  My husband and I have fairly active and busy lives.  Introverts work great too as your room will always be your private space.

This room is only available Jan 1 to May 1, 2022.  We are looking to extend our lease with our landlords and if they allows the extension then we would be open to a guest extension to May 31.  We will not know this until the new year.

Roommates are responsible for their own groceries, laundry detergent and extras.

Roommates will be responsible to helping clean the shared space.  We can discuss what this would look like as well as other details in a phone interview if this looks like it could be a good host/guest match.

Property Title: Quite Descent Bedrooms
Description:
Chestermere is a gorgeous quiet place to live with lots of activities you can do all season–fishing, boating, lakeside picnic, swimming, snow mobile, etc. My house is 5 minutes’ walk to the lake and 25 minutes’ drive to downtown.

I’m looking for two single female (or Filipina) working professional or a full-time university student down-to-earth person to rent my two rooms upstairs. My home is a non-smoking, alcohol, drug free and non-party home. You must be a be a working professional or full-time university student. 

Serious enquiries only. One month security deposit of $500.00, and one-month advance rental of $500.00. is required. Rental includes electricity, heat, water, and internet. Extra features include a gym at the bonus room, deck to relax and large backyard.

Property Title: Country in the City - Bedroom in family home:  Room 2 of 2
Description:
Built in 2016, this Country Style House exudes a welcoming and relaxed atmosphere.  My husband and I, who are both semi-retired, live on the main floor with more family in the basement suite.  We have two rooms  available upstairs (rented separately) that share between them a bathroom and sitting/cooking area (with hotplate, microwave but no oven). This is an excellent opportunity for friends to share adjacent rooms, but singles only please.
Laundry is on the main floor and is shared with us.  
Entry is through the front living room door. 
Both rooms have access to a large private deck overlooking Mission Creek.  Property is 4 acres of natural looking landscape.
Location is 20 minute drive from UBC-O and is not on a public transit route so a vehicle would be required.  Okanagan College is about 7 minutes by car. 
Our home tends to be very quiet except for when the grandchildren visit!
Wifi and utilities are included.

Property Title: Walk to Pandosy Village, Kelowna General Hospital, Bike or walk to Okanagan College, Bus to UBC (2)
Description: Large west facing furnished bedroom, plus a sitting or study room and a private bath,. Internet, Laundry, Street parking with parking pass, Desk, Mini fridge.   Ideal if proximity to Okanagan College, Pandosy Village, or KGH is important.  A quick walk or bike ride gets you to KGH and Okanagan College, Groceries, Restaurants, shopping and medical services.  On the Bus route to UBC.  Bedroom has a Queen size bed, large closet, end tables and plenty of storage. The adjoining study room has a couch, work desk, fridge and microwave and another closet.  Private bath is tub/shower, basin, toilet, storage. This room works perfectly for Okangan College and UBC KGH students and anybody needing to attend the cancer clinic.  So close to Pandosy village - a 14 min walk.

Property Title: Semi furnished room for rent in a 3br townhouse
Description: I'm a single empty-nester looking for a bit of supplemental income and some company so I figured id offer up a room to rent. The room is average sized and includes a double bed, night table and a dresser. all utilities are included - heat/hydro/water/wifi as well as laundry facilities. I have two 3pc washrooms, which are shared, along with the kitchen, living room, back yard with fire table and party room in the basement with a bar, dart board and a selection of games. suitable for students or anyone that is outgoing and social. i have no real gender preference, but... I've been renting rooms for almost 10 years now and I seem to get along better with and have better luck with female roommates. I find females are usually tidier and less problematic.

Property Title: 1 bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment in Rosedale
Description:
OFFERING: 1 bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment. Shared kitchen and bathroom space.

TERM: Short Term (Available April 1st to June 30th)

RENT: $759 per month (Price will not increase for the term available) + $45 for Internet 

LOCATION: Rosedale (15 minute bus ride from Rosedale Station) 

LEVEL: Second Floor - Lots of Light!

UTILITIES: All utilities are included except Internet and Air Conditioning. AC units have to be bought and installed in the summer. My current internet plan is approximately $90 per month, but I’m looking into getting a cheaper one. Coin laundry is in the basement.

RELATIONSHIP TO UNIT: I am the Leaseholder of the unit. Rent will be paid to me and then forwarded to the landlord.

ACCESSIBILITY: Unfortunately the apartment is not wheelchair accessible. To enter the unit, you must be able to walk up two flights of stairs. The apartment has a sound smoke alarm with a carbon monoxide detector.

SCENT: I have no issues regarding scents. As per the landlord’s rules, smoking is only allowed outside of the premises. 

REQUIRED DOCUMENTS: My landlord requires you to fill out a Tenant Application form so that they have your basic info (i.e. Phone Number, Email, etc), should you decide to move in. 

ADDITIONAL INFO: The apartment is right next to a train track, so anyone who is bothered by loud noises might want to look elsewhere. However, there are lots of great parks and green spaces nearby (Evergreen Brickworks is a 10-minute walk away). There is also a grocery store right next to the apartment. 

ABOUT ME (QUEER SAFETY and SELF-IDENTITY): Hello! My name is Calyx Passailaigue. I am a non-binary filmmaker and actor based out of Toronto. My pronouns are They/Them. I love watching great movies, going out to a nice dinner with friends, and playing video games to unwind. I LOVE TO LAUGH and deeply value having a good sense of humour, especially in the face of hardships.

Although anyone is welcome to apply, I would love to find a fellow member of the Queer, Trans, and/or ENBY communities to live with. In turn, I will ensure that the apartment remains an LGBTQ+ inclusive, sex-positive, and emotionally supportive living space, while at the same time respecting boundaries. Please feel free to speak to me about any specific concerns you may have during the application process. I am happy to answer any questions!

Additionally, I am looking for a respectful, positive roommate who will stay on top of cleaning up after themselves (i.e. do your own dishes, keep the shared spaces relatively clean, etc). I ask that we limit the number of guests in the apartment while the COVID situation develops. As long as we respect each other’s boundaries, privacy, and mental well-being, I’m sure we will get along wonderfully!

CONTACT: Please send all inquiries to calyxapartment2022@gmail.com. From there, I would like to set up a time to do a phone or video call, so that we can get to know each other a little better.

We live in a beautiful big home, with lots of big windows, close to downtown, in a quiet neighbourhood. I am looking to re-assign my lease, as a big opportunity came up for me to leave Kelowna for an extended amount of time. 

The house would be shared with 3 young professionals in their late 30's in lower Glenmore(Walker Dr.), including 2 small dogs who are home only half the month. Description:
Stunning new Legal Basement in a Fully Detached House with separate entrance.
- Brand new Basement apartment with new appliances included
- basement consist of 2 Big bedrooms + 1 Huge ensuit master bedroom with private 2pc washroom and a walk-in-closet. + a separate 3 pc washroom which will be shared with fellow students. (The add is for the Big sized bedrooms with large size windows providing ample of natural light)
-Separate Entrance.

- Washer Dryer shall be shared with the owner living in the main floor and fellow students.
- Price includes all utilities.
- Total are of basement is about 1200 sq ft.
- looking to rent on a four month term or more
- First month and last month rent required
-20 dollars additional for parking if required.

Property Title: Bedroom w/ kitchenette & study area near UBCO/YLW
Description:
This is a large (~350 sq. ft.), welcoming, and recently-updated basement bedroom with your own kitchenette and study/eating area. It has a large closet with dresser/organizer, wall-mounted TV, and good high-speed wi-fi. You can access the room without entering the main house. 

The main floor bathroom, laundry, and a larger fridge/freezer is just steps above your room, all accessible without entering the main house. The bathroom is cleaned out for your use, and you will be the only one who uses the shower, so it's semi-private. 

Public transit is ~10 min. walk away and UBCO is 22 min by bus or 8 min by car. 

We have two super-friendly dogs, but they are kept out of the basement room. Renovations including new flooring, paint, and kitchenette were completed on Aug. 28.

Description:
Available September 1, 2023.

Property Title: Large room in home in Kettle Valley
Description:
We have a lovely home in Kettle Valley with views over the lake located on a small side road.   There is access to outdoor trails and activities. Shops are generally a drive away. 

One queen sized bedroom and private bathroom located in a 5 bedroom home in Kettle Valley.   The room has a queen bed and closet in the room and is located in the walk out basement.  The bath is a full tub/shower combo.  The upstairs if full furnished to share with TV/cable and internet.   Parking is located on the driveway or in garage when owner is away.   

The area is very family oriented and quiet.  It's in a suburban area and so a car is a must as  public transport is patchy.    The home is occupied by myself and my son (13) but we  spend much time away and it's a very large home so plenty of space.

We prefer shorter term tenants but can potentially accommodate requests for certain circumstances.    You'll definitely need a car for this location.

Property Title: Abbott Street - Lower level of home - fully furnished, steps from beach & KGH!
Description:
Fully-furnished. Bright and Cozy, Near all services, perfect for female professional or students in walkable, quiet, heritage neighborhood across from KGH and the beach!  We would consider married couples depending on the fit (I.e. meet/greet with your room-mates).

In addition to your warm cozy Queen-size bedroom, you will have your own personal bathroom, fridge, freezer, office & living room (complete with Futon, desk & exercise bike!). And you will have access to share the main floor kitchen, living room and 39” SMART TV in our Frank Lloyd Wright style heritage home. Your roommates are quiet, friendly, neat, and respectful female professionals, who have their own bedrooms and washrooms upstairs.

It’s a 1 minute walk to Okanagan Lake and serene views of our beautiful Okanagan Valley. Or take a stroll/bike/jog along our tree-lined Abbott Street paths. Truly a delightful neighborhood we live in.
Near transit, shopping, parks, beach. We upgraded our home’s insulation and installed solar-panels, so you don’t pay for electricity, only gas, water, and internet (average $50/month). We are also near KGH, Abbott Street coffee shop and Pharmacy - can't beat location - its a walkable neighborhood! Perfect for families, student groups, KGH staff, and folks wanting to live in one of Kelowna's best neighborhoods. Solar panels mean zero electricity bills, super cozy in winter, and cool heat pump in summer.

It comes fully furnished with W/D, and all kitchen appliances. On-street permit parking only (sorry), but a bike and a bus pass is what we use most of the time! 5 minute walk to OC/UBCO bus routes.
Ground floor entrance, split level layout. No pets, no parties, no smoking, no drugs. References required. Available for move-in immediately. The rent is negotiable, for the right roommate(s), we are prepared to lower! And of course, minimum 90 day leases, preferably longer term (like the rest of your roommates have).

We say NO PETS because we already have two VERY FRIENDLY outdoor cats who roam the property. So please, PLEASE don't even ask.

Property Title: shared home
Description:
The house we live in is a 2 story house with a bsmt. There are two rooms on the upper floor with a 2 piece bathroom (which is where my brother and his wife stay when they are home from Thailand).
There is a main level room. There is a full bathroom on the main floor that is shared. The kitchen and the rest of the house is also shared. 
My daughter and I sleep in the bsmt.
There is a large fenced back yard with lots of garden space. 
There is a washer and dryer, as well as a dishwasher in the kitchen. 
The house is close to all amenities, restaurants, shops, grocery store, leisure center. 
There are no locks on the bedroom doors, but if desired one can be put on.  

We are respectful, considerate, kind, mature well balanced people and we wish to have the same type of roommates with us. My brother and his wife also stay with us when they are home from Thailand. We are pretty quite, we do not party, or do drugs. 
We will always respect your privacy and also do our best to make you feel at home, and help where we can if need be.
We all share with the house work, of which there is not very much to do if we all clean up after ourselves.
There is a good sized yard, and help mowing the lawn would be wonderful.
There is a lot of garden space, so if you wish to grow some vegies, you are more than welcome to do so!

We have 4 adult cats that are loving and snuggly, having said that I would prefer no other pets.

i am about a 30 km drive to Abbotsford.

I am negotiable on the rent if I have more than 1 student

Property Title: OKCollege, Pandosy. Separate entrance..

Big garden and fenced yard. Lots of space to be on your own or interact. Parking. Bus routes, biking, walking. Family lives mostly on top two floors. Some gaming and arts and craft on 3 level. Ari, a border collie x Aussie dog stays outside most of the time( 14 yrs old) the  other Puppup/ mini dog shadows Hanna Lorra (mom.)Well kept home, easy to clean bamboo floors. Two bedrooms available, one with king bed, one with queen. So if two renters show up then the bathroom is shared. Big closets. Kitchen is stocked with everything you need. I love cooking together if you decide you would like to join us.

Property Title: Room #2. Private king bedroom furnished
Description:
Student rental. September 1 - April 30. Rent 1-4 rooms in this lower level walkout 4 bedroom suite fully furnished and equipped, 4 king beds, 2 full bathrooms (2 suite-mates per bathroom), common areas include a full kitchen, dining area, and laundry room. The full kitchen includes a full-size refrigerator freezer, 4 burner electric stove and oven, dishwasher, in-suite washer, and dryer. 4-seat dining room counter height table, small and large appliances, coffee maker, microwave, cookware, dishes, glasses, mugs, and cutlery. There are cleaning supplies and a vacuum provided. Each bedroom has its own sitting area, office desk, chair, king-size pillowtop bed with linens, 2 night stands with lamps. We have Kelowna's fastest Internet Shaw Fibre+ Gig 1.5 Wifi.

This private suite is in a very quiet owner-occupied residential home. The homeowner lives upstairs in another self-contained unit. Perfect for serious and quiet students. No parties, no smoking inside or near open doors or windows, no pets. 

The outside has a private patio balcony with patio furniture, BBQ, and amazing Okanagan Lake & Kelowna City views. Plenty of street parking on a wide no-thru street in a quiet cul-de-sac.

If important please check the Kelowna BC Bus Transit Maps and Schedule.

The rental address is at:
916 Ackerman Court Kelowna BC V1X7L2

A vehicle is recommended however it's just 2 blocks from the public transit bus stop. Approximately 15 minutes drive to anywhere in Kelowna International Airport (YLW), University of British Columbia Okanagan (UBCO), Okanagan College Kelowna Campus, Centre for Arts and Technology Kelowna, Kelowna General Hospital (KGH), Kelowna International Airport YLW. Property Title: Comfy Private room close to Bluewater Hospital
Description:
Welcome to Sarnia! 
Do not worry about anything, just bring your personal belongings. 

Please come and enjoy this modern bedroom, fully furnished, which has all you need for a comfortable stay: a double bed, fresh linens, cozy comforter, soft pillows, two large windows, central AC, a bedside table, a smart TV, and a lovely desk to work at. 

Do you like to cook? All the kitchen utensils that you need to cook are provided and portable containers for food, so you can prepare your own food to enjoy it at college or work. 

This is a single-occupancy bedroom on the first level of my home. The kitchen and bathroom are shared with another guest. 

Rent includes all utilities (electricity, heating, cooling, water), unlimited internet, washing and drying machine use once a week. Monthly cleaning included.

Lambton College is 5 kilometers away, Bluewater Hospital, Giresi Pizzeria, and Germain Park are all within walking distance. It's close to public transportation.

Keep in mind that this is a private room, so one person per room is allowed.

Property Title: A happy place!  Your home away from home (Room A)
Description:
A large fully furnished bedroom for rent on lower level, with a queen bed, dresser, chairs and tons of storage, a small fridge, toaster oven and microwave.   Lower level bathroom to be shared with one other student and you will have access to a shared laundry room.  You will also have access to full kitchen upstairs if needed.   There is extra room for parking on the driveway, as well as street parking for one.  Utilities and WIFI included.
A cozy home with lots of room, on a large lot with a beautiful zen backyard and on the bus route.   
Less than 5 minute walk to bus route which stops at H2O fitness centre and then on to Okanagan College.
Close to soccer fields, tennis courts, convenience store and restaurants.   
It's a super location for those seeking exercise with trails for hiking and biking in every direction.  
Make friends my small, non-shedding hypoallergenic dog, Cooper, and/or Daisy the cat.
Please list vaccination status and tell me a little about yourself and your desired length of stay.
No parties, smoking or vaping please.

Property Title: Room is near Okanagan Lake and bike trails
Description:
We have a beautiful home in Lake Country 15 minutes from the University of BC Okanagan.  We are steps from the beach and a Cafe (Salted Caramel) walking trails, wineries, and 20 min. from Vernon and Kelowna.
The bedrooms are located on the second floor .  One bedroom has an air conditioner and electric heater and the other bedroom has a floor air circulator and an electric heater.  Both have large windows that face East or West.  The washer and dryer is in a separate building .  There is a dresser, lamp, desk and chair in one bedroom with a queen bed, and a bunk bed and a closet. 
The other bedroom has a queen bed, a dresser, a chair and a closet.

Property Title: Seeking a quiet and respectful student to join our family home
Description:
- It is on Falkirk Road, off Hollywood Road in the Rutland area. Rent is $1000 all included, $500 damage deposit and a one year lease preferred. 

- Home consists of one private bedroom and shared space of the rest of the house. 

- One parking spot is available in the driveway, as well as laundry, a covered area outside and a huge backyard. 

- Walking distance to Rutland amenities and a few bus stops. Tons of storage downstairs in the unfinished basement if needed. 

- Looking for someone who is reasonably quiet, clean, trustworthy, responsible, easy going and friendly like us, as we would prefer someone who we can create a reasonable friendship with if we are sharing the common spaces. 

- LGBTQ friendly, no smoking, no pets, no drama, no parties (totally fine with casual drinking, or a boyfriend/girlfriend/occasional friend hanging out).

Property Title: A happy place!  Your home away from home (Room B)
Description:
A fully furnished bedroom for rent on lower level, complete with a double bed, dresser, mini fridge, toaster oven and microwave. Lower level bathroom to be shared with one other student and you will have access to a shared laundry room. You will also have access to full kitchen upstairs if needed. 
There is extra room for parking on the driveway, as well as street parking for one. Utilities and WIFI included.
A cozy home with lots of room, on a large lot with a beautiful zen backyard and on the bus route.
Less than 5 minute walk to bus route which stops at H2O fitness centre and then on to Okanagan College.
Close to soccer fields, tennis courts, convenience store and restaurants.
It's a super location for those seeking exercise with trails for hiking and biking in every direction.
Make friends my small, non-shedding hypoallergenic dog, Cooper, and/or Daisy the cat.
Please list vaccination status and tell me a little about yourself and your desired length of stay.
No parties, smoking or vaping please

Property Title: Nice & bright bedroom w. private bathroom by Okanagan College
Description:
Available October 1st or 15th. 

Renting out my spare bedroom in my cozy condo right across from Okanagan College. Seeking a female student or young professional.

The condo is located on the top floor of the building facing south (lots of sun to enjoy on the covered balcony) and has a split floor plan. This is a quiet 19+ building in a Cul-de-Sac.

The bedroom is approximately 11 x 9 ft, has a spacious closet, blackout curtains and is furnished with a double bed with a super comfortable mattress, desk, chair and nightstand. I’d be happy to purchase a dresser as well for extra storage. You will have your own bathroom with a shower. The bathroom has a brand new vanity, toilet, flooring and fresh paint (hardware and mirror will be installed this week, and I will update with new photos then. Vanity, toilet and flooring are the same as in the other bathroom pictures). The kitchen, living room with electric fireplace and laundry (washer and dryer in the unit) will be shared. The balcony has a small BBQ, table and chairs. The unit also has a small pantry.

The rent includes all utilities (heat, electricity, hot water and Wifi). Minimum 8 months lease but 1-year preferred. Half a month’s rent damage deposit is required. 

I am a quiet professional and like spending time in the great outdoors, preferably in the mountains, hiking in the summer, and snowshoeing in the winter.  I also enjoy reading, cooking or watching a movie curled up on the couch. No parties, no smoking or drugs, no drama. Single occupancy only.

Must love cats as the space is also shared with my sweet but sometimes a little crazy rescue kitty Tiger.

Great location, right across from the college and bus stops and only minutes away from grocery stores, coffee shops, restaurants, yoga studios and Gyro Beach. Sorry, there is no designated parking spot that comes with the room, so it will be perfect for someone who either doesn‘t have a vehicle or does not need to use their car daily (there is only very limited street parking available).

References and proof of school and/or work will be required.

Property Title: Private room All utilities and free parking included
Description:
Welcome to Sarnia! 
Do not worry about anything, just bring your personal belongings. 

Please come and enjoy this modern bedroom, fully furnished, which has all you need for a comfortable stay: a double bed, fresh linens, cozy comforter, soft pillows, two large windows, central AC, a closet, hangers, a bedside table, a TV with Chrome Cast available, and a lovely desk to work at. 

Do you like to cook? All the kitchen utensils that you need to cook are provided and portable containers for food, so you can prepare your own food to enjoy it at college or work. 

This is a single-occupancy bedroom on the upper level of my home. The kitchen and bathroom are shared with the owner.

Rent includes all utilities (electricity, heating, cooling, water), unlimited internet, washing and drying machine use once a week. Monthly cleaning included.

Lambton College is 5 kilometers away, Bluewater Hospital, Giresi Pizzeria, and Germain Park are all within walking distance. It's close to public transportation.

Keep in mind that this is a private room, so one person per room is allowed.

Property Title: Room in Rutland townhouse
Description:
One furnished bedroom for rent in the basement of our townhouse in Rutland. We are looking for one clean, quiet and respectful preferably male around our age 18-30ish to share our home with. We are both very tidy, clean and organized people and we expect that out of anyone whom we choose to share our home with. Students are welcome and encouraged! 

No smoking or Heavy drinkers
No pets (due to we have some of our own)
No couples

The top floor consists of our personal space
The main floor - our Kitchen, livingroom and your new bathroom, covered patio with new furniture and BBQ.

Property Title: Student Co-Houseing Econ room 3 blocks from VIU campus
Description:
Student Rooming co-housing (students only!!!)  We are 3 blocks from campus and all major services.  rec centre, Shopping, Work opportunities, and local activities. Bus service 1/4 block away from all other destinations. We offer there types of rooms Economy, Standard and Delux

This is our economy room which is about by 9x8.5 standard room with a small window viewing the small closet. A single bed.  A Small work table is possible. Private door lock with key.
 
About the Co-housing:
We are a community and family-friendly environment, supporting students to succeed in their studies and life. We encourage international students to stay and work together and have many rich experiences on campus and in the community. Most students stay with us for 2-3 years. We are one of the best prices and locations in town and looking for students wishing to be in social housing while also doing their studies and seeking outside work opportunities.

We are social co-housing for students who share common space, laundry and outdoor yard green space, BBQ, Covered deck, Smoking area, Fire pit, living rooms, theatre screen, TV, Wifi and Printer for school projects. 

We have a garden where you can grow fresh vegetables, Fruit trees Apple, Plum and Cherry.  

We are on a quiet street behind local services with many walking and bike trails and parks nearby. Downtown is a 15-minute walk, 5 minutes biking  3-minute by bus with many more stores, waterfront beaches and restaurants. 

About the house:
 We Have a split-level House with semi-private ground floor suits with 2 rooms with a shared full bathroom, kitchen, living room+ fireplace, and dining room.

upper house with three bedrooms with a full bathroom, kitchen plus dishwasher, living room+fire place and a theatre screen, Large dining room space.

 Some furnishing is possible (bed and coverings, towels, desk, kitchen gear, basic supplies for cleaning some basic food staples) All Living room and dining rooms have furniture. 

About the management team:
 Live in-manager is a retired Elder with many years of teaching and outdoor skills, he has his own suit with a washroom, and mini kitchenette. He has a Therapy cat and a Service dog labrador who is supper friendly but can also stay in the unit if you are scared of dogs or cats. We have been operating our boarding/Rooming house for students for 30 years. Usually, he can be reached by text or Facebook. A couple of times a year he offers connections to the local First Nation community and other social events in town. Typically we cook and share one meal weekly and have gathered on major holidays to share food games and movies.

 Rules: We Have a standard set of rules and expectations but put simply:
Must be a quiet and clean and serious student that follows house rules. No pets, or parties. No big group gatherings without housemates agreeing. No splitting a room with another student. We are not a party house most students work and study so we value a quiet and calm atmosphere. Lock doors when you leave, and No guests over without direct supervision (sleep over occasionally fine let housemates know via Facebook messenger) Students must clean up after use of the common space, kitchen and bathroom. The resident manager cleans 2x month but students are expected to make effort to clean and recycle their garbage, compost and recyclables wash dishes/ load or unload the dishwasher pick up and sweep up if they make a mess. All cleaning supplies are handy.

 Room option and long-term stay price:
We have several room options and prices. Please see our other ads some included private washrooms or larger room sizes. Note we offer a slight reduction in fees if you stay for 6 months and a larger reduction at the 1-year anniversary. Many students stay for two to three years. We require 30 days minimum notice before leaving.

Please put apples in your response so we know you read this post. We will delete requests that have not done so.
We wish you well on your journey
