Property Title: Large bedroom in downtown student house
Description:
This is a 5-bedroom, fully furnished house right in the heart of downtown Kelowna. A 10 minute walk to the nearest grocery store, a 15 minute walk to waterfront and city parks, and a 10 minute walk to many surrounding local breweries.

The house is equipped with central AC and gas heating, as well as 2 full bathrooms, a dishwasher, on-street parking and in-unit laundry. 

Included in the room is a queen sized bed, side table, wardrobe, desk and chair. You will have your own pantry and fridge space. The room is 13x14 feet. 

The house is very close to the UBCO bus route (about a 35 minute commute), and as stated earlier is very close to almost any amenity you might need. 

The living space is shared with 3rd year UBCO students (male and female) in their early 20's who are all easy going people. We have all been friends for 3+ years and get along very well together and with others. We would love if our new roommate could integrate well into our friend group but if they would prefer to spend the majority of their time alone or apart from the rest of the roommates, that would be absolutely fine. 

Common hobbies among the roommates are playing chess and other board games, puzzles, watching hockey, and going downtown for drinks. We like to have groups of friends over every so often and these social gatherings can range from 3 to 15 friends at a time.

There is no pets or indoor smoking allowed, and the room is single occupancy only. Rent is $750 a month and utilities are an extra $65 a month. Available January 1st.

For more information, please call Charles at 705-321-0817.

Description:
This home is a 2 bed, 3 bath new townhouse on a quiet street near Ethel, 10 min walk to Queensway bus terminal.  You will be on your own with maybe one other roomate in the second bedroom and have the whole 1500 sq foot home to yourselves. Your private master suite room has a king sized bed, side tables, lamps, large closet and clothes dresser, plus a wall mounted TV as well private full bathroom in a large sunny space..  
The entire house is available privately and includes all utilities/wifi etc.  In house laundry, street parking, nice ;private yard and garage parking if necessary.   If you are a couple, this is the perfect space - however the rent will reflect at $1500 for two in the master bedroom/bath.
It is possible we could rent a week earlier around Jan 8th depending on circumstances.

No cats, but small dogs will be considered.

.

Property Title: Master Suite in Glenmore
Description:
Master bedroom for rent in lower Glenmore! Available February 1st. 

It's a large bedroom with a walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with a deluxe shower. The main bathroom has a tub, just in case that's desired, and a washer and dryer.

My mother's roommate is moving out, and she needs a new one.  My mum is retired. She has the other two bedrooms and is quiet and kind. Absolutely no smokers. Pets negotiable.

Off-street parking in the carport for one car is available, and having a car or bicycle is recommended. The closest bus stop is a 10-15 minute walk downhill. Once you are on the bus though, it's only 19 minutes to UBCO. It's a 12-minute drive to UBCO or a 30-minute bicycle ride.

The bedroom is unfurnished, the pictures show the current tenant's bed and dresser. They will be taking them with them when they leave. The rest of the house is furnished. High-speed Internet (WiFi) is included.

Property Title: Bright and quiet basement bedroom
Description:
Although this room is in the basement, it is large, bright and comfortable. (I know, I sometimes sleep there in the summertime!) Pros: a huge closet and lots of room. Cons: 1. It tends to be cooler than the rest of the house (this might be a pro for some...). 2. The bathroom is upstairs. 

The neighbourhood is very quiet. The only noise emanates from my washer and dryer (which I wouldn't be running at night) and my composter (which is very cool but can be noisy--we'd have to discuss!).

My place is walking distance to downtown, about 15 minutes to the grocery stores and 20 or so to the rest of the main street shops. It is one long block from Alexis Park Drive where there is regular bus service.

Currently (Summer/Fall 2024) there is major construction on the street in front of the complex. As such, parking is not available on the street in front. Parking is about 1.5 blocks away.

Property Title: Newly Remodeled Furnished Studio for Rent  Rutland- Rent $1,100
Description:
Well-maintained 300 square feet studio detached from the owners-occupied property. Rent $1,100.

One bedroom with a queen bed (new bedding included and extra bed linen), closet, armoire, nightstand, lamp, wall AC unit, and wall heating. 

Kitchen is combined with the dining room. Floors are tiled and laminated.

Included: kitchen table with 2 chairs, full size fridge, microwave, mini-oven, portable induction cooktop (no full-size stove/oven.), some pots, pans, and utensils, student desk with chair, leader chair with ottoman, TV, seat storage ottoman at the entrance.

No in suite laundry but the Village Coin Laundry is within walk distance. 
Private entrance and parking for a single vehicle.

Located in a quiet, family-oriented neighborhood. Walking distance to YMCA gym and pools, parks, schools, convenience stores, grocery stores, other shops. 

Okanagan College: 

•	By Bus from Rutland:  Bus at McIntosh Road, bus every 20 min. 
•	By Car from Rutland:  Via Springfield Road, 18 min (10.6 km)

Property Title: Fully furnished private space with shared kitchen and laundry
Description:
You'll have your own private driveway, entrance, bedroom, bathroom, living area (with 55" tv and firestick) and some basic kitchen supplies (including coffee pot, kettle, toaster, mini fridge, induction plate, microwave, ninja foodi).  You'll even have your own private patio and yard.  I also have an inground outdoor pool with BBQ that may be available for some of September and April - weather permitting (it's heated with solar panels).  For full kitchen (stove, oven) and laundry, you're welcome to come upstairs and share ours.

I live upstairs with my five year old little boy, two dogs, and very senior cat.  I work full time from home so am home most of the time.  I'm just looking to get a little extra money to cover increased cost of living as finances have become very tight so thought I'd open up to a student needing an affordable place to stay during the school year.

(3 month minimum - available Sept 1 - April 30 with some flexibility into May for the right applicant.)

Note: this is a somewhat rural community (beautiful quiet neighborhood for walking around).  While it is just 5 km away from grocery store, a pub, movie theatre, Kal lake, and other activities, you will need a car as it's not on any bus route.

Property Title: Bedroom 1
Description:
2 bedrooms available for rent  in 4 br, 2 upper floors of a large home in the Everett/Marshal area of Abbotsford. 
Our home is quiet and runs smoothly. We have the upper suite of the home with 2 current tenants occupying 1 bedroom upstairs (47yr old female) and 1 downstairs (50yr old female)
Currently our home has 2 senior Labrador service dogs and 2 adult cats. Additional feline upon approval with up to date vet checkup vaccines, deworming, flea prevention (must be dog friendly and have 6 months flea treatment for each cat at move in additional deposit is required)
Home is located two minutes from the trans Canada highway as well as two minutes from Highway 11 sumas Way interchange Our home consists of two living rooms, casual and formal dining rooms, office area, covered outdoor patio. 2.5  bathrooms, off street parking and secure storage area in garage can be arranged. 
This home has laundry room with washer dryer, 1/2 bathroom, a extra large fully stocked kitchen with all dishes, pots, small appliances (mixer, ice maker, toaster, food processor, crock and instapot+++) dishwasher, microwave, double wall oven, glass top rage, extra fridge, & xl freezer in the garage, and outdoor propane bbq, has all hardwood floors and is fully equipped and furnished indoors and out. 

Bedroom #1 +$350 for second person 
This Bedroom has double closet, 1 dresser, 1-queen bed (1 set of basic bedding is provided), 1 off street parking spot possible

We have been hosting students for almost 7 years.. Our home is on a large piece of property which holds an upper and lower deck and big big backyard, with bbqs, pizza ovens and more all south facing.  We are a social family and quite often have friends and family over on the weekends.  Guests are always welcome to join us.  We are an easy going family that loves meeting new people ! 

We have 3 rooms available ( 1 larger and 2 smaller separate ads) with a shared kitchen and bathroom ( ours is private) my husband and I both work from home, our 20 yr old son also lives with us and our 16 yr old daughter is with us part time and we have two indoor cats ( who are kept out of renters rooms).   The rooms are located on the main floor of the house.  Rent includes WifI, Utilities and Laundry as well as renters would have their own fridge and cupboard space should they wish to store grocery items and food. We also have house cleaners that come twice monthly to clean.

Property Title: Room in a Family Home in Sunny Steveston
Description:
We are located about 5 mins from Historic Steveston Village in Richmond, BC. We are a short walk to transit which will take you to the Brighouse Skytrain in about 15-20mins and can get you down town to Vancouver in 23 mins.  We have been hosting students and tenants for over 10 years.. Our home is on a large piece of property which holds an upper and lower deck and big big backyard, with bbqs, pizza ovens and more all south facing. We are a social couple and quite often have friends and family over on the weekends outdoors in the summer. Guests are always welcome to join us. Other than that we are simple people who both work from home,  we like to golf and go on adventures if the weather allows it.  I also like to cook and quite often enjoy sharing my creations with guests!  I also play the piano and sometimes we have music evenings.

We have 1 large bright and airy  room available with a shared kitchen and bathroom (ours is private) we do have indoor cats however they are only in our bedroom and the common area of the home, they do not go into other rooms.  Rent includes WifI, Utilities and Laundry as well as renters would have their own fridge and cupboard space should they wish to store grocery items and food. We also have house cleaners that come  regularly to clean. All rooms have TV’s with Roku and access to streaming platforms that can be used by guests.

Please note pictures show rooms that are currently being utilized.  When they leave they are professionally cleaned and will be painted to freshen them up.

Property Title: Student Home Share:Modern 2 bedroom Semi-Private Basement Suite
Description:
Are you a student looking for a comfortable convenient living arrangement during the academic year? Look no further! We are excited to offer a spacious 2 bedroom semi-private basement suite in a welcoming home, available from Sunday, September 3 to May 1. 
Here are the fantastic features and amenities our suite has to offer. 
1 the suite boasts a fully equipped kitchen including, full size fridge with water filter and ice maker, glass top convection range, microwave and dishwasher. Kitchen includes all dishes, pots, pans, cutlery, utensils as well as tea towels. Bring your own spices and groceries. Solid wood table and chairs. Kitchen also has a quartz top kitchen island perfect for food prep. 
2 in suite laundry 
3 fully furnished bedrooms including queen bed with sheets and bedding, night stand, dresser and closet or wardrobe, depending on which room you choose. Just bring your personal belongings and you are all set!
4 wifi included 
5 shared tv room 
6 there is an outdoor patio area for your use. 
7 there are no pets allowed, no live plants, no hanging of pictures on walls. Home is completely designed and is a home share.

Property Title: Walkout Basement Accomo in Lakeview Heights with own entrance
Description:
Enjoy living in the Heart of West Kelowna’s Wine Country, just a short 8 minute drive over the bridge to Kelowna City Center and beaches.  Walk or hike among the vineyards just steps away.  Bus stop is a convenient 3 minute walk if you need to connect to the 97 Bus to UBCO, or wherever you’re headed. Lakeview Village Mall within minutes.

Your basement accommodation is fully above ground, has its own entrance, your own bedroom furnished with a queen bed , dresser, and full private bathroom with a shower/tub.  Access to a small kitchenette has a fridge, microwave, sink, small appliances and cupboards and dishes. This is an area of the home that we reserve for guests, so we rarely use the 2nd kitchen.

There is a shared BBQ and small private patio area. Large fenced yard with fruit trees and gardens.

Within walking distance to shops, and restaurants. A  2 minute drive to Kalamoir Beach. 10 minute drive to downtown Westbank. We’re actually closer to downtown Kelowna.

Property Title: Large Cozy Room in beautiful home, NE Salmon Arm
Description:
Hi friends!

We live in Salmon Arm on a beautiful large property with our older kids and two small dogs.  If you like being 5 minutes from Okanagan College and hearing beautiful bird song outside your window you’re going to love it here!  Our home is husband and wife and 4 teenagers 13-17.

Private room, kitchenette / laundry and bathroom.

Kitchenette set up (toaster oven, hot plate, fridge etc).  The large modern bathroom is only shared with my 2 older sons and everyone has their own shelf to stay organized and clean. You will enter our home from the back door and go down 6 stairs to your private space on right, laundry and kitchenette on left.

We are a friendly kind family that likes our privacy but at the same time we want you to feel comfortable and connected and will help in any way.  Access will be to your spaces only, not the upstairs.

Looking forward to learning more about you.

Property Title: Furnished Room to Rent, Central Location
Description:
Are you searching for the perfect place to call home? Look no further! Nestled in a serene and picturesque neighborhood, our shared accommodation offers a unique opportunity for a comfortable and stylish living experience.

Location:
Our beautiful home is situated in a quiet and picturesque neighborhood. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the surroundings while still being conveniently close to essential amenities and transportation links.

Accommodation Features:
Indulge in the luxury of a spacious 312 sq ft room designed with your comfort in mind. The room comes fully furnished, featuring a cozy bed for a restful night's sleep, a functional desk for work or study, and a comfortable sitting area to unwind after a long day.

Shared Spaces:
Experience the joy of communal living with access to well-appointed shared spaces. The common areas are tastefully decorated, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Whether you enjoy cooking in a modern kitchen, relaxing in a cozy living room, or spending time in a manicured garden, our home provides the perfect balance of privacy and community.

Amenities:
Our home is equipped with all the essential amenities to make your stay convenient and enjoyable. High-speed internet, utilities, housekeeper and regular maintenance are included, ensuring that you have everything you need for a seamless living experience.

Why Choose Us:

Scenic Surroundings: Enjoy the beauty of our gardens and pond, a peaceful atmosphere in our gorgeous neighborhood.
Spacious Living: Revel in the expansive 312 sq ft room designed for both functionality and comfort.
Fully Furnished: Move-in ready with a comfortable bed, a practical desk, and a cozy sitting area.
Convenient Location: Accessible to essential amenities and transportation links for a hassle-free lifestyle.
Community Feel: Experience the benefits of shared living while maintaining your personal space.
Rent Details:
All utilities, including high-speed internet, are included in the rent.

Take the first step towards a serene and fulfilling living experience. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and make this beautiful room in our shared home yours. Welcome to a life of tranquility and comfort!

Property Title: Beautifully decorated sunny spacious bedroom in Upper mission
Description:
Modern tastefully decorated sunny spacious bedroom in the beautiful neighborhood of Upper Mission. Enjoy the roomy feeling of high ceilings and plenty of light. Down the hall, you will find a full bathroom and laundry.  The large covered patio area leads to a green peaceful backyard. Four stainless steel appliances and a granite breakfast island with stylish wood cabinets offer a great cooking area. The big living room boasts a gas fireplace with luxury vinyl flooring that combines with a spacious dining space. Gas heating and air conditioning make an always comfortable place. 

Close walk to Canyon Falls Middle School and minutes to OKM and elementary schools. 10-minute drive to Okanagan College, Pandosy shopping center, H20 recreation center or beaches. Utilities $50/ month. Amenities available: Internet, in-unit laundry, stove, refrigerator, microwave oven, dishwasher, patio. No smoking or partying. Renter's guests are not allowed. House is under the Telus home security system ensuring a safe place to live.

Property Title: Clean, sunny bedroom in a shared house with a cool chick and her cool dog
Description:
Hi! 
I am renting a good-size bedroom in my home. The room gets lots of nice sunshine throughout the day. The house is a small (~1200 sq ft) townhouse. Two stories. 1.5 bathrooms. Shared kitchen and living space downstairs. Small but nice fenced yard with garden and leisure space. Lots of recreational space on the larger common property (about 7 acres total). Bedroom is unfurnished - but I could furnish it with the basics if that's the preference of interested tenants.

I have a medium-sized bully mix who is very friendly but will need boundaries from you, or will try and sleep in your bed every night. I occasionally need a dog-sitter - if you'd be willing to do this, I would compensate/reduce rent :)

Utilities include hydro and internet. If you need parking, there is an extra fee required by the strata. $10 for a field spot or $20 for a paved spot - subject to availability. We are super close to the hospital and within walking distance to downtown Duncan and all amenities. 

Generally, I am looking for temporary or short-term renters more than long-term, but for the right folks, I can be flexible! Food sharing and all those bits will be worked out case-by-case, depending on how we want to live together :)

Full transparency, the house is old and imperfect and I am still working thru a couple of renos. Everything is perfectly functional! But at times a bit ugly. But let's chat and see what you think!

Description:
STUDENT RENTAL: 1-bedroom self-contained furnished basement suite (for one person only).

- The suite comes semi-furnished with a twin bed with dresser drawers, separate dresser; dining room table and chairs; electric fireplace, futon couch, side tables and mounted flatscreen TV

- Access to backyard. Parking available.

Available September 2025 until the end of April 2026 - as our son needs the suite when he is home from University.

Property Title: Private fully furnished suite in Coldstream
Description:
Sorry no short term rentals. For students, we are looking for a rental to at least spring 2023. 

This suite is fully furnished and equipped in a modern (newly built) home, so suite has: private access, patio, kitchen, washer/dryer along with WIFI/high speed internet, big screen TV  and PVR  (55" with numerous channels) all INCLUDED in the rent.  Suite specific heat/AC controls along with underfloor heating provides private and customizable controls for YOUR  comfort. 

You'll see that this is equipped and furnished better than average.  We have also decided due to limited space to provide "induction" cooking (hotplate) along with air fryer/toaster oven, microwave, crock pot, steamer and sandwich grill rather than stove. Suite has NEW full size fridge and dishwasher.  We also provide washer/dryer and ironing board.  

Though we will provide plenty of privacy, we live on site.  We will show respect and consideration, and expect the same in return.  We want this to be a pleasant environment for you.

Michelle and Larry

Property Title: Bedroom in luxury harbour-front 3rd floor condo for one respectful adult (from Jan '24)
Description:
We're retired, LGBTQ-friendly, empty-nesters offering our 2nd bedroom, furnished, for use by a quiet, respectful adult female.
Halifax harbour can be seen from the room, which is carpeted and comes with a double-bed, small desk and large 4-drawer dresser. You will have access to a full bathroom (which is only shared with visitors, not us, as we have an en suite).
You will have shared use of a large kitchen, dining room, living room and balcony, plus the building's gym and bicycle parking.
Please do not apply until you have a current headshot - all headless applicants will be deleted!

[Note 1: parking is very limited, but a bus stop is 3mins away, and the ferry is 6mins' walk away]
[Note 2: it is a small room and it comes furnished. We *could* remove the desk, but not the bed or dresser - we have nowhere else to put them.]
[Note 3: we are often away, so it is essential the renter is very responsible. References *will* be required.]

Description:
Hello! Welcome to our home!

Your home will be a full private 1bdrm suite with kitchen and laundry.  Furnished with bed, desk, dresser, couch, TV, kitchen table etc. 
Students are required to clean and maintain the space regularly. 
Students will be required to provide proof of registration at school.
Suite is not available in July and August for family use.
I live upstairs with my two sons (one going to UBCO in September!) And the other starting grade 10.
We have two pugs and a cat. You have access to the backyard and a small private patio for yourself.  
We are two houses away from the #8bus which is an 8min ride to the UBCO exchange.

There is currently 1 double bed but if two friends wish to share then I'll put two single beds in the room.  Both need to be registered students.  If two students are sharing, rent will be $100 more.

Property Title: Seasonal New Townhome - Monthly
Description:
Flexible Lease - Sept/Oct - April/May 2024

Welcome to Spland Townhomes!
Unit 22

West Kelowna’s newest and finest rental property! This brand new townhome is situated near the hillside of West Kelowna Estates and offers a comfortable three-level design with multiple balconies to take in the spectacular Okanagan backdrop. The townhome also features a double tandem garage, making it perfect for families and all your storage needs.

Conveniently located just west of highway 97, this townhome is just an 8-minute drive away from vibrant downtown Kelowna. You’ll have access to all the essential shopping, amenities, and some of the best wineries in the area.

This townhome offers a spacious floor plan on all 3 levels, tons of natural light and all new stainless steel appliances and upgraded furnishings throughout.

The property details are as follows:

– 3 Bedrooms
– 3 Bathrooms
– Den/flex room
- Includes WiFi and all utilities
- Double tandem attached garage
– Covered private balconies throughout
– Huge windows throughout
– Furnished

This rental property is managed by a licensed property manager, Meadow Gilbert with Associated Property Management, on behalf of the owners. To inquire about this rental property, please be sure to include your name, phone number, email address and a bit about yourself when responding to this ad.

Property Title: Cottage in the North End
Description:
Furnished room for rent with a quiet, self-employed, vegan woman, a snuggly, mellow cat, and one other roommate. There are two bedrooms available. I'm looking for one person per room, or a couple could rent both rooms and have the whole upstairs to themselves, with their own bathroom. 

This house has lots of character. One friend said it was like the set of Little Women. The spacious bedrooms have sloped ceilings and dormer windows. The flooring is the original wide-plank wood from 1869

I'm looking for someone quiet, eco-conscious, and on a vegetarian or plant-based diet. I'm a 'granola' person. I use natural cleaning products, and can't tolerate strong artificial fragrances. I burn incense occasionally, but it's not a necessity. 

There's a wood stove in the kitchen, which is nice and cozy in the winter, and there is electric heat in the rooms, but I prefer to heat with wood, so the ideal tenant has experience using a woodstove and prefers wood heat as well, understanding the labour that goes into it. (Splitting and stacking will already be done.) 

The room will have a bed, armchair and dresser, and other furniture is up for discussion. I could add a desk or table if you like. There are two rooms for rent, one with a Queen bed, and the other with a double. 

I've converted the living room of this house into my own bedroom and home office, so it is not shared, but there is a loveseat in front of the woodstove in the kitchen. This place isn't great for parties, but each bedroom has space for an armchair and/or desk, or maybe even a small loveseat. 

 I also have my own bathroom downstairs, so the upstairs bathroom will only be shared by upstairs tenants people. 

The kitchen has everything you'll need to make a gourmet meal - cast iron pans, vitamix, food processor, Instant pot, aor fryer, etc. even a dehydrator. I don't cook often, but I love to share meals and I make a great sous-chef. 

There is a big backyard with a deck, and a fire pit. When the weather is good, I like hosting pizza parties outside. There's also a tiny house on a trailer in the backyard, and the resident shares the yard.

The $100 for utilities includes water, firewood, and internet. Electricity will be an additional fee based on usage and split among residents. Preference will be given to those with experience & enthusiasm for woodstoves.
Amenities: ['Street parking', 'Stove and oven', 'Fridge', 'Microwave', 'Fireplace', 'wifi', 'Fenced yard', 'Blow dryer', 'Kitchenware']
House Rules: ['No smoking', 'No shoes inside', "Policy on visitor's stay"]

Property Title: Basement studio with bathroom
Description: I've recently renovated my basement bedroom with a bathroom that will mostly be yours (we may use the downstairs bathroom in emergency situations but that's very rare). The bathroom has a shower but no tub. You will have your own entrance. The room is furnished with a new queen bed, side table, small dresser, small counter top height table, 2 stools, and a small cart which holds a microwave. I will also be putting in a mini fridge and a room divider. The laundry machines are in the basement which can be a bit loud but we can coordinate so that we are doing laundry during a time that's manageable for you. We would be sharing a kitchen, which is upstairs. The basement has two electrical baseboards and it doesn't get too cold in the winter. I live here with my 8-year-old son, who is here every other week. I also have a partner with two kids (10 and 12), who are frequently here. I work from home mostly so am here during the day. On the off weeks when I don't have my son, I am often away in the evenings.

Property Title: Bedroom A in an independent LEGAL 2 Bedrooms Suite, 1,200 Sqft (110 Sqm), Fully Furnished, All Included, Available now!
Description:
First month rent is discounted by $250 CAD per room!
You may rent bedroom A, B, or both of the berooms of the private suite with separate enterance, kitchen, and bathroom which will be only avaiable to UBCO students. If you rent the whole suite, you may select your suite-mate with the approval of the landlord. Otherwise, your suite-mate will be matched by the owner's discretion depending on the market availability.
Fully furnished 110 square meters (1200 square feet) two-bedrooms LEGAL suite in an upscale and quiet Quail Ridge neighborhood near UBCO, golf course, and airport village retail shops is available for two UBCO students Sep. 1, 2023 or sooner. Everything is covered with your monthly rent including hot water, electricity, WIFI, bi-monthly cleaning, designated one/two parking spots on the driveway, and all the necessary household amenities. Just bring your personal clothing and your school items, because everything else is provided. 
The location is approximately five minutes’ drive to UBCO and one km distance from the bus route number 13 Quail Ridge.
The following are the restrictions with the rental suite:
Maximum residency is for two students.
No subletting is allowed without the landlord's permission.
No pets are permitted in the suite unless authorized by the landlord.
In keeping with the character of the neighborhood, smoking of any kind, vaping, drugs, parties are not allowed on the property.
The monthly rent for each bedroom in the suite is:
Bedroom A: $1,175 CAD
Bedroom B: $1,075 CAD
Please refer to the attached pictures. Videos are available upon request.
Interested applicants may text at 604-828-6349.
Your student enrollment verification and a reference letter through UBCO are highly appreciated.

Property Title: Charming Lrg BdRm, Ensuite, Desk, Lake Views, Patio, Parking
Description:
greetings potential renter,

our home is located in lake country, bc, just steps to lake okanagan. our home is an average 12 minute drive to the Kelowna International Airport, and 14 minutes to UBCO. Please note: there is no bus service from our community. Renters must have a vehicle. we have two parking spots - on our driveway and in the garage. rent includes utilities and wifi/internet access.

this is a beautiful and quiet neighborhood. we prefer to rent to persons who are quiet, non-smokers, do not have pets, are clean and respectful of others. Our lovely home is available from December 2023 to May 31, 2024. June might be available.

our spacious bedrooms are fully furnished, each with a desk and chair, each with a private bathroom, and each with beautiful views of lake okanagan. walking distance to the lake with a public beach and swimming area is about 6 minutes.

we ask that you do not smoke, do not play loud music (quiet time is 10 pm to 7:30 am), and our apologies, no four legged friends allowed on the premises.

we hope you will be comfortable here. feel free to call and discuss. we look forward to meeting you.

Property Title: Bright and Comfortable Furnished Private Room in Newly Renovated Shared Home
Description:
Rental period is October 1 2023 - May 31, 2024 with a possibility of extending tenancy at that time. 

We are looking for a 3rd female to join 2 other friendly and easy going flatmates. A good fit will be someone who has experience in living with others and is able to communicate and problem solve well.  The space is  ideal for a mature student or working professional. It is a peaceful home intended to be a place you can feel comfortable and as such it’s not a party house.  We are looking for someone who will treat the space and others in it with kindness and respect.  I have good references with with current and past tenants and ask that anyone applying can provide good work and rental references as well.  

RENT INCLUDES:
*all utilities 
*internet
*cable TV
*private parking
* storage for bike/ paddleboard/ski/snowbaord/golf
*furnished room and common spaces
*newer appliances
*laundry
*bi-weekly house cleaning
*central heating and air conditioning
*keyless entry
*security surveillance 
*some storage space apart from your room if needed
*hot tub (use is based on contributing to maintenance)

The home is in a central location on Patterson Ave, 3 blocks from the beach, walking distance to shops, groceries, restaurants, KGH hospital and OK College.  We are located 5 minutes from downtown, 20 minutes from UBC-O and right beside the Ethel Street bicycle corridor and public transit. There is a private and peaceful outdoor patio space and yard to enjoy.

If the home and living situation appeals to you and if you think you might be a good fit, you can PM me the application form or PM me and I can send your the form directly.  I look forward to learning a bit more about you. 

Half a months rent is required as a damage deposit and to secure the rental once application is accepted. No pets/smoking/vaping. Cheers

Property Title: Bedroom 1 of a 2 Bedroom Modern Suite: Fully Furnished, Transit-Adjacent Convenience
Description:
RETREAT FOR RELAXATION AND RENEWAL
Indulge in our thoughtfully designed 2-bedroom suite, a serene sanctuary for rejuvenation. Abundant natural light permeates each room, fostering an atmosphere of relaxation. Outside, the adjacent regional park and Okanagan Lake and Valley views provide a tranquil backdrop for your retreat.

Suite Highlights: 
• Private entrance with keyless security, enhancing convenience and safety. 
• Stylishly functional kitchen with stainless steel appliances. 
• Cozy living room with TV, alongside an inviting dining area. 
• Full-size bathroom with tub and shower for ultimate comfort. 
• Thoughtfully designed bedrooms with queen-size beds, desks, and amenities. • Impeccable details from bedding to towels for a seamless stay.
 • Private patio with comfortable seating and BBQ for natural relaxation. 
• Fully move-in ready, inviting personalization. 
• Built-in vacuum, central heating, and cooling, with supplemental radiant heating. 
• Prominently displayed fire evacuation plans for safety.
•The rent covers all utilities, including Wi-Fi.

Convenient Access: 
• Effortless Connectivity: Just a 7-minute walk to public transportation, seamlessly linking to Westbank and Kelowna's attractions—shopping, entertainment, and amenities. 
Urban Proximity: Positioned 4 km from downtown Westbank and 17 km from downtown Kelowna, this suite integrates urban accessibility. 
• Campus & Academic Advantage: Only 21 km from Okanagan College, Kelowna Campus, and 29 km from University of British Columbia, Kelowna Campus—ideal for students, ensuring campus access and an unhindered academic journey.

Exploring the Surroundings: 
• A quick 15-minute bus ride takes you to Westbank's vibrant shopping district. 
• Central Okanagan's natural allure beckons, offering water sports, parks, hiking trails, and winter sports.

Prioritizing Well-Being: 
• Adjacent fitness facilities emphasize holistic well-being, seamlessly upholding your health during your stay.

Property Title: Bedroom 2 of a 2 Bedroom Modern Suite: Fully Furnished, Transit-Adjacent Convenience
Description:
RETREAT FOR RELAXATION AND RENEWAL
Indulge in our thoughtfully designed 2-bedroom suite, a serene sanctuary for rejuvenation. Abundant natural light permeates each room, fostering an atmosphere of relaxation. Outside, the adjacent regional park and Okanagan Lake and Valley views provide a tranquil backdrop for your retreat.

Suite Highlights: 
• Private entrance with keyless security, enhancing convenience and safety. 
• Stylishly functional kitchen with stainless steel appliances. 
• Cozy living room with TV, alongside an inviting dining area. 
• Full-size bathroom with tub and shower for ultimate comfort. 
• Thoughtfully designed bedrooms with queen-size beds, desks, and amenities. • Impeccable details from bedding to towels for a seamless stay.
 • Private patio with comfortable seating and BBQ for natural relaxation. 
• Fully move-in ready, inviting personalization. 
• Built-in vacuum, central heating, and cooling, with supplemental radiant heating. 
• Prominently displayed fire evacuation plans for safety.
•The rent covers all utilities, including Wi-Fi.

Convenient Access: 
• Effortless Connectivity: Just a 7-minute walk to public transportation, seamlessly linking to Westbank and Kelowna's attractions—shopping, entertainment, and amenities. 
Urban Proximity: Positioned 4 km from downtown Westbank and 17 km from downtown Kelowna, this suite integrates urban accessibility. 
• Campus & Academic Advantage: Only 21 km from Okanagan College, Kelowna Campus, and 29 km from University of British Columbia, Kelowna Campus—ideal for students, ensuring campus access and an unhindered academic journey.

Exploring the Surroundings: 
• A quick 15-minute bus ride takes you to Westbank's vibrant shopping district. 
• Central Okanagan's natural allure beckons, offering water sports, parks, hiking trails, and winter sports.

Prioritizing Well-Being: 
• Adjacent fitness facilities emphasize holistic well-being, seamlessly upholding your health during your stay.

Property Title: CONVENIENT LIVING: YOUR IDEAL 2-BEDROOM RETREAT
Description:
CONVENIENT LIVING: YOUR IDEAL 2-BEDROOM RETREAT

Nestled at the end of a tranquil cul-de-sac, our meticulously crafted 2-bedroom suite provides an ideal haven for professionals, couples, or two students seeking a fully equipped solution for their accommodation needs. Designed to offer convenience and tranquility, this space is bathed in natural light, creating an atmosphere of serenity in every corner. The large windows in each room ensure a well-lit interior, while the private patio offers picturesque views of the neighboring park and the serene Okanagan Lake and Valley—an idyllic backdrop for your retreat.

Suite Highlights:
•	Private Entrance: Keyless access ensures security and convenience.
•	Modern Kitchen: Stylish stainless-steel appliances combine form and function. All kitchenware is included.
•	Cozy Living: Unwind in the comfortable living space, complemented by a charming dining area.
•	Comfort Unleashed: Luxuriate in the full-size bathroom's tub and shower.
•	Thoughtful Bedrooms: Carefully curated rooms feature queen-size beds, work desks and chairs, and essential amenities.
•	Impeccable Details: Meticulously chosen bedding and towels ensure a seamless stay.
•	Your Outdoor Oasis: The private patio, equipped with seating and a BBQ, invites natural relaxation and offers lovely views of the regional park, mountain, and Okanagan Lake.
•	Your Personal Touch: Move in ready and prepared to embrace your individuality.
•	Convenience & Comfort: Built-in vacuum, central heating, cooling, plus radiant heating.
•	Safety Emphasis: Fire evacuation plans in bedrooms and common areas prioritize security.
•	Parking Convenience: Enjoy both off-road and street parking for added ease.

Effortless Access:
•	Seamless Connectivity: A 7-minute walk to public transport for Westbank and Kelowna attractions.
•	Urban Proximity: 4 km from downtown Westbank, 17 km from Kelowna—accessible yet tranquil.
•	Ideal for Students: 21 km to Okanagan College, 29 km to UBC Kelowna, plus nearby schools.

Exploring Nearby:
•	Retail Convenience: A short bus ride to vibrant Westbank shopping.
•	Embrace Nature's Beauty: Central Okanagan comes alive through its parks, trails, and winter activities.

Promoting Well-Being:
•	Fitness Right Here: Adjacent facilities cater to your well-being, including winter sports and more.

Property Title: Master bedroom with on-suite. Large closet.
Description:
The room is fully furnished. Plenty of space for storing your items. Roku tv in the room. There is a desk. In suite laundry. 

Facility has a gym on the property. On direct frequent bus routes. Located downtown. Close to hiking at Knox. Plenty of time at many beaches to choose from with in a few blocks distance. Cycling routes convenient around town. A parking pass with a monthly fee can be arranged if needed. 

6 months or longer is preferred for a term. It is a legal occupancy I would be offering. My Property Manager has a screening process required for approval. It is an application form which will result in a credit and background check. References required. 

There is a very sweet cat in the suite. She has a strict diet requirement so it is imperative to not feed her treats . She has been a costly one for vets due to the slightest change in diet. This is something very important to understand a strict boundary on. You can cuddle her all you want though if you'd like :) She is well behaved. I keep her litter tidy and cleaned daily. Scrubbed down every few days. 

I am up early for my routine before an early start at my job. I have a fixed schedule. I mostly just snack after work so I'm not cooking often week nights. My cooking I keep for meal prep and my days off. 

a few days a week, I work out from home. You have permission to use my stuff I have in the suite. All I ask is put it back where you found it. There is a gym that has hours available. week days 6:30 am to 9 pm- weekends 9 to 9.

The house is kept tidy and clean. There is a dish washer. I expect an occupant to have same cleanliness preferences as myself. Im sure if you're not tidy, being nagged sucks. And as someone who is more tidy, I'm sure know its a pain to nag. With that said, its a fit or its not. If you know its not, please save the headache and pass on this occupancy.  

Now that I have mentioned the order I keep the place, I ask some help be done time to time. Such  to sweep up after cooking or wipe up a spill. Keeping dishes rinsed and put in the dishwasher when done. If notice something is low, make a note or replace it. Garbage full? take it out. Notice the soaps down? grab one on the way home. The usual house keeping things. I clean daily so chances you'll have more than yourself to tidy after is slim. I ask for the same courtesy in return.

Property Title: Clean and fully furnished bedroom - Central Kelowna
Description:
We have a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment on the 2nd floor with access to gym in the building. Your room has floor to ceiling windows with a great view, fully equipped with a very comfortable queen bed, night stand, floor lamp, oscillating tower fan(incase you need the white noise to sleep or run hot), dresser and double sliding mirror closet. There is 3 piece bathtub bathroom with door access from your bedroom and the entrance foyer. The bathroom is primarily yours but may be used for guests on rare occasions. A desk with a monitor and hdmi hook-up, 55" smart tv is also set up in your room for entertainment and studying needs. The room gets a lot of light from the windows and has a very bright cozy feel to it. Fresh towels, bedding and toiletries are available for you to use. We like to shop at Costco and tend to have excess. 

The condo is open concept with central AC/heater, fast speed internet, cable, big screen smart TV in the livingroom, oversized sectional, laminate flooring, giant floor to ceiling windows, in-suite washer and dryer, upgraded modern kitchen, dining room, and a massive deck with gas BBQ and patio seating. Kitchen is fully stocked with spices and condiments that you are welcome to use. Keurig machine is also available, so you're welcome to caffeinate yourself as much as you'd like. 

We are located in central Kelowna, within walking distance to malls, shops, coffee shops, grocery stores, parks, Recreation centre and restaurants. We are less than 10 minutes away from Okanagan College by car or 15-20minutes by bus. We do have a parking garage for visitors that you are welcome to park at but otherwise, there is plenty of street parking. 

We have made effort in making your room and the the home feel like a home that is cozy, clean and organized. We are quiet working professionals that put a lot of value in trust and respect and wish to find the same with you. As mentioned, we have 2 non-shedding hypo allergenic dogs that are friendly and will always want to greet you, so you must be someone who likes the company of dogs. Your room of course will be off limits to them unless you invite them in. 

Open to discussing price if you are a student or working professional. Thank you for considering our place as your home away from home and look forward to hearing from you.

Property Title: Room in Bridlewood SW
Description:
Hi there,
As a host family, we can learn about different cultures & traditions & get a personal insight into the world beyond their backyards, and even become excellent international cooks. Also, we can share our knowledge & experiences to get to know in deep about another country. Living with a student from another culture is an education in itself. The room has a desk, light, closet, mirror, and bed. Feel free to use our kitchen and call our home your own! We are located in Bridlewood SW very close to the Shawnessy Shopping Centre. It has gyms, libraries, and various different stores.

Property Title: Bayside Cottage, fully renovated
Description:
This cottage features a full open living concept allowing the views to expand throughout. 
The Cottage is 2 bedrooms with 2 full bathrooms. Rental is for entire cottage.
The kitchen has all of the creature comforts that you would expect and so much more and has a wonderful seating area to enjoy. The living room is cozy and comfortable with all of the reclining seating you desire. This is the perfect place to cozy up and relax next to the fireplace with a good book! Movie night anyone? We have provided a 50" 4K Smart TV in the living room with Netflix and Amazon Prime Video included!
This fully renovated cottage boasts 2 full en suite bedrooms with attached bathrooms for your convenience. The downstairs bedroom with en suite bathroom features a queen size bed, dresser, 32" Smart TV, and luggage rack. In the downstairs bathroom you will find a beautifully designed soaker tub that features water views, freestanding tub faucet, custom chandeliers, nautical vessel sink and more. This is truly a space you can kick back, dim the lights, enjoy a soak and listen to your favorite playlist on the amazon echo smart switch provided, just say, "Alexa, play ________" and enjoy!
The upstairs suite is truly something to behold, this room features a fully adjustable king size bed with both sides being fully independently adjustable for your comfort to be able to raise your head/feet, massage and more! From the bed you can look out of the skylights and take in the expanding views across the bay and see the mouth of the Atlantic Ocean. The sunrises through the skylights are truly special and not to be missed! In addition to watching the lobster boats from the skylights we also have provided a 32" Smart TV so you can kick back and relax after a long day of adventures! For your convenience, there is also a dedicated workspace if you work remotely etc... so you can take in the views and enjoy! The upstairs en suite bathroom also features a step in shower, and a closet for your items you would like to hang.

Property Title: Lovely, bright, clean room in Artist's home
Description:
***We are two artists with studios / offices and bedroom located in the lower level of our 5 bedroom bi-level.

On our upper level of the house we rent 3 bedrooms . One bedroom is currently available for rent to a clean, quiet and courteous individual.***

In our home we enjoy renting rooms to a wide range of tenants.  We promote a positive, supportive atmosphere and an eco friendly, healthy, active, musical and artistic lifestyle.

Your bedroom is located on the main level. The kitchen, bathroom, dining room and living room are all open shared spaces. The laundry room is located on the lower level. Our home has hardwood flooring throughout. Outdoors we have bountiful flower and vegetable gardens.

The centrally located community of Lakeview is one of Calgary's most sought after communities in which to live providing easy access to north, south, east and west parts of the city. The bus stop is at the end of the street and it takes you to a hub which has access to the whole city. Mount Royal University is a 15 - 20 minute walk from our house. The beautiful, multi-use, North Glenmore Park, (skating, canoeing, rowing, BBQ & picnicking, sailing, kayaking, roller blading, biking, walking, x-country skiing, hiking, snowshoeing) and Golf Course are a 15 minute walk from our door. IGA, coffee shop, liquor store, Mac's, bakery, barbers, hair dressers, Bella Roma Restaurant and Bar, flower shop and bank are a 15 minute walk or 5 minute bus ride away.

***** Come live with us. You will be glad you did. *****

Please email me at susan.e.beanland@gmail.com or text / phone my cell # 403-669-8648 to set up an interview date. Look forward to getting to know you.

Property Title: Stylish Cozy Condo near transit & Grocery
Description:
We have a cozy 2 bedroom condo and like to host international people. We've been hosting since 2017 and have hosted over 20 people. We enjoy providing a safe and comfortable space for you to experience where we live. 

WORK: We own a new business that is a bakery so we both work up to 7 days a week. Greg works through the night and is home during the day and I work during the day and am home at night so there's almost always someone at home. 

PET: We have a small friendly dog named Simon. 

WE LIKE QUIET: We like to keep the space clean and quiet. Greg goes to bed in the early afternoon. We listen to music occasionally but watch TV when we are home in the living room. 

KITCHEN: We will share the kitchen and will provide you with space in the fridge and pantry for your foods. You will feed yourself and cook for yourself. You will clean your own dishes after every meal. And ensure you leave the kitchen clean behind you. 

BATHROOM: We have our own bathroom that we use to shower but the second bathroom will be your bathroom and we may use it occasionally. You will keep it clean daily. 

CLEANING: You will clean the spaces you use regularly and we will do the same.

Property Title: Upstairs Room+ Private Bathroom in Bungalow House Near Lake
Description:
Fully furnished room (15.5' long x 9' wide) for 1 person (no more than 1) with remote controlled mattress with adjustable head height position and foot height position. Full size (54"x75") mattress on bed (Zedbed brand) in upper level floor of 2 level bungalow home. Lots of sunlight from window. Internet service provided by Bell Aliant which provides the most dependable internet service in the area. Oreck XL Professional air purifier available for use if desired. Roku Sanyo Smart TV in room to stream cable channels for movies, news sports etc. Wooden deck and large yard in back.
Available  month to month. Monthly rent is due the last business day of the previous month by bank electronic transfer. Damage deposit of $100 required at the start which will be refunded at end if there is no damage to the premises. Weekly rate is $450 with a refundable $75 damage deposit due at start of week.Daily rate is $80/day. Free driveway parking for 1 vehicle. Located in a subdivision 7 minutes from the Bayers Lake shopping area. Public access multi-use greenbelt scenic trail (Google "BLT trail Lakeside" for information and YouTube video of trail). Large public access natural lake (Governor Lake) approx. 1 km long also minutes away with public access for swimming, fishing, canoeing etc.. Golf course + commercial facility offering outdoor/indoor recreational programs (yoga, biking etc.) 10 minutes away by car. Look up " the links at Brunello" for details. Emera Oval in Halifax is within a 30 minutes drive away. Free public use of the facility for in-line skating, biking etc. Look up on-line for more details.
Half hour drive to Dalhousie University.
Private bathroom with shower, bathtub, sink and toilet on lower level. Home shared with male owner . This is a very quiet home in a quiet neighbourhood.
Gas generator hooked up to power essential circuits in home so there will be a working microwave plus heat and lights in the home should there be a power outage or after any power disruption.
Shared kitchen. All kitchen appliances and cookware are shared including Instant pot electric pressure cooker, TFal Actifry air fryer, Cuisinart slow cooker and bread maker, Rival electric food steam cooker etc.. Ceramic top oven, built in dishwasher, Panasonic 1200 watt Genius Inverter microwave, convection toaster oven, blender etc. Kitchen fully equipped with all cookware, plates, etc. No need to bring extra furniture or bulky items.
Bus stop 2 minutes away with service to downtown Halifax.
No pets. Renter must agree to terms of keeping bathroom surfaces dry, free of fallen hair and hygienic. Must keep kitchen clean after use. Will not rent to renter who does not keep bathroom and living areas clean and hygienic.
Proof of double vaccine plus boosters required before moving in. Owner has proof of all vaccines including boosters.
Must be non smoker. Must not overindulge with alcohol.
No overnight guests or visitors. Trying to minimize the risk of potential COVID exposure as owner is a senior.
A criminal check document from a local police or RCMP required. The application form takes less than 10 minutes to complete in person or on-line and usually takes 3 business days to process. Cost will be deducted from rent. Owner has had one done on himself which can be shown.  Also proof of full time employment or proof of enrolment as a full time student required and references from employer or previous landlord required. Rent includes heat, water, Bell Fibre Optic High Speed WiFi and electricity.
Must be finished with kitchen by 11:30 pm Mon.-Thurs. and Sun, and by 1 am Fri. and Sat.. There should be no noise to disturb sleep between midnight to 6 am Mon.-Thurs. and Sun, and between 1:00 am-8 am Fri. and Sat.

Property Title: Spacious room in North End Halifax
Description:
Furnished room for rent with a quiet, self-employed, plant-based woman, a snuggly, mellow cat, and one other roommate. 

This house has lots of character. One friend said it was like the set of Little Women. The spacious bedrooms have sloped ceilings and dormer windows. The flooring is the original wide-plank wood from 1869

I'm looking for someone quiet, eco-conscious, and on a vegetarian or plant-based diet. I'm a 'granola' person. I use natural cleaning products, and can't tolerate strong artificial fragrances. I burn incense occasionally, but it's not a necessity. 

There's a wood stove in the kitchen, which is nice and cozy in the winter, and there is electric heat in the rooms, but I prefer to heat with wood, so the ideal tenant has experience using a woodstove and prefers wood heat as well, understanding the labour that goes into it. (Splitting and stacking will already be done.) 

The room will have a bed, armchair and dresser, and other furniture is up for discussion. I could add a desk or table if you like. This room has a Queen bed.

I've converted the living room of this house into my own bedroom and home office, so it is not shared, but there is a loveseat in front of the woodstove in the kitchen. This place isn't great for parties, but each bedroom has space for an armchair and/or desk, or maybe even a small loveseat. 

 I also have my own bathroom downstairs, so the upstairs bathroom will only be shared by upstairs tenants people. 

The kitchen has everything you'll need to make a gourmet meal - cast iron pans, vitamix, food processor, Instant pot, aor fryer, etc. even a dehydrator. I don't cook often, but I love to share meals and I make a great sous-chef. 

There is a big backyard with a deck, and a fire pit. When the weather is good, I like hosting pizza parties outside. There's also a tiny house on a trailer in the backyard, and the resident shares the yard.

The $100 for utilities includes water, firewood, and internet. Electricity will be an additional fee based on usage and split among residents. Preference will be given to those with experience & enthusiasm for woodstoves.

Property Title: Co-Living: Beautifully decorated primary bedroom with Queen bed
Description:
This home is not owner occupied and all  3 rooms are available for rent.
Note:  This home is a two story home and not suitable for anyone with mobility issues. 
Located directly across from Penticton Community Centre, Cascades Casino and Penticton Trade Centre. This home is a short walk to Okanagan College, Lake Okanagan and downtown with a bus stop located right at the front of this home.
Recently renovated and beautifully decorated in beach theme this home is fully furnished with stainless steel applicances in the kitchen including a dishwasher.  The kitchen is fully equipped. There is a shared full bathroom on the second floor and a shared 1/2 bath on the main floor. 
The front yard includes a barbeque grill and a sitting area around a firepit.
Cleaning every two weeks for the common areas of this home is included in the rent.

Property Title: Walk out Suite Queen Bed and Double Closet Bedroom
Description:
Welcome to our fully furnished, legal, 2 bedroom walkout suite at 11142 A.  My husband (Jasper) and I (Melissa) occupy the 3 bed, 2 bath upstairs of this generational home.  Built in 1991, this home was built by my parents after acquiring it from my maternal grandfather.  We completely renovated and turned our basement into a lovely 2 bedroom and 1 bath suite.  Renovations were completed end of Nov 2023.  

The two bed suite will share the same kitchen, laundry, bathroom and common space.  The bedrooms would be your own private space.  The suite boasts of a lovely urban view from the kitchen, living room and queen bedroom and lots of natural light.  The suite also has it's own private walk out entrance with coded door (no need to worry about keys).

We are about a 10-15 min walk from a park and beach, tennis courts and rail trail.  It is also less than a 5 min walk to a bus stop that can take you into Lake Country as well as UBCO.  You can transfer from UBCO to get to Kelowna area.  It is about a 15 min drive to UBCO by car.

A little bit more about my husband and I.  We got married in March of 2020 and are an active, boisterous and vivacious couple.  Though we have good sound proofing in the home, you may hear us laughing together, singing or dancing.  We live life and enjoy our community and friends.  If you are up for it, we would have you in our space for dinner or games night on occasion.  My husband is a hard working, honest, straight shooting kind of guy who loves working on meat smoking projects and cooking.  He works in the construction industry and usually is working hard Mon to Fri.  I'm generally a smiley, energetic and busy human.  I have my own contracting business teaching first aid, lifeguarding and swim courses.  My schedule varies depending on season.  My husband and I love dancing, games, hiking, outdoors, good shows and time with our community.  We hope you feel welcome and safe in our home.
Amenities: ['Street parking', 'Stove and oven', 'Fridge', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Washer', 'Dryer', 'wifi', 'Tv', 'Window covering', 'Private entry', 'Kitchenware']
House Rules: ['No smoking', 'Quiet hours', 'No shoes inside', 'Keep spaces clean', "Policy on visitor's stay"]

Property Title: 3-beds free in lakeview house; Jan-Apr in Dartmouth, near transit & highways
Description:
Short-term, semi-furnished, pet friendly, 4BR/1 bath single detached lake house in Dartmouth available January 1st to April 30th. One bedroom is occupied by the owners, and the other 3 rooms are available to rent. *Rent is charged per room*. Located on picturesque Albro Lake with convenient walking and bike trails nearby, it’s situated just 10 mins from downtown Dartmouth and 15 mins from downtown Halifax while being tucked away on a quiet residential street. In terms of universities the house is ideally located for students just 10-15 mins from three NSCC campus locations, 10 mins from MSVU, 20 mins from SMU and Dal during the winter semester months. There is a bus stop across the street with access to numerous bus routes within walking distance.

All 3 bedrooms have a closet and 1 bedroom comes furnished with a queen-sized bed. Air mattress available in 2nd room. No bed in third room, though arrangements could be made for a futon to be added. One dresser, a few chairs and nighstand tables available between the rooms. Folding table available for use as a desk. The living room is furnished with a large sectional couch and a wall mounted television and speaker system. The kitchen is furnished with a shelving unit & cabinets, table and chairs, fridge, stove/oven, microwave. The back deck faces out onto the lake for gorgeous sunrise views, and includes a picnic table & BBQ (propane excluded).

The house is heated with centrally controlled oil furnace baseboards, as well as heat pumps located in the living room and main bedroom. Washing machine and dryer located in the basement (no coins required). There are 2 driveways with space for 3 cars at no additional cost for parking. Winter snow property maintenance to be responsibility of tenants, however shovels and salt will be provided. Cats and dogs are permitted with pre-approval from landlord. Queer owned and LGBTQIA2S+ friendly.

Property Title: Charming 1960s Bungalow Rental in Quiet NE Community: Perfect for a fun and outgoing roomie!
Description:
Description:

Welcome to your new cozy haven in the heart of a serene NE community! Nestled in a charming 1960s bungalow, this space is tailor-made for a person in their 20-40s who appreciate the balance between lively social gatherings and peaceful, Netflix-filled evenings.

About Us:
We're the ideal mix of outgoing and laid-back, striking that perfect harmony between hosting lively board game nights and enjoying tranquil nights in. Our spacious backyard provides the ideal backdrop for entertaining friends and occasional gatherings. You'll find us binging on Netflix TV shows and diving into video games during our downtime.

Our Home:
Our lovingly maintained bungalow offers a warm and inviting atmosphere. With a beautiful park just steps away, you can enjoy leisurely strolls or picnics whenever the mood strikes. But that's not all – we share our space with two goofy dogs and two cats that are convinced they're dogs, adding extra charm to our home.

Features:
Spacious backyard for entertaining and relaxation
Proximity to a lovely park for outdoor enjoyment
Ideal for hosting board game nights and gatherings
Netflix and video game enthusiasts' paradise
Pet-friendly environment for animal lovers

Your Space: 
The Master bedroom - fully furnished / decorated
The room contains a queen sized murphy bed that folds up into a desk space. There is an antique couch as well as a TV / tv stand, lamp, plants and decor. Bedding is provided, but you are encouraged to bring your own. There is no closet, only a single small cabinet so a dresser or portable clothing organizer would be recommended. 

If you're seeking a home that embodies the perfect blend of social engagement and cozy retreat, our home is the answer. Open to short term rentals.

Property Title: Cozy Log House
Description:
Welcome to our charming log house! Originally built in 1935, it has been fully renovated while keeping all of its original charms. We've also invested in design elements so that it feels like your home away from home. Cozy up in our reading nook to enjoy beautiful views of the valley, share family dinners in an open-concept kitchen and dining area, or watch your favourite movies toasting your toes in front of the gas fireplace! 

This charming log house comfortably sleeps 6 (queen beds in both bedrooms and a queen pullout in the living room). Our bedrooms offer comfortable beds with quality linens and our bathrooms are stocked with local and organic products to allow you to pamper yourself during your stay with us. The Master has its own ensuite and walk-in closet. 

You will find a fully equipped kitchen for all your culinary endeavors. There is a complimentary coffee/tea bar, snacks, condiments, oils and spices, and even chocolate chips for your morning pancakes!  You will find a rice cooker,  a hand mixer, a crockpot, pots and pans, and a variety of dishes in the cabinets. 

The living room is a perfect place to cuddle up for a movie or two in front of the fireplace. 

The sunroom features wall-to-wall windows keeping the entire house light and bright while offering amazing views and a dedicated workspace. It also offers a comfortable side entry to store boots and outerwear that also leads to the patio and BBQ area. 

This property is very private and gives you a lot of breathing room. There is a patio with a BBQ, dining table, leisure seating, and hammocks as well as a large green area to enjoy on the warmer days. 

Bordering with lush pastures on one side and having beautiful views of the valley and mountains on the other side,  this is the perfect place to relax, explore, and recharge your batteries. Adventure is calling!

Here to ski? Silver Star Mountain Resort is 35 minutes away.  Would like to snowshoe? Head to Ellison Provincial Park. Want to go for a nice walk along the water? The Okanagan Lake is only 3 minutes away!  Looking for a fancy dining night out?  You'll reach downtown Vernon in 7 minutes by car.

The space could also be ideal for a few-week stay for 2 or 3 travel nurses, as we are only 5 minutes away from Vernon Hospital.

Property Title: Master Bedroom Ensuite Bath & patio access with Lake view
Description:
ROOMMATES WANTED

I am seeking one or two like-hearted people to share a Peachland log home. The property has 6 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. I have two dogs (a 4 year old border colllie/lab x and a 2 year old majestic treehound, which is a coonhound/blood hound x). Any roommates would need to be OK with dogs. The property has a stunning lake view, two decks, an outdoor fire pit, interior wood burning stove, a hot tub, and an extensive library of metaphysical books. There is parking for one vehicle per person and the property is situated near a winery, forest hiking, Okanagan Lake, and bus routes. The private, fenced back yard needs some love and attention, but has established fruit trees and extensive garden opportunities. The backyard is surrounded by forest and offers privacy. 

I am a professional in my mid 40s that works partly from home and lives a peaceful, spiritual lifestyle. If you think this might be a fit for you please direct message me for more information. The ask would be $900 per month plus a share of utilities. Potentially less for someone willing to pitch in with gardening, yard work and/or home renovations. 

Although I would otherwise welcome people to have a dog or other pets, as I love animals, I have one dog that does not typically interact well with other animals that are in the home or on the property. I can provide references as to my character if requested.

Property Title: Great pet friendly home on 13,000sqft lot size
Description:
Newly built home in the Glenrosa neighbourhood. Quiet, and relaxing area. This is a 3bed 2bath rancher on 0.3acre lot size with fruit trees and huge yard. 
The house boasts a few D/W, Fridge, stove, washer. Dryer. A walk-in pantry. Newer furnace very efficient so less cost. The home also has central AC for the Okanagan scorching summers. 
The primary bedroom has a walk-in closet and 4pc ensuite bathroom. The two other rooms are decent size with shared 4pc bathroom. Comfortable dinning room area and livingroom with lots of natural light. 
The deck off the kitchen has views of vineyards and occasional lake view. The kitchen also has lots of cabinet and storage space. The laundry room/mudroom is all a must see!
Well behaved pets are welcome in the fully fenced in yard.

Property Title: Bright, beautiful Main Floor Bedroom/RecRoom/Wet Bar of Executive Townhouse – 1 Bdrm, 1 Bath, private walk-in entry – perfect for students, seniors, or young professionals
Description:
Developer's unit, main floor, beautiful & bright, UNFURNISHED (we do have a queen size bed in storage if you need to borrow it, just no other furniture)  - Perfect for a mature UBCO student or a young Professional! Owners live on the second floor. This 1-bedroom, 1 bath, main floor unit has a separate (locked door) ground floor private entry, and is fully-contained with wet bar (all appliances) and in-unit laundry. See photos. Microwave but no stove. Toaster oven. Perfect for quiet, mature individuals - and one minute walk away from transit routes on Glenmore Road - great location for UBCO students with or without a car.
It is also located on the Brandt Creek linear jogging/walking trail (right out your back door), with excellent connections to parks, buses, and nearby shopping center.
Family-friendly North Glenmore neighborhood.
Central vacuum and more; GREAT neighbors!
Four foot high storage crawl space access for storage below (owner’s share it).
On-street parking
Granite counter-tops, wood floors
Long term (min. 3 months) lease only.
No pets, no parties, no smoking
Available immediately
No short term rentals.
Utilities extra, shared with landlord who lives on 2nd floor; roughly $100/month as per below, but will adjust each year to ensure fairness.

Property Title: 1 bedroom condo downtown Kelowna
Description:
I do not live here, I am seeking renters. You will have this place to yourself. 

Gorgeous, brand new, modern, and fully furnished condo in the Brooklyn building located in the heart of downtown Kelowna. Walking distance to beaches, bars, restaurants, and shopping. 

Building offers a stunning roof-top patio with two full outdoor kitchens, BBQ, generous dining and lounge seating. Private rooms are available for booking. Community garden is also available on the 5th floor. 

- $2,400 + Utilities (No Move-In Fees)
- Available May 1 (earlier move-in may be available)
- 18th floor
- Spacious balcony with stunning panoramic mountain views
- Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances (Fridge/Freezer, Dishwasher, Stove/Range, Range Hood, Microwave)
- In-Suite Laundry (Washer/Dryer)
- Central Heating and AC, Smart WiFi-Enabled Thermostat 
- 1 Underground Secure Access Parking Spot (EV Charging Stations available, additional per use cost)
- Plenty Visitor Parking For Guests (Separate Indoor Secure Garage)
- Full Bathroom With Large Tub
- Laminate Flooring
- Pullout Queen-Size Sofa
- Furnishings as they appear in photos all included, fully equipped kitchen with small appliances, kitchen ware, dining ware, Smart TV. 
  
Open to medium- and long-term tenancies (3 months+). 

No smoking or vaping inside the unit or building property. Small pets may be permitted (additional deposit will apply). Tenant insurance is mandatory. Tenants must abide by strata bylaws. 

Please reach out via email with inquiries: kristina.mamina@outlook.com. Both Virtual and In-Person viewings are available.

Property Title: 3rd floor clean with 2 windows-sharing bath&washroom
Description:
My stepmother is a senior retired teacher. That’s why we prefer a female. The house is located downtown Toronto, near No Frills, community Center, YMCA gym,George Brown College, St Lawrence Market. the room is in the top floor. One room for my stepmother and another for a potential female student. the bath & washroom are in the same floor between the two bedrooms. 
**The kitchen is in the 2nd floor & a living room. 

**the house has FOUR CATS. you can bring only a cat with you.
***No dogs please. 
**No drugs
**no smoking in any kind
**no loud music
**no sleep over 
**no drinking alcohol /party inside (outside is your life).


**the senior lady, my stepmother, is a Buddhist by faith, &  is a retired professor. she prefers quiet & organized place. She is suffering from some old age health issues. so, we would like to have a compassionate, respectful, understanding and loving female to be around sometimes for some company for reduced rent. 


^^^I live downstair in the laundry room.  I have my washroom there as well. I used the shower upstairs. 

you can help with your time for reduced rent. this is not about $$ as much as it is about compassionate, respectful and understanding for seniors.  


^^*^*^ The rent is negotiable and adjustable in the long run for the right fit potential tenant.  depending on the tasks in the future and time spent for now what you can see listed.

Property Title: Summer sublet of bedroom in downtown Halifax
Description:
Hi! I'm going home for the summer at the end of April, and am looking to sublet my room. Our apartment is located right on the edge of downtown Halifax, a short distance from the Dalhousie Studley campus and an even shorter distance from Sexton. It's on the 22nd floor of the building, and offers a wonderful west-facing view of the city. It's a 3 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment, with all rooms being fully furnished. The bedroom itself is furnished as well, coming with a bed, end table, corner desk, and sizable closet, and even has a fantastic north-facing view in of itself (the only downside is that the blinds are rather cheap, but that can be sorted out if it's going to be a problem).

Anyone moving in will be living with 3 others roommates - 2 male and 1 female - and for anyone interested we can absolutely arrange a meeting before anything is set in stone to make sure there will be no problems. If you have any questions or are interested, feel free to reach out!

Property Title: Room w/private bath and large yard, 1 block from beach
Description: Large furnished bedroom (with full closet) and your own bathroom (with bathtub) in a shared home. Female homeowner and lovely medium sized dog as housemates. Large kitchen with ample storage and an additional mini-fridge has been added to kitchen for renter's exclusive use - a great home for those who like to cook. 3 minute walk to bus stop on Sunshine Coast highway (main bus route). Short drive/bus ride/bike ride to downtown Sechelt/hospital etc. 3 minute walk to one of the most beloved sandy beaches on the Sunshine Coast. Short walk to several shops, cafes, restaurants, and grocery store. Ground level (3 stairs to enter home, no stairs within). Quite neighbourhood. Access to several hiking trails nearby. A spare desk and office chair (currently in another room) can be added to the room if renter would like. A bicycle is available for use on request.

Property Title: Clean and Fully Furnished Bedroom in Glenmore..
Description:
We have a 4 storey, 3 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom townhouse. The 2 rooms available is located on the 3rd floor with a bathroom dedicated to that floor only.  A 2 piece bathroom located on the 2nd floor and a full bathroom located in the basement is also available for use. Both bedrooms has a great view of the mountains, fully equipped with a very comfortable queen bed, night stand, floor lamp, oscillating tower fan(incase you need the white noise to sleep or run hot), double door closets, and a 60” Smart TV and computer desk/chair for your convenience. 1 bedroom does have a dresser for extra storage. The room has a good size window to allow plenty of natural light and black out curtains are available if you need extra darkness for a deeper sleep. Fresh towels, bedding and toiletries are available for you to use. We like to shop at Costco and tend to have excess.

The townhouse is open concept with geothermal central AC/heater, fast speed internet, cable, big screen smart TV in the livingroom, oversized sectional, natural wood flooring, in-suite washer and dryer on the 3rd floor, upgraded modern kitchen, dining room, garage for extra storage that also has a separate standup freezer and fridge from the kitchen, pantry, and a deck with BBQ and patio seating. Kitchen is fully stocked with spices and condiments that you are welcome to use. Keurig machine is also available, so you're welcome to caffeinate yourself as much as you'd like.

We are located in the neighborhood of Glenmore in Kelowna, close to Knox Mountain trails. We are less than 10-15 minutes away from Okanagan College, 15-20 minutes away from the UBCO by car or public transit is available within 10-15 minutes by foot. There is free street parking a visitor parking available on a first come first serve basis. We have a garage incase you have a bike you would like to store. 

We have made an effort in making your room and the home feel like a home that is cozy, clean and organized. We are quiet working professionals that put a lot of value in trust and respect and wish to find the same with you. As mentioned, we have 2 non-shedding hypo allergenic dogs that are friendly and will always want to greet you, so you must be someone who likes the company of dogs. Your room of course will be off limits to them unless you invite them in.

Open to discussing price if you are a student or working professional. Thank you for considering our place as your home away from home and look forward to hearing from you.

Property Title: One bedroom in a 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom house
Description:
Hey y'all! We're looking for a super cool 3rd roommate for our beautiful house on Wellington St! Suuuper close to Dal, SMU, the IWK and there are grocery stores very close by.
Looking for a friendly, mature, queer friendly renter who can pass a credit check and doesn’t have allergies. We've got 2 cats and can't include any more animals :/
1300$ includes everything, all utilities except wifi
The house has a beautiful back yard, wooden and tile floors, 5 quite new appliances and most furnishings but you’ll have to furnish your own room - it does come with a closet! We've got air conditioning, heated floors, and a heated towel rack for showering on cold winter nights.
You’ll be subletting from me and you can sign month-to-month, or up to a 13-month contract (April 1st 2024 - April 30th 2025)
Prioritizing people who want to move in Apr 1!!
Reply to this ad and tell us about yourself, how long you’d want to rent for, and if you had to delete one type of colour, music, and food what you would get rid of?

Only two blocks from the beach and bus stops close to amenities like Costco, Walmart, Superstore and Save on Foods. Neck point park and the Linley Valley Park trails are moments away. This Rental is perfect for Mature Professionals educators, Doctors, Nurses, Master Students ,
 Retired Seniors , seeking a home feel with convenience and secure private immaculately clean accommodation's.
This is a highly sought after Kelowna location near all amenities in the lower mission creek area.
Situated in a nice quiet neighbourhood with a private courtyard and off street parking in front of rental unit.

Property Title: Large well appointed bedroom in ocean view home
Description: Your new ocean view home is  4000 square feet located on the north end of Nanaimo offering a downstairs suite with a kitchenette for light meal prep, two very large beautifully decorated bedrooms with king size beds and a cozy TV room. The suites’ kitchenette offers a fridge, microwave, hot plate, toaster/convection oven, pantry and a dining area in conjunction with shared use of the main upper kitchen if desired.  The suite has a private entrance, a shared bathroom with the second room mate, laundry, home gym and an outdoor hot tub area. Cable and Netflix are currently offered with an added bonus of your favorite streaming service as a welcome gift.  Only two blocks from the beach and bus stops close to amenities like Costco, Walmart, Superstore and Save on Foods. Neck point park and the Linley Valley Park trails are moments away. The university is a 15 minute car ride and a direct bus route to the University from the Woodgrove Mall.  Each room is single occupancy.
