Property Title: Room to rent in a 4 dog home, perfect for a dog loving student.
Description:
Single room, with home access, internet, laundry, parking etc included.  Tenant responsible for twin sheets,, comforter, towels and own laundry detergent.  Home is, 125 year old renovated home with hardwood floors,  dishwasher, laundry, 1.5 baths, and 4 dogs.  No smoking or pets.  Room is available for the summer months if anyone is doing their internship here in Bridgewater.  (It is rented out already for the school year.)  

The dogs are all rescues, they love people but will snuggle and want to play, so please don't expect your entrance and exit to go unnoticed.  They have a fully fenced yard to play in and I am sure they will try to entice you out on the deck in the sun for some rabble rousing.  They sleep with me door closed, but have access to the whole home while I work from here.  IF you love dogs you will be in heaven, if you aren't a dog person, its just not going to make you happy.

Home is a 2 minute walk to the NSCC Campus, YMCA Gym, a strip mall for the essential shopping.

Description:
$800.00 a month (everything (internet, utilities) included).
Central downtown Penticton Location

Possible cons:
There is no real storage and 1 flight of stairs to get up to the front door so if you bring a bike you will have to haul it up and down the stairs.
I will be working May - July but will most likely be back there living with my 1.5 year old baby in August. (SO YOU WILL BE LIVING WITH A BABY FOR A MONTH!) but she is delightful! 
 Because my baby and I live there, I would like to have people that are responsible and can keep the place extremely clean and tidy. Especially when we are back in August I will need the shared living spaces (kitchen, living room, bathrooms) super clean so it is safe for her to be in the space.

Property Title: Private Suite w 1 Bedroom, Livingroom, 1 Bath, Kitchen & Patio- NEAR OC
Description:
•• This private suite with separate entrance is suitable for only 1 individual. 
• • Available (minimum) between September 1st 2024-April 2025 .• •  (Possibility for 1st of August 2024)

PRIVATE SUITE WITH 1 BEDROOM, LIVING ROOM, 1 BATH, KITCHEN & PATIO NEAR OKANAGAN COLLEGE 

We’re offering a private, cozy, furnished 1 bedroom + living room basement suite with separate entrance and a patio, in the heart of prestigious South Pandosy/Lower Mission area, near Richter, Raymer and Osprey Park. 
- 10 minute walking distance to Okanagan College, 
- 15 min walking distance (4 min drive) to the hospital. 
- Close to all amenities that South Pandosy offers (Beaches, parks, Mission Park Shopping Centre, restaurants and coffee shops) as well as bus stops. 
- It’s in a safe, student and family oriented neighbourhood. 
Newly renovated kitchen has ample storage, over the range microwave, 2 burner ceramic cooktop,  air fry toaster oven, coffee machine, kettle, cutlery, full size refrigerator and a built in eating nook. In suite laundry with apartment size washer and dryer. The unit is furnished and fresh paint in every room. There’s a shoe-bench, coat hanger and a cubby with bins to store hats and mittens on the entry, as well as 2 bar stools in the kitchen;  a daybed and cushions, cabinet, large tv with Roku player, coffee table/ottoman, side table and a lamp in the living room and a single bed with drawers, side table, lamp and a dresser in the bedroom. Perfect for a student or a working professional. 
We’d like to rent it long term to a responsible individual that has a regular income and good references from previous landlords. We’re also open to 1 or 2 students (from September 2024 to April 2025 minimum). (*Please note, for the second student/person, the rent will be different; Pleas see our other 2 ads for 2 rooms)
- WIFI 
- Roku player with free channels. 
- Central A/C, heat 
- In-suite washer & dryer
- Small, fenced and covered patio with 2 patio chairs and a table. 
- Street parking available, we can discuss other options later. 
- We can supply another desk for the second student if needed. 

- Security deposit required, equal to half a month’s rent.
- No smoking, no pets, no scents no partying and absolutely no drugs!
** In response to the ad, please read the full ad and answer the questions below. **

1. Full name & phone number?
2. Please tell us a bit about yourself? (What do you do, where do you work/study, how do you spend your spare time, hobbies etc) 
3. Occupation or income source? 
4. Reason for moving?
5. Expected start and end date? -Expected length of stay?
6. What time and days are you available to view the suite? (Video showing can be arranged as well) 
* We currently have a tenant, please allow us 24 hours to confirm the viewing time. 

•••••Please note that we're renting the whole suite (private 1 bedroom and a small living room + kitchen and bathroom) to one individual, no couples due to the furnishing settings, but we also made the two rooms available for 2 students, if they wanted to share the suite; and in that case, there will be no living room, just two private rooms (one slightly bigger than the other) plus shared kitchen and bathroom as well as patio. Rent is different for this option. Please see our other ads for the two rooms for the shared option.•••••

Property Title: Single bedroom overlooking colourful back garden
Description: Welcome to my fully-renovated single-family home on a quiet street in suburban Richmond Hill. This property offers easy access to public transit (e.g. York U and Seneca King), shops, restaurants, parks and valley trails for walking and cycling. Your room, which overlooks a colourful back garden including vegetable plots, has a large work desk accessible to the house WiFi, and you will have exclusive use of the main bathroom (not en suite). Shared amenities include a modern well-appointed kitchen and laundry, spacious living room with TV, rear patio facing the afternoon sun, garage for a bicycle, and driveway car parking. You can also enjoy a spectacular front garden while relaxing in the shade. Heating and air-conditioning are provided by a brand new heat pump (no more natural gas!), and there are solar panels on the roof.  This space is perfect for someone seeking a safe, comfortable and welcoming environment, and a quiet place to work and unwind.

Property Title: Large room in Hammonds Plains
Description:
We are living in the house and want you to be comfortable, so we want to set out our expectations and wishes. We live quiet lives and want it to remain that way. 
Rent: $800 per month for the room, no common-room available.
Room: is 12 x 12, closet is 5 x 7, floors are carpet covered. Plenty of storage shelves and clothes space in the closet.
Furnished with a bed, dresser, bookshelf, desk, internet, and cable TV access but not computer, printer or television. Wear a headset when appropriate, please.
This is a non-smoking (any source) home. Overnight guests are not allowed.
 
Parking is included and we will clear the snow as needed. Very quiet cul-de-sac. The house water comes from a well and there is a septic field for disposal. The water is tested regularly and is fine.
The bedroom windows face South and West; room is bright and warm.
There will be a heat pump unit in the room soon (we hope!), baseboard heaters until then. The heat pump will allow heating and cooling control by the tenant for the room.
Includes: Bedroom with closet on the upper floor of a two-storey house
•	Main bathroom is shared as it contains the washer and dryer (you can use these, just supply your own soap).
•	Use of our kitchen; including pots and pans, dishes, cutlery plus one cupboard for your food and personal supplies. We expect you to clean up after yourself, but there is a dish washer to make things easier.
•	There is a small fridge in the room, plus space in our fridge and freezer (in the basement)
•	Storage for tires, bicycle, and a few other boxed items (in the basement)
•	Window blinds
Not included: 
•	Pillows, sheets, blankets, towels, face cloths
•	Soaps for laundry and personal use
•	Television, telephone, computer, or printer (but internet and cable TV access are in the room)
•	Cleaning of the rented space, although a vacuum cleaner is available.
Amenities: ['Free parking on site', 'Stove and oven', 'Fridge', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave', 'Washer', 'Dryer', 'wifi']
House Rules: ['No smoking', 'Quiet hours', 'No shoes inside', "Policy on visitor's stay"]

Property Title: Private Large Furnished Room w/ Queen Bed & Ensuite
Description:
Our home is located walking distance to Okanagan College (Salmon Arm Campus), the Rec Centre and Shaw Centre (Ice Rink), and Anytime Fitness (affordable 24hr gym).  This is an ideal space for a student.  It is a medium-sized home with a large backyard. We have a living room upstairs and a game room downstairs, with a TV in each room. There is typically always one TV available.  We have a large driveway, so you would have your own designated parking space. If you do not drive, we are also located near a bus stop. Your room is attached to its own private 3-piece bathroom (shower, toilet, sink). I keep the house tidy and clean.  You would be expected to keep your space clean and respect shared areas. 

Our rent includes all basic utilities including Wifi, Cable TV and streaming services, Hydro and Laundry. Our rent also includes some essentials like toilet paper, soap, laundry detergent, some kitchen staples. The kitchen is shared with us, so we just ask that you communicate when you need kitchen use so that we are not both needing the oven at the same time, for instance. We have cats, so not suitable for anyone with pet allergies.

Property Title: Clean and Fully Furnished Bedroom in Glenmore...
Description:
We have a 4 storey, 3 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom townhouse. The 2 rooms available is located on the 3rd floor with a bathroom dedicated to that floor only. A 2 piece bathroom located on the 2nd floor and a full bathroom located in the basement is also available for use. Both bedrooms has a great view of the mountains, fully equipped with a very comfortable queen bed, night stand, floor lamp, oscillating tower fan(incase you need the white noise to sleep or run hot), double door closets, and a 60” Smart TV and computer desk/chair for your convenience. 1 bedroom does have a dresser for extra storage. The room has a good size window to allow plenty of natural light and black out curtains are available if you need extra darkness for a deeper sleep. Fresh towels, bedding and toiletries are available for you to use. We like to shop at Costco and tend to have excess.

The townhouse is open concept with geothermal central AC/heater, fast speed internet, cable, big screen smart TV in the livingroom, oversized sectional, natural wood flooring, in-suite washer and dryer on the 3rd floor, upgraded modern kitchen, dining room, garage for extra storage that also has a separate standup freezer and fridge from the kitchen, pantry, and a deck with BBQ and patio seating. Kitchen is fully stocked with spices and condiments that you are welcome to use. Keurig machine is also available, so you're welcome to caffeinate yourself as much as you'd like.

We are located in the neighborhood of Glenmore in Kelowna, close to Knox Mountain trails. We are less than 10-15 minutes away from Okanagan College, 15-20 minutes away from the UBCO by car or public transit is available within 10-15 minutes by foot. There is free street parking a visitor parking available on a first come first serve basis. We have a garage incase you have a bike you would like to store.

We have made an effort in making your room and the home feel like a home that is cozy, clean and organized. We are quiet working professionals that put a lot of value in trust and respect and wish to find the same with you. As mentioned, we have 2 non-shedding hypo allergenic dogs that are friendly and will always want to greet you, so you must be someone who likes the company of dogs. Your room of course will be off limits to them unless you invite them in.

Open to discussing price if you are a student or working professional. Thank you for considering our place as your home away from home and look forward to hearing from you.

Property Title: Seeking Female Roommate
Description:
1 bedroom available in a 2 bedroom apartment in the South End starting June 15th/July 1st until August 31st with the possibility to renew in September! 

The apartment is welcoming, bright, and clean and very close to most of the city’s major bus routes! Roughly 800 square feet, this apartment has in floor bathroom heating, in unit washer and dryer, dishwasher and the living room is already furnished. There is quite a bit of space for storage in this apartment as well, including a deep storage closet in the bedroom. This apartment has become a home for me over the past several months and I treat it as such :)

I’m a 25 year old working professional - this space would be ideal for someone in a similar situation (single occupancy only). The rent is $900 a month tenant pays only wifi and electricity (Approx. $70/month).

If you’re interested reach out with a bit about yourself! :)

He will not be included with the room.

A TV and desk/workspace can easily be added to the room (space currently used by dog accessories)

Property Title: Large Furnished Room
Description:
Included with our accommodation;

Large furnished room with king sized bed & Endy™ mattress. 

Option for memory foam or feather pillows & luxury linens.

Attached (shared) 4 piece bathroom including walk-in accessible shower & soaker tub with spa quality towels & product lines.

Unlimited hardwired & Wifi accessible Starlink™ Internet. 

Chef recommended menu selections of exceptional quality food & barbecue grill - showcasing generously portioned homestyle cuisine from all over the world. Served nightly for dinner dining using locally sourced products whenever possible. 

Optional availability to add nutritionally balanced Grab & Go Breakfast, Packed Sack Lunch or Evening Dessert with Nightly Cookies available.

(dietary accommodation available for allergens, keto, low carb, paleo, pescatarian, carnivore, gluten free/sugar free & diabetic friendly requirements. (*Animal proteins & products will be served)

Access to all amenities including our Gym, Secondary Washroom, Kitchen, Living room, Dining room, Eating Bar, & Viewing Deck - featuring breathtaking scenery in every season from every window.

Castable screens are available for viewing of your personal subscription service(s) in the Living Room, Eating Bar, Gym & your Suite.

Daily or weekly maid & laundry services as requested, including (non negotiable) monthly deep cleaning & room sanitization for tenancy exceeding 30 days.

Personal parking space with snow removal as required on the premises in the winter. 

At your whim, access to wilderness & nature outside your window & on the doorstep waiting to help you restore, center & balance or to set off for an adventure

Property Title: Tantallon Tiny Home
Description:
HIGHLIGHTS:
* Fixed term rental (Sep 1, 2024 - May 31, 2025)
* $1150/month
* Utilities and internet extra - provided at a discounted flat rate of $200/month
* Partially furnished
* 7 appliances (includes laundry and dishwasher)
* Stand-alone tiny home on the owner’s property
* Best suited to one person
* Must be non-smoking
* Located in Upper Tantallon (approx 25 minutes from Halifax)

DETAILS ON LOCATION
This wee home is 20 minutes from Halifax in Upper Tantallon. It is partially furnished and features a fabulous kitchen with 7 appliances (including laundry), a private deck, dedicated parking, winter snow removal, and an unheated storage space (can fit a bike and up to 8 large tote bins or boxes but isn’t suitable for excess furniture). Within 0.5 to 2 km are two large grocery stores, banking, pharmacies, hardware stores, restaurants, doctor’s offices, haircuts, public library, community centre, and a Metro Link terminal (for access to the rest of HRM). Right next door to the property is the Shambhala Centre where you can practice meditation if you’d like!

YOU & YOUR NEIGHBOURS (us!)
This space is best suited to one tenant who is a non-smoker. Our family is composed of two moms and a 9-year old daughter so we would enjoy having a tenant who is part of the 2SLGBTQIA+ community or an ally. One of us is an elementary school teacher and the other works from home. Sharing our property means that we will respect your privacy and we’ll expect the same in return. We are good neighbours and we will be renting this space to someone we feel will be a good neighbour too. 

SUITE DETAILS   
The bedroom area fits a queen sized bed (bed frame can be provided but mattress is not). Other included furnishings are a bedside table, an armoire (with closet rod and drawers), a large overhead shelf with baskets, dining table, two stools, a large comfy chair, and a small storage ottoman.

The kitchen includes dishwasher, clothes washer/dryer combo, cooktop, very cool fridge (!!), range hood, countertop oven/air fryer, Keurig, and all the cooking/eating items you’ll need.

The living area features a cozy reading nook and a work/dining area. The bathroom has a generous glassed-in shower and effective storage space. 

With lots of light, including a 6-foot patio door, this space features your own private entrance (on the opposite side of the property to our home), a deck, patio furniture, a BBQ (for summer/fall/spring), a small yard area, and your own parking spot. Snow removal from the driveway and lawn care are provided. A shovel is provided so you can clear your deck and walkway in winter. 

ACCESSIBILITY
There are two steps up to access the space. Once inside, it is all on one level with no barrier between the living area and bathroom. There are no grab bars in the bathroom and the shower has a 1” curb.

RENTAL TERM
This little home is available from Sep 1, 2024 to May 31, 2025 (renewal for Sep 2025 is possible but summer months are not open). Utilities and internet are extra but are offered at a combined flat fee of $200/month.

Property Title: Family of 6 looking for lovely female college student to rent a very large room in our house
Description:
We are a family of 6: kids ages 14, 12, 11 & 9 with a very large room for rent in our basement. The basement is shared with our 14 & 12 yr old daughters so we will only accept a female renter. The room for rent is very large with couches included for a sitting room in it. There is a kitchenette in the basement with a microwave, fridge and hot plate to cook your own meals but we will invite you for some family meals as well (you are welcome to use the oven upstairs as well!) Laundry is shared and there is a somewhat private entrance (walk out basement doors). We are a fun, loud, friendly family looking for someone that is looking for a home away from home while they go to college. We do not have pets and will not allow any pets in our home. Rent includes utilities and wifi. We do not smoke and will not allow any type of smoking on our property. 

A little about us: we love cooking good food, hosting dinner parties, camping, sports, weekend getaways and board games. We are actively involved in our church and volunteer in the community as well. Our home will not be quiet but it will be full of fun and laughter!

- Amenities: Laundry machines, balcony, spacious kitchen with dishwasher, living room with TV

- Shared Facilities: 1 bathroom (with tub and bidet), central air conditioning (can get hot in the summer)

Roommate Preferences:
- Non-Smoking: No indoor smoking
- No Pets
- Age and Professional Status: Woman over 25, working professional
- Household Etiquette: Share household chores, keep common spaces tidy, respect others’ possessions
- Furniture: House is furnished except for the available room
- Guests: Friends visiting are fine with prior household agreement, no crowded or noisy parties
- Friendly Terms: Aim to be on friendly terms, open to negotiating shared bills, chores, errands, food, and living spaces

If you are looking for a supportive and fun place to live, we’d love to hear from you!

Property Title: Bright bedroom by Okanagan College
Description:
The condo is located on the top floor of the building, facing south (lots of sun to enjoy on the covered balcony) and has a split floor plan. This is a quiet building in a Cul-de-Sac.

The bedroom is approximately 11 x 9 ft, has a spacious closet, blackout curtains and is furnished with a double bed with a super comfortable mattress, desk, chair, dresser and nightstand. It also has a TV. You will have your own bathroom with a shower. The kitchen, living room with electric fireplace and laundry (washer and dryer in the unit) will be shared. The balcony has a small BBQ, table and chairs. The unit also has a small pantry. All rooms have air purifiers and the kitchen comes with a Berkey water filter. There is no designated parking stall so this is best suited for someone who doesn’t have a vehicle.

I am a quiet professional and like spending time in the great outdoors, preferably in the mountains, hiking in the summer, and snowshoeing in the winter. I also enjoy reading, cooking or watching a movie curled up on the couch.

Property Title: Private 1 bedroom suite, fully furnished
Description:
My home is almost 4 years old, everything in the house was bought brand new when I moved in.
I have a large dog Gator, he's Shephard, Mastiff and Rottweiler mix. Almost 7 years old, a love bug 
I have a 17 year old Cat Jerry
I have an aquarium and 4 chickens.
I am an avid gardener so if you love flowers and birds, this is paradise. I have a 14' swim spa...so not really a hot tub and not really a swimming pool...in between.
This suite I'm renting is the master bedroom, with private bath, walk in shower, separate tub, toilet and double sinks. Large walk in closet. a 55 inch TV and king bed. Room has drapes as well as black out shades. 11 foot ceilings . It is on the opposite side of house to guest room where I sleep. Suite has a lock and entrance through garage and side door for extra privacy
There are no stairs in my house, double car garage with extra stand up fridge and freezer. I do not park in my garage. I have room or bikes or kayaks etc in there
I have a gas stove, walk in pantry, ice maker and small household kitchen appliances.
Fireplace is in main living room. I have plenty of places in the garden to sit and relax with firetable, swivel rocking chairs etc.
I grow many herbs, tomatoes, pumpkin, squash etc in the garden. I have 8-10 bird feeders up
I am a 5-6 minute walk to beach access/I am one street away rom the water
I have a BBQ and a smoker outside.
This is a non smoking, non vaping, no drugs house

Property Title: Private, clean bedroom in new town home with quiet working professional (and family for 1 week a month during fall and spring)

We have a nice, new room to rent in our  newly built and tastefully decorated 2000sqft town home. The bedroom has a private bathroom that’s  located across from the bedroom.  The kitchen and main living room is a shared space.  We have a roof top patio with outdoor seating and a hot tub. We also have a nice eating deck off the kitchen. We have a small fenced yard on the walk in level as well. We have a sauna located in a bedroom that can be used when it’s not occupied by our son during our visits. 

Our townhome complex backs onto the rail trial for easy access to biking or a nice stroll. We  are located in close proximity to Wood lake/Beasley Park.  There is a bus stop and tennis courts located directly across from
Our complex. UBCO is 14 km = 15 min drive or 30 min bus ride. 

We are looking for a quiet student or working professionals only. We are looking to rent out our room from Sept 2024 till July 2024.

Property Title: bright room in 2000sqft apartment, Rockingham area
Description:
Room in Shared Apartment Available! 

Conveniently located the Rockingham area in a peaceful urban subdivision with a bus stop to Lacewood station and express bus in morning/evening to Dal at the condominium front door.  This apartment is just a 20-minute walk away from the Clayton Park Shopping Centre, with restaurants, Sobeys, gym and other shopping necessities.  

The apartment is spacious, at over 2000 sqft, and 3 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, in condo washer and dryer.   It has a lovely Bedford basin view and a large deck for BBQing and outdoor summer evenings 
One large bedroom are available for rent. The rent $1000 is per bedroom. The move-in date at the earliest is July 15th. The new tenant will share most of the living space with a young male professional, a female Dal student ... oh and cat, Bella.  Preferably looking for a female student. Must be ok with cats. 
 
All utilities are included (Internet, heating, etc.). The rooms come fully furnished. Parking is available   

Will require first and last months rent and sign a month to month lease but prefer someone long term.

If you are interested, please feel free to DM

Property Title: Furnished 2 bedroom 2 bath condo 10 min drive to UBCO
Description:
Newly renovated 983 sq. ft fully furnished 2 bedroom 2 bath condo at Emerald Point. Includes a full stocked kitchen, full size washer and dryer in suite. Queen size bed in master with full ensuite and double in 2nd bedroom with 2nd bathroom directly next to the 2nd bedroom. Single car underground parking, bike storage and additional stall with parking located inferno parking lot. Available for rent September to April/mid may (dates can be flexible if needed). Looking for responsible and mature tenants for this short term rental. 

Property has an onsite gym and sauna, seasonal outdoor pool and hot tub. Wifi, geothermal heat and a/c, water and a bbq on your own private deck all included. Cable at your own cost. All you need to do is bring your own linens. 

Located conveniently next to Beasley park with a public beach. 10 minute drive to the airport, 10 min drive to UBCO and only a 2 minute walk to the nearest bus stop which has direct routes to UBCO. 2 minute walk to tennis courts and the Rail Trail for biking, running and walking. Please note pictures do not include furniture as newly purchased. Note this is not a shared space unless you choose to have a roommate

Property Title: House near NBCC Chatham - 2-3 bedrooms for rent: females only (2 renters may want to split the cost of the third bedroom for storage)
Description:
This is a very old 'cottage' type of house (112 years old!) that's strangely in the middle of town, but very safe and VERY private (zero neighbors)! I've rented it out to tenants for years and I have personally lived in it myself for the last year and a half and I can say that it's warm and cozy in the winter and very safe! (*The Miramichi Police department is in the backyard, a federal RCMP unit is in the two commercial building to the left, I have various external video cameras installed throughout as well as a front doorbell camera, protecting the perimeter of the property. There is also a full alarm system covering all windows and doors, if a tenant chooses to have it monitored, if I'm not living here. If I'm living here I will continue to have the alarm system monitored.)

The lawn is mowed every two weeks and snow is removed from driveway and walk-ways, within 24 hours of snow fall ending.

There are no neighbors at all so very quiet and very private. There is a large empty lot next to the house that I also own, which you can use for parking. There is a big, beautiful park across the street, the Chatham library is across the street. And...Dixie Lee (the best fried chicken in the WORLD) is to the right of the house. Also, the best Indian restaurant between here to Ottawa, is a half a block away.

Description:

*Close to Metro transit-5 minute walk to bus stop Metro 90 runs every 30 minutes and passes Mount Saint Vincent University, and stops close to both St. Mary's and Dalhousie University. The express 194 runs early in the morning and at rush hour.

Property Title: Shared house in North End Halifax
Description:
Seeking a roommate for September 1st 2024 to share my large light-filled house in the vibrant North End of Halifax.

I am looking to share my beautiful home with a lovely person. Ideally I would like to live with one person who occupies two rooms ( I am open to a single parent with shared custody. I enjoy children.) We would share the dining room, living room, two bathrooms, laundry, beautiful kitchen and a charming garden with a large patio. Heat & water included, we would split the cost of power and internet.  $1800 One-year lease. I am open to renting the rooms out to two separate people. Larger bed room with large closet and ensuite access to shared bath would be $1100 and smaller bed room would be $900. 

Looking for a non-smoker, responsible person, and good communicator who wants to live with others. Sorry no pets. 

I am a 54 year artist and mother of two grown children. I am excited to begin this adventure of sharing my home with someone new. Please message me, with an intro about yourself and we can take it from there!

Property Title: Bespoke Guest Suite
Description:
Here's an unprecedented opportunity to live & enjoy life (without hassle) at The Hollow of Lovat, in picturesque Salt Springs, Nova Scotia.

We've completed renovations to our bespoke guest suite and we are ready to welcome into our home an individual or couple seeking accommodations for short or interim time periods. 

We'll also accept applications from individuals looking for longer term room & board tenancy options. 

Included with our accommodation;

Large furnished room with king sized bed & Endy™ mattress. 

Option for memory foam or feather pillows & luxury linens.

Attached (shared) 4 piece bathroom including walk-in accessible shower & soaker tub with  spa quality towels & product lines.

Unlimited hardwired & Wifi accessible Starlink™ Internet. 

Chef recommended menu selections of exceptional quality food & barbecue grill - showcasing generously portioned homestyle cuisine from all over the world. Served nightly for dinner dining using locally sourced products whenever possible. 

Optional availability to add nutritionally balanced Grab & Go Breakfast, Packed Sack Lunch or Evening Dessert with Nightly Cookies available.

(dietary accommodation available for allergens, keto, low carb, paleo, pescatarian, carnivore, gluten free/sugar free & diabetic friendly requirements. (*Animal proteins & products will be served)

Access to all amenities including our Gym, Secondary Washroom, Kitchen, Living room, Dining room, Eating Bar, & Viewing Deck - featuring breathtaking scenery in every season from every window.

Castable screens are available for viewing of your personal subscription service(s) in the Living Room, Eating Bar, Gym & your Suite.

Daily or weekly maid & laundry services as requested, including (non negotiable) monthly deep cleaning & room sanitization for tenancy exceeding 30 days.

Personal parking space with 7am snow removal on the premises in the winter. 

At your whim, access to wilderness & nature outside your window & on the doorstep waiting to help you restore, center & balance or to set off for an adventure.

What we will need in return; 

Easy going, friendly & kind individual(s)
Must be tidy, respectful, a nature & animal lover with well established income & credit history. 

You’ll have a clean up to date criminal record & vulnerable sector check, as well as a willingness to live in an adult focused home environment with shared communal amenities & companionship animals - including a deep seeded preference for cleanliness in your living environment.

Accommodation rates will begin at $950/mth $50/day for individuals & $75/day for couples which includes utilities & amenities access.

Rate increases based on food, laundry & maid service options chosen will be prorated on a daily basis & due in full by the 5th of the month or prior to departure for short term stays.  

A refundable deposit of 50% of your monthly obligatory remuneration will be required upon receipt of a signed & mutually agreed upon lodging contract for any tenancy exceeding a 30 day duration. 

Due to location and unpredictable road conditions, a standing recommendation is in place for AWD or 4x4 vehicles being suggested for guests and tenants planning winter stays.

References & aforementioned checks will be provided upon request of all individuals living on the premises. Failure to comply or live ethically within the premises and in our communities will result in an eviction notice that will supersede Nova Scotia’s tenancy agreement timelines and/or rights & regulations - at ownership’s discretion.

Property Title: Bedroom and small office/workspace in North End Halifax, Walkable to Dal and Hospitals
Description:
For Rent: 
A bedroom with queen bed and closet, and small, separate office/workspace in my shared two-bedroom house, perfect for a graduate student, post-doc, or medical resident. Both rooms have east-facing windows out to the street (a dead-end laneway with plenty of pedestrian traffic).

My home is a 100+ year old townhouse in the North End near the Commons. The house is located just off of Agricola Street, walking distance to bars, restaurants, shops, and cafés. It is an approximately 15 minute walk to Dalhousie University and the hospitals, 10 minute walk to restaurants and clubs on Gottigen Street, a 12-15 minute bike ride to SMU campus, 15 minutes walk to Halifax Central Library, and just a couple minutes' walk to the Commons, The Oval, and the public pool. 

*Utilities included in rental cost: water, power, wifi, and streaming channels on the living room television (you are welcome to add your own subscriptions to the TV if you wish). 
*Street parking only. 
*Bedding, pillows, towels can be provided
*Share kitchen/pantry staples (salt/pepper/condiments/cooking oils), but responsible for purchasing own groceries and rotating out leftovers and unused food promptly.
*Cleaning supplies, dish soap, laundry detergent provided
*Washer and Dryer in house
*Shared full bathroom and shared 1/2 bath on first floor. 
*Shared kitchen (with caveats about certain cookware/kitchen items)
*Omnivorous house: I cook/eat meat, fish, poultry, eggs, grains, and lots of vegetables, and I also often ferment things like batches of kimchi.
*Ground floor of house is "open concept," with living room, dining room, back room (my work space) and 1/2 bathroom. The dining "room" has a large dining table, and the living room area has two comfy couches and a Roku TV.

About me: a middle-aged trans/queer positive (and you should be, too) man with two dogs and a beehive. I mostly work from home as a writer, freelance editor, and part-time instructor. I garden in the tiny back yard and care for the growing collection of houseplants. I enjoy cooking and sharing food. I am friendly and caring, but need my privacy and respect yours. I prefer less conversation when I first wake up--it's not personal, I just need coffee. :) This is my home and it is important to me that anyone sharing it treats the house, me, and the dogs with care, kindness, and respect. 

The ideal renter will be:
*LGBTQ positive and/or identified: no homophobia, transphobia, racism in my house.
*a mature, responsible, clear and direct communicator
*Employed and busy with studies, activities, etc.  
*Non-smoker/non-vaper --no smoking or vaping of anything, tobacco, cannabis, whatever is allowed in the house (I don't care if you partake outside of the house, I just cannot tolerate the smell of cannabis flower or smoke, tobacco smoke, or vape smells inside or directly outside of my home.
*Not a habitual/addicted substance user (I am a very light, casual consumer of alcohol in the house, < 1-3 drinks per week, if that; a heavy drinker or substance user will not be a good fit).
*No parties or frequent over-night guests 
*No "subletters"
*Mindful of security, keeping the house locked up and not letting dogs out the front door. 
*A dog-lover, and excited to live with pups, but not a pet owner yourself (no more pets allowed). 
*Enjoy cooking and eating, and are able to keep common spaces tidy and cleaned up after use
*Able to keep reasonably quiet in the house between 10 pm -7 am. 
*Enjoy the small deck and backyard outdoor space 
*Not be allergic to bees or at least be okay with living with a beehive on the property and have your own epipen and communicate a clear strategy for treatment in the very unlikely event of a sting. 
*Able to be respectful of my home, belongings, boundaries, and privacy, as I will be of yours.
(all of this can/will be further discussed)

Property Title: Private Room for Rent
Description:
I am looking for a room mate to come live in the centrally located apartment that I live in. A 5 minute drive to downtown or Orchard Park Mall, and it is also a 5 minute walk to stops on the #10 bus route that goes downtown and to Orchard Park Mall. There is a partially furnished 12.5' x 11' 10" bedroom and a bathroom right outside the bed room that would be shared with another room mate, an in suite washer and dryer, a fridge and freezer, a dishwasher, and an oven, stove and microwave. There is also storage space. The rent is $1050 per month, plus internet monthly and utilities bi-monthly. The room will include a set of drawers, a dresser, a desk chair, and a twin size bed. You will also be required to pay a $525 damage deposit. There is also a large patio that one can enjoy most of the year. The room will be available on March 1st.

What I'm looking for: A reliable person preferably in the 25-35 age range, who pays their rent and bills on time, is respectful of the boundaries and the belongings of the people they live with, is clean, friendly and smoke and drug free (including weed). I would prefer someone who doesn't have a pet, but if you do, I would consider it depending on the pet, however you would be required to pay a pet deposit of $525.

About me: I am a 31 year old man who is a working professional in the museum and heritage industry full time and I also work a part time job in the arts and culture industry. I like going to karaoke, playing board games, hanging out with friends (though at home I am a good mix of introvert and extrovert, some days I want to be by myself and other times I can be pretty chatty). I am relatively laid back, but I will uphold my boundaries and will speak my mind if issues arise. I am also a fairly clean person (especially in the kitchen).

If you are interested, please send me a message to discuss details further and potentially set up a viewing.

Property Title: Great Location! Walk & bike everywhere!
Description:
Are you looking for a great location? We are looking for Two Female housemates for two fully furnished rooms that are available Aug1 st & Sept 1st, in this beautiful, all Female, shared house in Kelowna. 

This house is  is a 7 minute walk from Okanagan Collage, 3 1/2 blocks from the closest beach, 2 1/2 blocks from Pandosy Village, with lots of shopping & restaurants, minutes from the Hospital & downtown.

1) This cute, bright, midsized room looks south with sun most of the afternoon.  It is fully furnished with a generous closet, a  desk & coffee & toast bar with a small but large capacity fridge.
It is available Sept 1st, for $830 per month plus $50 towards utilities & $30 towards wifi.
2) This large comfy room faces east & has brilliant morning & early afternoon sun.
It is fully furnished, with a coffee & toast bar & a small but large capacity fridge. This room also offers a generous sized closet & a desk.
It is available August 1st for $ 850 per month, plus $50 towards utilities & $30 towards wifi.
  
Walk every where, no need for a car, there are there are bike lanes all over this area that will take you everywhere you need to go.

This unit has 2 shared bathrooms, a common TV/living room with a TV & cablevision included, a kitchen & laundry.

There is a beautiful yard, with a large patio & a peaceful place to sit at the table & benches built around the hazel nut tree. Great for relaxing, studying or eating on a nice sunny day.

This is a friendly, all Female, no smoking, no vaping, drug free, drama free house. We are looking for 2 chill & happy Females to join our group.
Must be clean & keep clean after themselves.
More pics by request
Rooms are single occupancy only.
 Sorry, no pets.

Property Title: Private bedroom and bathroom in exchange for childcare
Description:
Quiet, new home with bright bedroom in the basement (fully finished). There is a bathroom across the hall that would be just for you. Located right beside Dartmouth Commons. 

You will have access to the kitchen and laundry, both upstairs. This home has two kitties and a very friendly dog. 

There is street parking by permit, and is also a 5 minute walk to the Bridge Bus Terminal. 

You would be living with 1 adult female and 1 7 year old child. The room is partially in exchange for help with childcare while I am working, mainly mornings and evenings, and would be ideal for a female student. It will occasional pick up and drop off from school (a bus pass will be provided if you don’t have a car).

Property Title: Three sunlight bedrooms available in spacious waterfront apartment
Description:
This large apartment has waterfront views of the Northwest Arm, is cat friendly and is located a 3-minute walk from the bus, a 10-minute walk to Mumford (Sobeys, Walmart, shoppers, NSLC) and the Halifax Shopping Center.

Shared Backyard Space: Enjoy access to a shared greenspace, perfect for reading in the sun. As a bonus: the backyard is frequented by a family of deer.

Waterfront Location: Walk along the water and watch the yachts sail by! This unit is right across the street from Halifax's scenic & historic northwest arm.

Prime Location: Walking distance to grocery stores, gyms, pharmacies, Mumford Mall, bars, and local trailheads. Perfect for cycling or walking to campus or downtown during the summer & conveniently located by the Mumford Bus terminal 

Outdoor Activities: Enjoy cycling and swimming in nearby lakes, or exploring local trails right at your doorstep. This room offers a blend of urban convenience and natural beauty, making it a perfect retreat for anyone seeking both comfort and adventure. 

Coin-operated laundry facilities in the building

There is ongoing maintenance on the neighbourhood's water infrastructure, which may cause minor disturbances and noise during the day, however, this is to be completed by October.

Property Title: Affordable Furnished Rooms with Easy Commute to NSCC & CBU
Description:
Private Bedrooms for Students Near NSCC & CBU

Welcome to Cape Breton Comforts! We offer comfortable and affordable rooms perfect for students and professionals. Our property is conveniently located in New Waterford, NS, making it easy to commute to both NSCC and CBU.

Room Options:

    Blue Room: Available beginning September 8th. Features a twin bed, spacious and furnished: Includes a comfortable desk and computer chair. Enjoy the convenience of your own full fridge. Rent is $650/month.
    Purple Room: Available now. Features a twin bed, spacious and furnished: Includes a comfortable desk and computer chair. Enjoy the convenience of your own full fridge. Rent is $750/month.
    Green Room: Available now. Features a queen bed, spacious and furnished: Includes a comfortable desk and computer chair. Enjoy the convenience of your own full fridge. Rent is $850/month.

Amenities:

    Fully-equipped kitchen with dishwasher – cook with ease!
    Laundry facilities on-site for hassle-free living.
    Say hello to our pet Roomba, keeping the place neat and tidy!
    High-speed 1.5Gbps fibre internet – no slow cable internet here!

Current Occupancy: Our property is co-ed, and we currently have one male and one female tenant upstairs.

Commute Made Easy:

    Bus stop to CBU right outside: reaches CBU in 15-20 mins!

See More:

    Visit CapeBretonComforts.com to find more photos and video tours.
    Check out our Matterport VR Tour: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=d6jk6zgXVjJ.

Rooms start at $650/Month for single occupancy. Short-term stays are available! All-inclusive pricing, no extra costs. All-inclusive of utilities, laundry, 1.5Gbps fibre internet, and includes a desk and a full fridge in your bedroom.

Additional Info:

    Occupancy rate is for a single person. No couples, but if two women want to share the green room, that is fine. Landlords can move the bed from the purple room to the green room.
    If joining as friends and renting all three rooms, a 20% discount may be available at $1800/Month for the entire upstairs.
    Contact landlords to discuss pricing if sharing.

Steve Sharpe
Email: Info@CapeBretonComforts.com

Description: This is a 3 bedroom mobile home on a shared (with landlords) 23 acres in Coombs. It is shared with 1 other person. A middle aged female (myself). The renter gets their own bedroom, living room, kitchenette with full fridge and separate locking entrance with private covered deck. They also enjoy shared use of the bathroom, laundry room and full kitchen.   The entire semi-suite comes furnished and move in ready with dishes and small appliances for the kitchenette, couch coffee table and side table with TV and also a dining table & large closet in the living room, a single bed, chest of drawers and closet, linens and pillows in bedroom.  The deck has a couch as well. There is also large garden spaces if that happens to be of interest.

Property Title: Furnished queen bed bright room already to sleep in nice empty closet also a nice storage cubbyspace. Have your own bathroom with shower toliet sink condo is beautiful all furnished. Its literally alm
Description: Beautiful condo next to police station, i am a single 41y women looking for a nice female to share with. I am very clean like my home beautiful and kept spotless as it makes you feel calm. Bright up and down which i have a own suit master bedroom and bathrooms so the upper floor would be there bedroom and bathroom. AC internet nice beautiful kitchen with big table you could use to work at or borrow the desk located in a different bedroom. Dont drink smoke no pets no partying. My home is very important to me beautiful furniture and a place of comfort and serenity. Tv access with big sectional couch for those days to just chill out. Shared kitchen can use appliances just need own groceries and supplies unless there was financial help for that. Have room in the fridge and pantry for your food. Dishwasher washer/ dryer nice beautiful covered deck that looks at the mountains right beside library and down the street from the Creston college walking distance is perfect. Would expect to clean after yourself so i am not left with everything. I am home right now if needed a ride or help with anything i would help if i could. Would love the company and to help someone who needs a beautiful warm feeling home. Love meeting new people and developing friendships. Hope i can help someone to open my home and make you feel at hime here.

Property Title: Condo bedroom in downtown Dartmouth
Description: The room is located in a large recently-renovated two-bedroom condo with a craft room, kitchen, utility room, living / dining room and two bathrooms. The unit has a large terrace and a beautiful view of Halifax Harbour. The building is in Downtown Dartmouth, surrounded by shops, restaurants, banks, professional services, public library, farmers' market, parks and other amenities. The building is on several bus routes, the ferry terminal is across the street, and you can walk or bike along the scenic Trans Canada Trail to the NSCC Ivany Campus. It's a lovely condo in a friendly building, surrounded by interesting things to see and do.

Property Title: Upper Mission Bedroom Rental
Description:
We are willing to negotiate the price for the right person.
Welcome to your rooms away from home in the prestigious Upper Mission neighbourhood of Kelowna. A prime location known for its tranquility and proximity to hiking trails. Wineries and beaches. These 2 high-end, FULLY furnished bedrooms feature all the comforts you need during your academic year. Enjoy approx. 1600 sq ft of elegant living space with breathtaking views of Okanagan Lake. Separate walk out entrance, covered patio equipped with patio furniture, large living room with sectional couch, 50 inch Smart TV, central air, kitchen, dinning area and shared laundry. Lots of outdoor space to store your summer/winter toys.

$1,512 per room per month
Rent includes utilities, internet, cable and Netflix.
Minimum 10 month contract
No Pets and No Smoking/Vape (non-negotiable)

Bedroom A: King size bed, private entrance, wardrobe, desk and mirror.

Bedroom B: Queen size bed with linens supplied, 2 closets, drawer space, desk and spectacular view.

Email: uppermissionbedroomrental@gmail.com
Please include your Resume and a short description of yourself, your studies and where you are from etc.

Description: I live in a large recently-renovated condo with two poodles and a beautiful view of downtown Halifax. It has two bedrooms, two bathrooms, craft room, utility room, kitchen, living / dining room and terrace. The building is surrounded by shops, restaurants, pubs, banks, public library, farmers' market, professional services, parks and other amenities. The building is friendly and the neighbourhood has lots to see and do.

Property Title: A basement bedroom in our home
Description:
We are opening our home to a female student, preferably someone studying in the health professions (medicine, nursing, physiotherapy, etc.). We work at Dalhousie and walk every day. It takes 10 to 15 minutes (depending on campus location). 

The available room is in our basement and is accessible from the main house. The room can be furnished or not, whatever is needed. There is a small fridge downstairs for your use. You would share our kitchen (main floor) and a bathroom (main floor) that is right next to the kitchen. The main floor also includes a dining room and living room. If you are a musician, we have a piano. The upstairs (first floor and above) would not be available to you. Heat and hot water are included in the lease. We may be able to share the internet password (but cannot be responsible for the provider's service).

This is a new idea for us and we would all be learning. We have a nice home of busy people, often it's messy, and many projects are on the go. We envision a situation where you sit with us for family dinners on occasion, and you are mostly busy studying. We have two daughters (11 and 15) with whom you would be sharing a home, and we have one person in the family living with a disability (not looking for help with that, but you would have to feel comfortable around health challenges). We also have two sons (27 and 22), both of whom lived in this same basement room at one point, and have now moved away from home. This listing is for one person only, and ideal for a student who is focused on studying. (Parties could not be held here.)

We have two Siamese cats who know no boundaries, they would definitely demand to be pet and played with. (i.e. you could not have allergies). Our home is at capacity for pets and we could not accept another pet. 

Smoking of any substances is absolutely not permitted on any part of our property and that is not negotiable.

Property Title: 1 Bedroom apartment West end Halifax
Description:
1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment available in the West end of Halifax. Conveniently located near the Halifax Shopping Centre. The apartment is a basement apartment with a separate entrance with lots of daylight. The number 29 bus stop is steps away and the number 1 bus is just a few minutes walk away. The McKay bridge and highway 102 are easily accessible as well. The unit has a washer/dryer as well as storage room. The bedroom has a good sized closet and a large living room and kitchen. 

Rent is $1,600 a month and includes water. Electricity and internet are not included. There is a heat pump as well as electric heat. There is ample street parking and a place to park when there is a street parking ban. This is a  no smoking apartment and property. No dogs, cats considered.

Please send me some information about yourself including your name, phone number and email address if you are interested in booking a viewing. Application and credit check required before signing lease.

Available September 1st for 1 year fixed term lease.

Property Title: A clean fully furnished single bedroom in a house!
Description:
This is a fully furnished single bedroom with double/queen bed in a single family house. Room includes a closet with hangers, a study desk, TV table with storage and a secured metal cabinet with a lock.

There are currently two adult occupants /owners and a medium size dog living in the house. One additional vehicle can be parked in the driveway. The cost includes water, hot water, electricity, heating and internet and basic cleaning supplies like dish detergent, toilet paper and bathroom cleaning supplies.

This is a quite family of working professionals. Potential tenant may share bathroom with one owner (second owner has separate bathroom). The house has additional two pieces bathrooms that can be used as well when needed. The kitchen and living room are shared with the owners. There is a single entrance to the house and is fully fenced with security monitoring cameras installed.

This living arrangement may be ideal for high school senior or university students and single working professionals. Bus stop is about 50 meters away (2 minutes walk) and banks, restaurants, theatre, grocery stores, gas stations and shopping center are 3 minutes drive away, also has a direct bus link in case tenant doesn't drive.

Property Title: Fully Furnished Room in a Cozy Single Family Home
Description:
We have a fully furnished room available in our single-family house, perfect for a high school senior, university student, or working professional.

Room Features:
Spacious and Comfortable: The room is furnished with a cozy double/queen bed, a desk and chair for studying or working, a TV, and a fan to keep you cool.
Ample Storage: Includes a closet with hangers and storage drawer for all your belongings.
Utilities Included: Rent covers water, heat, electricity, and high-speed internet, so you don't have to worry about extra bills.

Shared Amenities:
Bathroom: Shared with just one other occupant and stocked with toilet paper and basic cleaning supplies.
Kitchen: Fully equipped shared kitchen, featuring both a regular fridge and a deep freezer—ideal for meal prepping or storing your favorite foods.
Laundry: Shared washer and dryer with the owners, making laundry day a breeze.

Household:
Quiet and Professional: The owners, a friendly working couple, live in the house with their medium-sized dog. We mostly work from home, so you'll be sharing the space with respectful and responsible people.
Parking: Your own parking spot in the two-car driveway.

Location Highlights:
Convenient Transport: Just 50 meters from a convenience store, a gas station and a bus stop with two different routes to downtown and the local shopping center.
Nearby Amenities: A quick 3-minute drive (or a short bus ride) to banks, restaurants, a theater, grocery stores, a gym, a liquor store, and more.
Ideal for Non-Drivers: Everything you need is within easy reach, whether you drive or prefer public transit.

This room offers the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and community. Whether you're a student needing a quiet place to study or a professional, this room meets your needs.

Rent Details:
Single occupancy only.
Pets: Unfortunately, no additional pets allowed.
Availability: September 1, 2024

If you're interested in viewing the room or have any questions, please contact us.

Property Title: Centrally located, furnished room in family home in North End Halifax
Description:
This rental is in an older, three bedroom family home  set back off of a tree lined street. It is a small, but cozy furnished room  with it's own closet.  There is one shared bathroom in the house. The main floor includes an open concept living room/kitchen.  There are small, outdoor spaces front and back- a little overgrown, but there is a open shed to park a bike.

We are a mother and 21 year old son, who both working full-time. We have an easy- going household and busy schedules,  but make time as we can to share meals. We have friends and family that stop by, not on a daily basis, but with some regularity. We occasionally have overnight guests visiting. 

Centrally located in Halifax's North End, we are close to bus routes, groceries, coffee shops and restaurants, art spaces, and in a walkable neighborhood. The house is set back off the street and is quiet. Street parking is by permit, which is not included. No pets due to allergies.

This home would be a good fit for a mature and respectful student, and is suitable for one person.  It is currently available for the 2024/25 school year.

Property Title: Furnished Room
Description:
Private furnished room available in a 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom house located near Fintry.

***No access to public transit. Must have your own vehicle. Closest city is 40 minutes drive.***

Shared living areas with single occupant (female homeowner). Upstairs: main entry, kitchen, living room, half-bath, dining area, room with ensuite (occupied), and balcony with BBQ and firepit. Downstairs: two available rooms (this one is 12’x10’), full bath (shared between two rooms), TV room, laundry, storage, ground level entrance. Outside: driveway parking, sauna, gym equipment, hammock, sitting area.

Located just off Westside Road in Kelowna and only 2km from the Fintry Provincial Park, campground, and boat launch with endless ATV and walking trails just steps away. Drive 40 minutes North to Vernon or 40 minutes South to Kelowna along Westside Road. Small convenience stores located along Westside Road but no gas stations or other amenities. Local library and community hall holds various events such as church, potluck, workshops, yoga, karate, women's circle, etc.

Pets negotiable. No smoking/vaping inside. 
Single occupancy preferred.
Must have own vehicle (no transit available).

Property Title: Furnished bedroom , private bathroom with single female plus small dog
Description:
Three bedroom apartment, with den and storage in underground. I am looking for one female roommate to share the three bedroom apartment. The third room can be used as the renter's living room and or a space do schoolwork. Renter will need to be okay with dogs as I have a small senior dog (4 pounds). 
Renter will have their own bedroom(two closets) and private bathroom located down the hall. Kitchen is equipped with fridge, stove, dishwasher, microwave. Washer, and dryer located in renter's bathroom. 
Heat and hot water included in monthly rent. Renter's contribution to the power and wifi  bill will be $100/month. Apartment does not have AC. I use a portable AC unit in the summer. 
Apartment finishes include granite countertops and floor tile, laminate floors in the living room.
The building is equipped with a fitness facility, rentable common room.
Apartment is minutes from the shopping center’s and easy access to highway 102. Bus stop across the street from apartment!

Property Title: Furnished Condo Downtown Kelowna
Description:
Pet-friendly, corner unit condo available September 15 2024, located at the end of a hallway (very quiet unit).

It is a furnished two bedroom, two bathroom apartment with one deep soaker bathtub and standing shower. In house laundry, one underground parking spot, and a beautiful view of Knox mountain from the patio.

The apartment is fully furnished with all modern conveniences, one king bed, and one queen bed with a desk and monitor set up (great for working from home). Includes one large storage locker located on floor one as well.

I am looking for someone respectful and clean, ideally looking for a 1-year lease but open to shorter term for the right tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions, I look forward to hearing from you!

Property Title: Brand New 4 Bedroom, 3 washroom Luxury home
Description:
Relax Comfortably in your Trip & Experience LuxuryStay with PoolTable,AirHockey Games.Enjoy Sightseeing from Front Balcony in this BrandNew LuxuryHome located in a Lakes & Golf Community.Just 14 Minutes away from Edmonton International Airport,Close to the Heart of South Edmonton Common.Our Home offers an easy commute to Downtown,U of A ,West Edmonton Mall.
Just 2 minutes to Colonial Golf Club, 6 minute to Eagle Rock GolfClub.Enjoy this perfect blend of comfort & convenience during your stay!
The space
Welcome to your Luxury Guest House Located 2 minutes away from Colonial Golf Club ,6 Minute to Eagle Rock Golf club ,2Mintes to Rec Center and surrounded by multiple lakes and Golf clubs and equipped with pool Table & Air Hockey games, Sightseeing Front Balcony,office space for remote work, where relaxation, fun, and ease unite in a sprawling 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom sanctuary, just 14 minutes away from (YEG) Edmonton International Airport.


Our home comfortably accommodates up to 8-10 people, making it perfect for families or groups.

Location During your stay, you'll enjoy:

-Experience fun Entertainment with family and friends- A pool table & Air hockey games are ready for you to play.

- Flexible stays with discounted rates for weekly and monthly bookings.

- Hassle-free check-in with a keypad entry system.

-Single-family home with 4 bedrooms , 3 full washroom and Large front Balcony.

-One Main floor bedroom ideal for seniors / Guest who face difficulties to climb stairs-1 Queen Bed.

-3 Upstairs bedrooms: 2 bed rooms with queen beds and master bedroom with queen and two twins mattress.

-3 Full washroom, 1on main floor and two in 2nd floor.

-Fully equipped kitchen with Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Keurig coffee machine, Instant-pot, and much more.

-Outside security cameras and alarm system.

- Two living room with 65 and 55 inch SMART TV in the living room for your entertainment with Amazon Prime and movies.

- A dedicated workspace complete with an office chair and table.

- Complimentary high-speed internet for uninterrupted connectivity.

- Extra linens, comforters, and towels for added comfort.

- Free parking, including a double garage.

- Professional cleaning services to keep your space pristine.

- Safety features such as a Fire Extinguisher, Smoke and CO2 detector.

- Convenient laundry facilities with detergent and softener provided.

- Toiletries like shampoo, conditioner, and body wash included.

-Ironing Box, Hair Dryer, Toothpaste, Hair gel, Deodorant, etc..


Attractions Nearby

- A 25 minute drive to the fascinating West Edmonton Mall.

- A 13 minute drive to South Edmonton Common, a bustling shopping and entertainment area.

- A 14 minute drive to Edmonton International Airport.

- 20 Minutes to University of Alberta .

- Just a 4 minute drive to Beaumont Sports & Recreation Center.

- Quick access to Edmonton South Common , Airport Mall, and South Gate Mall, All 3 are just minutes away.

-Police and Fire Station- 5 Minutes away for immediate help.

-Grey nuns Hospital- Just 15 Minutes away for emergency situation.
Royal Alexandra Hospital &Children Stollery Hospital 19 minutes away .

-Located just 26 minutes from Edmonton downtown

-19 minutes to Leduc.

-39Minutes to Wetaskiwin,

-27 minutes to Sherwood Park,

-45 minutes to Camrose, and St. Albert.

Amenities Features

Lake access within walking distance, Colonial Golf club just 3 minutes away,

Registry, Rec center, community center, and library within 4 minutes.

Canadian/Asian/Indian grocery stores , fast food and restaurants within 5 minutes

—No frills, Safeway, Dollar store,7/11, Demo, Shell, McDonald's Tim Hortons, Wendy's, Subway, Wild wings, sea change, Joys fresh, work box, A &w and more than 6 pizza shops.
Guest access
Guests have full access to the entire property, include unfinished basement where Pool table , Air Hockey and Kids play Toys located.

Temporarily Access restricted to Backyard Garage use ,As this is a newly constructed property, landscaping and patio work are currently in progress in the backyard, making it unavailable for guest use at this time.

However, guests are welcome to enjoy and make themselves at home in all other areas of the property. We really appreciate for your understanding as we work to improve the outdoor spaces for future enjoyment. We hope you have a delightful stay on your beautiful guest home.
Other things to note
Back yard has no fence , Access to the backyard and Garage has been restricted due to the grading work .Only street parking available now.

Property Title: 1 Bedroom in 3 Bedroom Townhouse
Description:
3 Beds 2 Baths - Townhouse

Available Sept 1

Looking for another responsible female to take over a room in our 3 bedroom townhouse in Clayton Park. This unit is great for a student or working professional. 

Rent is $768.25 + electricity (~$35) + Wi-Fi ($31) + heat a month 

Apartment is fully furnished, the bedroom is unfurnished. 

Main level: 
- Porch area 
- dining room
- Kitchen (with dishwasher) 
- Living room (with fireplace)
- bathroom 

Top level:
- bedrooms and main bathroom 

Bottom level: 
- Rec room with some weight lifting equipment, couch 
- storage room with in unit washer and dryer 

Street parking is available

There is currently 2 sweet cats living in the house as well. 

There' a bus stop right outside the apartment that takes you right to downtown. We are close to the Lacewood Terminal and busses that run to universities.  
Basic living essentials are right across the road including Sobeys, Dollarama, McDonald’s, Tim Hortons,  fit for less gym and more! 
 
We are two female working professionals so another mature student or working professional would be preferred. 

Send us a message telling us a bit about yourself

Property Title: Home stay home for student with meals room 1
Description: We an older family that does home stay. For the past 25 years, we’ve accommodated students from China, Japan, Korea, Spain, and Iran. We’ve enjoyed very much doing this. We believe that students that come here need to focus on their studies, which is why we include meals and cleaning we provide breakfast and lunch while they’ll we’ll take care of their own dinner. There is weekly cleaning of the bedroom and bathroom so the house as a whole stays tidy they get to do their own laundry once a week possibly twice on weekends or after 7 PM the washroom is entirely for them and another student, but there may be times that it’s only for them as we usually do one student at a time. But sometimes we have another student if anything they’ll be sharing only between two people them and one other person we would like to have the household stay quiet at a certain time as I am in my late 40s and my parents are in their 70s. (but honestly my parents are at times younger than I am in attitude lol) my mother Rosa is the person that cooks here and sometimes I pitch in. I live in the basement in my own apartment with my cat. This house does have a cat so you must be OK with it. We like to do a minimum stay of four months and maximum of a year linen will get washed biweekly. No food is allowed in the bedroom as it needs to be eaten in the kitchen. If you have your own food that you would be cooking for dinner, you would be cooking in a separate area of the house that has a toaster oven and an induction plate. we are in Italian Canadian family. My parents immigrated here from Italy from the 60s and I was born here. We like to sit around and talk sometimes. You won’t go hungry in this house and you won’t ever have to worry about hygiene. There’s an area for you to store your food and we do typically have family friends that pass by as we’re a very social family.

Property Title: Large and Sunny Whole apartment (2 bedroom) with balcony in East Vancouver - short term stays only
Description:
My husband and I travel frequently and would like to offer up our apartment to rent to refugees while we are away. The apartment has 2 available bedrooms, one with a queen size bed and one with a twin bed and would be perfect for families to stay for a short time period. The apartment is on the second floor of a mid-century house with a large sunny balcony. It is fully furnished, with bedding, towels, cookware, dishes, and utensils all provided for use. The apartment has a washer/dryer, electric stove, and a dishwasher in the large kitchen. There is a single large bathroom with a shower and bathtub, containing two bathroom sinks and a bidet attachment on the toilet. Heating, electricity, hot and cold water, TV streaming all included in the rental price. High speed internet is $100/month and is charged as the utility fee.

We have some house plants that we hope the tenants could water once a week while they stay. Otherwise, our downstairs neighbor could come by once a week to care for the houseplants. We have a portable AC unit, but the apartment can get hot in the summer. We own a cat who we take with us on our travels, and we keep the place very clean, but our place may not be good for someone with severe cat allergies.

This arrangement would be for short-term stays only, lasting for a few weeks to a couple of months, depending on how long we will be out of town and our place is empty. We will be getting in housecleaners to deep-clean the apartment in between guest stays. The rental price basically just covers the cost of professional housecleaning.

Property Title: Bedroom in a two-bedroom condo apartment in Wellington West/Westboro, Ottawa
Description:
The condominium is six stories tall and about ten years old. The unit has a shared kitchen and living area, two bedroom, one full bathroom (attached to the rented beroom), and another bedroom with a sink and a toilet. The host will need to access the full bathroom 2-3 times a week in evenings to shower.

The rented bedroom is large and has an attached closet with hangers, but is mostly unfurnished; renter will need to buy bed and bedding. This is because I want to be able to use the room for other things again when I stop renting, and don’t want a bed there permanently. However, to compensate for this, rent is very low. A table and chair for desk space, and a bedside lamp is included. There are pictures and wall hangings in the bedroom, but I can move any of them if you don’t want them or want to put up your own pictures and hangings in place of them.

In the kitchen, we can share kitchenware as well as flour, sugar, spices, cooking oil, etc., and we will get out own shelves for other food in the cupboard and fridge, and each use half the freezer.

There is a balcony - not much use in winter but very nice in summer.

The location is excellent: across the street from a grocery store, with two other grocery stores nearby, and close to transit (across the street from the #11 bus stop, which runs downtown, and a 10-15 minute walk from the Tunney’s Pasture O-Train station.

I still need to do a few things (buy a fire extinguisher, install bedroom door locks, put up curtains in the rented bedroom), so the room is not available until mid-January at earliest.

Property Title: Bright, spacious and safe
Description:
AVAILABLE MARCH 1
Meadowvale Mississauga 

I am an ENGLISH and SPANISH speaking professional seeking for someone who is looking for a place to call home(on a LONG TERM basis) to share with me and two other lovely ladies. 

If you are a mature, quiet, non smoking FEMALE with no pets, have a DEPOSIT, and first and last month's rent and would like to live in a supportive, clean, peaceful, friendly and safe environment, please let me know. 

The bedroom (NOT SHARED) is a good size, bright and FULLY FURNISHED. It is next to one of two full bathrooms. It has a great serene view. 

$700 per month includes utilities, laundry facilities, unlimited high speed Internet and common shared house supplies. 

Each lady is provided with own kitchen, fridge, bathroom and linen closet SPACE. 
The Kitchen is FULLY EQUIPPED. 

My home is bright, spacious, clean , peaceful and conveniently located within a 10 minute walk to the Meadowvale Town Centre, the Community Centre, Lake Aquatine, library, plazas, Fresco, No Frills, etc. 

The bus stop going to Meadowvale Town Centre's bus terminal, Meadowvale Go bus & train station, Erin Mills Town Centre, South Common mall and Credit Valley hospital is right outside the house. 
One EXPRESS bus to Sheridan college, Sq. One and Kipling subway station.

BASIC HOUSE RULES will be discussed in person. 

SERIOUS ENQUIRERS ONLY PLEASE 

                  WELCOME HOME :)

Property Title: Bedroom in a shared home close to Algonquin College
Description: My house (named "St. Anne's Bungalow") is a 3 bedroom bungalow in a quiet neighbourhood close to Algonquin College. I own the house and have one long-term female renter. Everyone in the house has their own bedroom and share bathrooms, kitchen and common areas.  Bedroom is furnished. There is a full bathroom with shower/tub on the main floor and an additional washroom with only a toilet in the basement. There is a sunny living room/dining room on the main floor and a rec room with a TV in the basement, providing multiple places to spend time in the house. Laundry and storage is also available in the basement. The yard has multiple gardens and is nice to sit in. The neighbourhood is safe and friendly with nearby access to parks, trails, wading pool and tennis courts. The 50 and 88 bus routes are nearby and it is a 1.5 km walk to Iris Transit station. Parking and bike storage is also available.

Property Title: Available clean and spacious 5 bedrooms in a townhouse and 2 bathrooms for individuals and or family for rent
Description:
Cozy Furnished 5-Bed, 2-Bath Townhouse in Brantford - Perfect for Families, individuals or Groups!

Welcome to your charming retreat in Brantford! This well-maintained townhouse offers 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, providing ample space for everyone. it could be occupied by a family or rented to individuals.

This home exudes comfort and functionality. With 3 bedrooms upstairs and 2 in the basement, there's room for privacy and relaxation.

The kitchen comes fully furnished with all the essentials for your culinary needs, and the separate living and dining areas offer distinct spaces for gathering and unwinding.

Conveniently located near Highway 403, commuting is a breeze, and with a bus stop right beside the building, transportation is at your doorstep. Also located near schools, parks, and amenities, this townhouse provides easy access to everything Brantford has to offer.

Don't miss out on this opportunity - schedule a viewing today and make this charming, furnished townhouse your new home!

Property Title: Walk out Suite Double Bed and Single Closet Bedroom
Description:
Welcome to our fully furnished, legal, 2 bedroom walkout suite at 11142 A. My husband (Jasper) and I (Melissa) occupy the 3 bed, 2 bath upstairs of this generational home. Built in 1991, this home was built by my parents after acquiring it from my maternal grandfather. We completely renovated and turned our basement into a lovely 2 bedroom and 1 bath suite. Renovations were completed end of Nov 2023.

The two bed suite will share the same kitchen, laundry, bathroom and common space. The bedrooms would be your own private space. The suite boasts of a lovely urban view from the kitchen, living room and queen bedroom and lots of natural light. The suite also has it's own private walk out entrance with coded door (no need to worry about keys).

We are about a 10-15 min walk from a park and beach, tennis courts and rail trail. It is also less than a 5 min walk to a bus stop that can take you into Lake Country as well as UBCO. You can transfer from UBCO to get to Kelowna area. It is about a 15 min drive to UBCO by car.

A little bit more about my husband and I. We got married in March of 2020 and are an active, boisterous and vivacious couple. Though we have good sound proofing in the home, you may hear us laughing together, singing or dancing. We live life and enjoy our community and friends. If you are up for it, we would have you in our space for dinner or games night on occasion. My husband is a hard working, honest, straight shooting kind of guy who loves working on meat smoking projects and cooking. He works in the construction industry and usually is working hard Mon to Fri. I'm generally a smiley, energetic and busy human. I have my own contracting business teaching first aid, lifeguarding and swim courses. My schedule varies depending on season. My husband and I love dancing, games, hiking, outdoors, good shows and time with our community. We hope you feel welcome and safe in our home.

The house has central heating and air conditioner, wifi, tv, iron and board,
We have internet, tvs, luggage racks, parking and more.
We are only 10 minutes from Pearson International Airport. Enjoy free leisure ice skating at Albion Arena.  Enjoy Flagstaff pool and park where you can swim, play tennis, basketball, and use the playground. If you have young children they will enjoy the splash pad and playground at Sunnydale park 
3 min. walking distance from Just a Room. We are 6 minutes from the Great Canadian Casino (Woodbine Casino), Woodbine Mall, Fantasy Fair and there are so many restaurants for you to choose from.  Wet'nWild Water Park is 12 min. drive and Canada's Wonderland is only a 20 min. drive and the CN Tower is only a 37 minute drive or you can experience our TTC bus and subway transit.  
We look forward to hosting you as our guests.
To book please message.  Book  with confidence as we are an Authorized Short Term Rental Operator in the City of Toronto STR-2405-FXLRVR.

Description:
Furnished 1-Bedroom, 1-Bathroom Suite in Quiet Family Neighborhood

Features:

	•	Kitchenette access with new appliances: fridge, microwave, air fryer, induction hub, water boiler, kitchen cabinets, and sink
	•	Air purifier
	•	Smoke and carbon monoxide detectors
	•	Emergency lighting
	•	Keypad lock for secure entry

Utilities Included:

	•	Water and hot water
	•	Electricity
	•	Wi Fi access

Other Amenities:

	•	One parking space is included
	•	No pets, no smoking inside or on the property
	•	No house parties

Lease Terms:

	•	Fixed-term lease: October 2024 to March 2025 (with the possibility of a new fixed lease after that period)
	•	Damage deposit: half a month’s rent required

Location Highlights (Bedford):
