Property Title: Small Affordable Room
Description:
I am looking for a room mate to come live in the centrally located apartment that I live in. A 5 minute drive to downtown or Orchard Park Mall, and it is also a 5 minute walk to stops on the #10 bus route that goes downtown and to Orchard Park Mall. There is an unfurnished den (7' x 8') and a bathroom right beside that would be shared with another room mate staying in the other bed room, an in suite washer and dryer, a fridge and freezer, a dishwasher, and an oven, stove and microwave. There is also storage space. The rent is $450 per month, plus internet monthly and utilities bi-monthly. You will also be required to pay a $225 damage deposit. There is also a large patio that one can enjoy most of the year. The room is available on October 1st.

What I'm looking for: A reliable person preferably in the 25-35 age range, who pays their rent and bills on time, is respectful of the boundaries and the belongings of the people they live with, is clean, friendly and smoke and drug free (including weed). I would prefer someone who doesn't have a pet, but if you do, I would consider it depending on the pet, however you would be required to pay a pet deposit of $225.

About me: I am a 30 year old man who is a working professional in the museum and heritage industry full time and I also work a part time job in the arts and culture industry. I like going to karaoke, playing board games, hanging out with friends (though at home I am a good mix of introvert and extrovert, some days I want to be by myself and other times I can be pretty chatty). I am relatively laid back, but I will uphold my boundaries and will speak my mind if issues arise. I am also a fairly clean person (especially in the kitchen).

If you are interested, please send me a message to discuss details further and potentially set up a viewing.

Property Title: Bright Walkout Legal Suite in West Kelowna
Description:
Newly Renovated Legal Suite in West Kelowna. Located in a quiet neighbourhood with access to hiking and bike trails just a 5 minute walk away. Quick access (under 15 minutes) to skiing, and snowshoeing, professional services, grocery stores, and other shopping. Quick routes to Peachland/South Okanagan and the Highway 97C to reach the Lower Mainland. Less than 50 meters to the nearest bus stop as well, easy access to the 97 bus route to the university or airport.

This suite features:
- Private entrance with key/code lock.
- Bathroom with full sized tub, and full sized stacking washer/dryer.
- Full sized kitchen with Dishwasher, Microwave, Range/Oven. (Range hood vents outside)
- Lots of windows, and good natural light all day.
- Private utilities, electrical, internet, and hot water tank.
- Very large parking pad with 15amp GFCI plug at the pad, also pre-wired for a level 2 EV charger. The parking pad can easily accommodate larger vehicles.

This suite was just renovated and has not been occupied before. Brand new electrical and plumbing. All new cabinets and counters.
The suite is currently unfurnished, but can be furnished upon request with:
- Large Couch and Coffee Table.
- Queen Sized Bed with Pillows.
- Bedding, linens, and towels.
- Dresser with 6 Drawers
- Bar height dining table with height adjustable stools
- Closet hangers

Some storage available for seasonal/larger items in our garage attic storage. Ideal for items that are not temperature sensitive, since it is not climate controlled.

Property Title: Room for rent in Ottawa; very close to Algonquin College - FEMALES only
Description:
Furnished room for rent available for 1 person (female only). Room is situated in a condo at the corner of Baseline and Clyde for $700 per month. Bus stop right outside the building, less than 10 minutes by bus ride to Algonquin/Baseline station/College Square. 5 minute walk to Walmart and Loblaws. Nearby restaurants and take out.

Monthly rent includes the following
- all utilities (hydro, electricity, heating)
- internet
- monthly cleaning for common areas (living room, kitchen, bathroom, hallways)
- tenant is responsible for cleaning their own room on a regular basis. Cleaning lady will not do deep cleaning
- fully furnished room: brand new bed, dresser closet, desk and fan unit (tenant must bring their own bedding)
- laundry room available in the basement of the building (common area). $2 per load
- no parking, if you wish to have parking you may inquire with other landlords in the building for renting a parking space
- shared bathroom and kitchen
- Minimum lease for 1 year

Tenant will be living alone for 3-4 months per year (winter months).

House/building rules:
- shared kitchen, bathroom, living room and dining room
- be mindful to other person living in the condo
- advise of guests that will be coming over
- no pets
- no smokers
- no heavy noise after 11pm

For more information or viewings please call or send a text message to 613-862-5830 or email luciavanoordt@yahoo.com

Serious inquiries only. Strictly females.

Property Title: Private Furnished 2 Bedroom 1 Bedroom Pet Friendly Oct 31
Description:
West Kelowna, 2 bedroom, 1 bath, pets ok


2 bedroom, 1 bathroom, fully furnished, pet friendly, above ground walkout suite, in newer, modern, executive home, in safe upscale neighbourhood. The suite is legal, newer, built to a high standard, and safety inspected. Retired quiet senior landlord lives upstairs.

Newer stainless steel appliances. Fridge, stove, dishwasher, microwave. Shared laundry/washer and dryer. Central air conditioning. Gas heat. Gas fireplace. No bathtub, shower only. Furnished, also has kitchen utensils. Garage is not included. Level off street concrete parking on flat driveway. 

The pics do not show the newer furniture. Master bedroom has a king size bed. Second bedroom has bunk beds, with a queen size mattress on the bottom. 3 smart TVs. Large sectional in the living room.

Level entrance, no stairs. Large gardening area. Very bright and sunny, with lots of large windows.

This home is on a quiet street, 1 block to the beach, and a few minutes walk to a dog friendly beach. Very close to the off leash dog park, Gellately Bay 3 km promenade along the lake, boat launch, marina, yacht club,  swim dock, playgrounds, picnic areas, Glen Canyon Regional Park hiking trails, and sandy beaches. Quick and easy access to Hwy 97. 3 minutes to downtown Westbank shopping, banks, restaurants, etc. Golf course is a 4 minute drive. 15 minutes to downtown Kelowna.

Clean, quiet, mature, respectful, and responsible people only. 

Pets allowed. No smoking, vaping, drugs, or cannabis, anywhere on the property. No heavy drinkers. Absolutely no parties or loud music. This is a quiet family home, senior owner lives upstairs.

Previous verifiable landlord references, or proof of home ownership required.

To schedule a viewing, please answer the following?

How many people, pets, and vehicles?
Age, weight, and breed of all pets? 
Do you have any trailers, motorcycles, boats, toys?

Where do you work?
Why are you moving?
When are you wanting to move?
How long of a tenancy are you looking for?

Available Oct 31
$2,400 + 50% utilities.

Property Title: Coldstream room close to college,  Kelowna buses and 5 minutes walk to Kal beach
Description: We are offering a charming single bedroom in a peaceful, multi-generational home shared by Sonya, her spouse, her mother, and their UBCO student son, along with two friendly cats. Located in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood, this home boasts an unbeatable view of Kalamalka Lake, and the beach is just a few minutes' walk from the garden gate. The room measuring 94.5 sqft (7.58 sqm) is situated in a fully finished basement. While it may be compact, the space-saving design of the bedroom makes it comfortable and functional. There are plenty of shared living areas in the home, all offering beautiful views. The large, fully remodeled modern bathroom (with shower) is just steps away from the bedroom. There is parking available on the driveway, as well as on the street. The location is convenient, with a bus stop to Vernon located opposite Kalamalka Beach. The Rail Trail Café and Alexander's Pub are only a 10-minute walk away. Additionally, the Alpine Centre, just 1.3 km away, features a pizzeria, bookstore, gym, and physiotherapists. For cycling enthusiasts, there are bike paths leading to Vernon Okanagan College, which is about 2.2 km away and the recreational rail trail, along the edge of the lake, starts only 1 km from the house. Buses to Kelowna and the University of British Columbia (UBCO) depart from Okanagan College. This is a perfect location for someone seeking a tranquil, nature-filled environment with easy access to local amenities, public transport, and nearby attractions. If you're looking for a cozy room in a welcoming family home with breathtaking lake views, we’d love to hear from you!

Property Title: Furnished bedroom in two bedroom apartment
Description:
Only verified accounts will be shown the room. 
Move in date: as soon as possible. 
Move out date: to be determined.

Must be prepared to fill out occupant application for the building landlord. 
Deposit is expected once your application has been approved. Deposit = half one month rent. Second half of rent will be paid before you are handed the keys on the day you move in. 

The apartment is on the fourth floor of a four story secure building in Clayton Park. No elevator. It is a fully furnished bedroom with a large closet, double bed with storage, large desk, and window. The apartment and building are well maintained and clean. There is coin operated laundry in the building. The apartment is decorated nicely to ensure a warm and cozy home. There is street parking or you can pay extra for a parking spot (will need to inquire about cost). A shelf in the kitchen and a shelf in the fridge will be offered to the student to keep their food organized and separate if preferred. The kitchen has all needed appliances for cooking and these items will be shared. Towels are available if required. Student will be responsible for helping to keep the apartment and their bedroom clean; cleaning the kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, living room after they use it and helping to take out the trash. Student is expected to wash their dishes by hand after use - apartment does not have a dishwasher. Bus stop is directly outside building and lacewood bus terminal is a 15 minute walk from the building. Grocery store, pharmacy, shopping plaza, fast food, gas station are all 5-10 minute walk from the building. Student is welcome to have guests but no parties and they should inform host beforehand. Host works shift work so student is expected to be fairly independent.

Property Title: Clay Studio Suite
Description:
This newly renovated, semi-private daylit basement suite offers a unique living experience on Fabulous Farm, a working farm with pigs, chickens, gardens, and all the lively, natural elements that come with rural life. Expect the occasional noise and dirt from the farm, along with a gravel driveway and plenty of activity. The suite features its own entrance, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, freezer, stove, oven, and washer (no dryer). The kitchen and living areas are yours to furnish and use as you like, giving you the feel of a private home.

The suite includes a private bedroom and a beautiful Moroccan Tadelakt-finished bathroom. While the bathroom is primarily yours (90%), it is occasionally shared with clients from the active pottery studio, who access it directly from the back entrance without entering the rest of your space.

Fabulous Farm is a community hub, with six cabins and people frequently coming and going. Two people and two friendly cats live upstairs, and the door between the upstairs and your space is a standard interior door without a lock. While you’ll have all you need for a private life in the suite, expect occasional visits from housemates. You’re also welcome to visit upstairs, socialize, or join the community life.

The suite itself is bright and warm in the winter, thanks to radiant heat in the clay walls and floors. In the summer, it stays naturally cool, providing comfort year-round. For tenants who stay longer, there’s also the opportunity to access garden space on the farm.

If you love a social, rural atmosphere and are looking for a farm life, this space could be perfect for you.

The room has a large standard closet, east-facing windows, and shares a bathroom with two roommates.

Our home is located in the vibrant Notre-Dame-de-Grâce (NDG) neighborhood of Montreal. NDG is known for its family-friendly atmosphere, diverse community, and beautiful parks. Come and experience the tranquility and comfort we cherish every day.

Property Title: Clean, Spacious bedroom
Description:
This cozy 1,040 sq ft basement suite features two spacious bedrooms, a full bathroom, a functional kitchen, and the convenience of in-suite laundry with a washer and dryer. Additional perks include free street parking, free shed storage, and exterior security cameras for added safety.

The location is ideal, with bus routes #58 and #43 just a 2-minute walk away. You’re a short 4-minute drive to scenic bike and walking trails, as well as No Frills, Walmart, Shoppers, and Planet Fitness — or about 20 minutes by bus. A beautiful park is also situated right across the street for easy access to green space and a big back yard for added green space to enjoy.

All utilities are included, and rent is negotiable for the right roommate. This property maintains a quiet, respectful atmosphere, so partying, smoking, and excessive drinking are not allowed. If you’re looking for a peaceful and well-connected place to call home, this could be a perfect fit!

For everyone to be comfortable, it will not be co-ed. It would be either two males or two females.

Property Title: Cozy Private Bedroom with private Bathroom in East Van Laneway House
Description:
Available: Dec 1, 2024

Note: Furniture in room belongs to last roommate. This room will be furnished with different bed and desk

Experience comfortable living in this charming private bedroom with its own private detached bathroom in a modern 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom laneway house. Located in the vibrant East Vancouver neighborhood near Rupert Street and 1st Avenue, this rental offers the perfect blend of privacy and convenience.

## Property Details:

- Private bedroom in a 3-bedroom laneway house
-Your own Detached private bathroom
- Shared kitchen and living areas
- Close to public transit, including Rupert SkyTrain station
- Easy access to shopping and amenities on Hastings Street and Grandview Highway

## Neighborhood Highlights:

- Walking distance to Rupert Park and its Pitch 'N' Putt golf course
- Near the "East Village" stretch along Hastings Street, featuring unique shops and eateries
- Quick access to Downtown Vancouver via Hastings corridor
- Close to major retailers on Grandview Highway

## Extra $49 includes not included in rent

- Utilities
- High-speed internet available
-Laundry
-Kitchen use


- Exceptions
- Off street parking
- No pets allowed
- Suitable for working professionals/students

## About Your Roommates:

Join two friendly, working professionals who were born and raised in Canada. We're excited to welcome you to our welcoming home and create a positive living environment. Our laid-back and respectful attitudes make for a great shared living experience.

Don't miss this opportunity to live in a desirable East Vancouver location with excellent transit connections, a variety of local amenities, and great roommates. Contact us to schedule a viewing or for more information about this fantastic rental opportunity. We look forward to meeting you and potentially sharing our home!

Property Title: Spacious 1 bed + den in the best building in downtown Dartmouth!
Description:
**1 BED + DEN** 

Sublet available in the best building in downtown Dartmouth - Lotus Point! 

Sublet date: Available December 1st (or potentially earlier) to September 1, 2025 with an option to renew the lease yourself at that point. 

Apartment Information: Top floor, approx. 1000 sq. ft., 1 bedroom plus den and 2 full bathrooms. In suite laundry, air conditioning and tons of storage space. Private balcony overlooking green space. Very quiet. 

Building Information: main floor gym and social room, storage room for bicycles and tires, rooftop balcony with shared bbq and amazing views of Dartmouth/Halifax. Very well managed and friendly tenants. Super walkable location, minutes to restaurants, cafes, Banook Lake, and Alderney landing. 

Included in rent: 
- Heat/hot water 
- Storage locker

Property Title: Full house for a big family
Description:
This is a whole house for long-term rent for a big family. 
Showings by appointment only.
Freshly renovated and upgraded - Four bedrooms, one home office room. Additionally, a finished, massive basement.
The house is in the Henderson area of Terrace Hill, just off Highway 403 and closer to the Brantford Golf Course and Country Club. It is also within walking distance of James Hiller Public School, Lansdowne Constain Public School, St. John's College, and Tollgate Technological Skills Centre. Brantford General Hospital is within walking distance. The house is loaded with new appliances—a Haier washer, dryer, dishwasher, cooking range, and refrigerator, all under extended warranty for six to seven years.

This light-filled home offers four bedrooms, a bath and a half, a spacious deck with ceiling fans for entertaining or relaxing, plenty of yard space for the kids to blow off steam, and natural gas hooks up for your BBQ on the deck.
Corner lot with plenty of curb appeal and three sides of mature yard to flaunt.
The spacious living room is completed with a fireplace to keep Jack Frost at bay during those cold winter nights.
The nicely sized dining room offers space to have the whole family over for a celebration!
The fully renovated, well-equipped kitchen offers a built-in breakfast table and hardwood countertops on light-coloured cabinetry.

Two good-sized bedrooms and a full four-piece bath complete the bright main level. The upper level boasts two good-sized bedrooms, one with a play area for the kids, or a home office, or a love zone for couples! Each bedroom offers a large walk-in closet with a cedar-lined nook to keep winter wraps safe over the warmer months. The upper level has half the washroom.

This home provides plenty of much-needed storage space. The garden shed has a hydro connection, making it a breeze to find stored items. The one-car garage has an automatic door and multiple hydro plugins. Plus, there is parking space for four additional cars in the long driveway.
A secluded massive covered patio outside the dining room window offers morning or afternoon reflection space.

A good credit history and current good score are required.
Long-term lease preferred.
We can wait for a suitable tenant family.
Please provide us with a brief introduction about your family and how this home could be the best fit for you all. We will not entertain queries without brief introductions. We can wait for a suitable family, as we care for our neighbours, too.
Please get in touch with us if only you are seriously interested. Thanks for your time and interest.

Property Title: Coldstream spacious room close to Vernon college, Kelowna buses & 5 minutes walk to Kal beach
Description: We are offering a spacious bedroom in a peaceful, multi-generational home shared by Sonya, her spouse, her mother, and their UBCO student son & two friendly cats. Located in a quiet, family-friendly neighborhood, this home on 4 levels boasts an unbeatable view of Kalamalka Lake, and the beach is just a few minutes' walk from the garden gate. The room measuring 141.75 sqft (13.15 sqm) is situated on the main floor of the house right next to a large, fully remodeled modern bathroom (with shower). There are plenty of shared living areas in the home, all offering beautiful views. Parking available on the driveway, as well as on the street. The location is convenient, with a bus stop to Vernon located opposite Kalamalka Beach. The Rail Trail Café and Alexander's Pub are only a 10-minute walk away. Additionally, the Alpine Centre, just 1.3 km away, features a pizzeria, bookstore, gym, and physiotherapists. For cycling enthusiasts, there are bike paths leading to Vernon Okanagan College, which is about 2.2 km away and the recreational rail trail, along the edge of the lake, starts only 1 km from the house. Buses to Kelowna and the University of British Columbia (UBCO) depart from Okanagan College. This is a perfect location for someone seeking a tranquil, nature-filled environment with easy access to local amenities, public transport, and nearby attractions. If you're looking for a cozy room in a welcoming family home with breathtaking lake views, we’d love to hear from you!

Property Title: "Safe, Clean, and Affordable Student Rentals in Hammonds Plains Halifax
Description:
The Owner Of This Executive Property Is Moving Abroad For A Few Years And Are Looking To Rent This Amazing  Home To Students For 2025.

We are looking for responsible students who will take care of this home and its contents,

Looking for a spacious, comfortable, and fully furnished home just 20 minutes from downtown Halifax, and 20 minutes from the airport.  Welcome to this executive rental in Hammonds Plains, Nova Scotia, ideal for students.

Located just a 15-minute walk from the bus stop, grocery stores, restaurants, and on the border of Bedford, this home offers convenience and access to all the amenities you'll need.

Inside, every comfort is at your fingertips. Private rooms provide quiet personal space, while the master suite offers a luxurious escape with an ensuite jacuzzi tub. A large outdoor deck with a BBQ and an all-year-round hot tub adds to the relaxation.

The home comes fully furnished, complete with a rec room featuring a small gym for students to stay active, and parking for up to 15 cars, including a double heated garage.

For shared living, enjoy a fully equipped kitchen with two large fridge-freezer combos, a dishwasher, and plenty of space for meal prep. Internet and cable TV are included, while electricity is extra.

As an added bonus, there's an accessory dwelling on the property, housing another student, offering even more flexibility.

Don't miss out on the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and community in this wonderful Hammonds Plains home."

Please Note That This Is Offered For Students Only Rental. No Pets Please!!!
The Price Is Per Room which includes all amenities mentioned but excludes hydro.

Application forms available on request.

Property Title: private and spacious in-law suite in Dartmouth
Description:
Welcome to 45 Belle Vista Drive, a peaceful retreat on a quiet street near parks and playgrounds and just minutes from grocery stores and restaurants. This spacious 1-bedroom apartment has a private entrance and driveway, on-site (Shared) laundry, Wi-Fi, and a smart TV to log into your streaming accounts.

The kitchen is equipped with stove, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, pots and pans, tea kettle, and toaster. Looking to borrow an appliance? Let us know and we'll be happy to lend you something if we're able.

We are happy to provide dishes, towels, bedding, etc.

We’re conveniently located on a bus route, with easy access to transit. Downtown Dartmouth is just a 10-minute drive away, and you can reach Halifax in 20 minutes. 

When the seasons allow, you'll have patio chairs and a coffee table to enjoy your coffee in the sun. Our private backyard is its own oasis, and if you’re comfortable sharing, we're happy to arrange for you to explore and enjoy it alongside our family.

A few things to know:
•	Though the apartment ceiling is perfectly sized for anyone, the entrance is a bit short from the outside. When entering, please be aware that there is a step down into the space. We don't want you to trip!
•	To access the bathroom, you'll need to step up into it.

Property Title: Private Bedroom with private Bathroom in East Van Laneway Hse
Description:
Available: Dec 1, 2024

Note: Furniture in room belongs to last roommate. This room will be furnished with different bed and desk

Experience comfortable living in this charming private bedroom with its own PRIVATE BATHROOM in a modern 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom laneway house. Located in the vibrant East Vancouver neighborhood near Rupert Street and 1st Avenue, this rental offers the perfect blend of privacy and convenience.

## Property Details:

- Private bedroom in a 3-bedroom laneway house
-Your own Detached private bathroom
- Shared kitchen and living areas
- Close to public transit, including Rupert SkyTrain station
- Easy access to shopping and amenities on Hastings Street and Grandview Highway

## Neighborhood Highlights:

- Walking distance to Rupert Park and its Pitch 'N' Putt golf course
- Near the "East Village" stretch along Hastings Street, featuring unique shops and eateries
- Quick access to Downtown Vancouver via Hastings corridor
- Close to major retailers on Grandview Highwway

Included in rent

- Utilities
- High-speed internet available
-Laundry
-Kitchen use


- Exceptions
- Off street parking
- No pets allowed
- Suitable for working professionals/students

## About Your Roommates:

Join two friendly, working professionals who were born and raised in Canada. We're excited to welcome you to our welcoming home and create a positive living environment. Our laid-back and respectful attitudes make for a great shared living experience.

Don't miss this opportunity to live in a desirable East Vancouver location with excellent transit connections, a variety of local amenities, and great roommates. Contact us to schedule a viewing or for more information about this fantastic rental opportunity. We look forward to meeting you and potentially sharing our home!

Property Title: Modern new lower level suite in Cranbrook
Description:
Enjoy comfort and privacy in our new modern lower-level suite. This suite offers 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with laundry. There is an open concept kitchen and living area where guests can relax and watch a movie or prepare food and dine. Both bathrooms carry full size bathtubs with showers. Equipped with granite countertops, heated towel racks and a cozy living area, guests can enjoy in this centrally located part of Cranbrook while within walking distance of the East Kootenay Regional Hospital, College of the Rockies, a coffee shop, and a bus stop only a block away.

The suite offers a private entrance and private fenced outdoor patio with a BBQ, table, and chairs. There is no shared space.

Each bedroom contains a lockable door with key, window with curtains, dresser and closet, smoke/carbon monoxide alarms, a desk with lamp and chair, lots of below bed suitcase storage space, and an extra blanket and bed sheets.

Bedroom 1 is suited with a queen bed and private ensuite; bedroom 2 has the largest footprint and is suited with a king bed; bedroom 3 is suited with a double bed and small walk-in closet.

Winters stay warm with adjustable thermostats in each room; summers stay cool with AC above, keeping temperatures hovering around 17-18 degrees with no heat turned on.

The smart TV has over 350 free channels provided but guests are also welcome to log into their personal streaming services such as Netflix, prime video,  Disney plus, and others

If walking from the College of the Rockies the quickest route is the path straight off of 24th Ave S (goes beside the fire department) and connects to 3rd St S. This takes about 15 minutes (google maps however recommends a longer route). Also only a 2 minute walk away from bus stop on 3rd St S.

Property Title: Stylish 1-Bedroom Condo with Rooftop Deck, Gym, Workspace
Description:
Great for corporate guests, a brand new fully-equipped one bedroom condo featuring a workspace, secured parking, new appliances and barbecue, patio with view, and Queen bed with soft linens.

Our elegantly furnished 640 sqft one bedroom one bathroom condo plus den, with secured underground parking, has everything you need to make this your home for the next little while - located on the 3rd floor with a balcony facing south west with an abundance of natural light.

Enjoy the space we've designed for you, featuring an full modern kitchen, inviting living spaces, a sleek bathroom, ultra-quiet appliances, quartz countertops, custom closets, 9-foot ceilings, and chrome and black fixtures - stylishly and elegantly furnished for anyone looking for the feel of an upscale vacation property. Here, timeless simplicity meets modern elegance and luxuries.

Our property also features a gorgeous rooftop deck and gym for your use during your stay, complete with Kuerig coffee maker, coffee pods, an air fryer, a barbecue, and blender. Enjoy amenities like a second-floor multi-purpose room and a rooftop terrace with a fire pit lounge and BBQ area - all included for your comfort. 

Located in Langley's dynamic downtown, the building offers a chic urban lifestyle amidst nature trails, parks, and greenery.  We're also conveniently close to Willowbrook Mall, Cloverdale Athletic Park, Fraser Downs Race Track, Fraser Downs Casino, Carvolth Transit Exchange, and Highway 1.

Located on Seneca Polytechnic Newnham Campus

Residence & Conference Centre – Toronto provides affordable short and extended stay rates May through August, an excellent alternative to hotels in Toronto.

Conveniently located 20 minutes from downtown Toronto, with easy access to both Hwy #401 and Hwy #404, our modern facility is easily accessible and just a short drive to major Toronto attractions and things to do in the Greater Toronto Area. When planning your next trip to North York choose to stay with us – your alternative to expensive Toronto hotels!

Property Title: 3 Bedroom Halifax Peninsula Home
Description: Walking distance to hospitals and universities, this beautiful and recently renovated home is available for winter 2025. With 3 bedrooms (children's rooms may be adapted to adult rooms with queen/double beds), and 2.5 baths, this home is in a prime location in Halifax. Enjoy your coffee in the stunning kitchen with quartz counters and marble backsplash that is fully equipped with nespresso coffee machine, air fryer and other appliances. With heat pumps on three levels you'll be comfortable all winter. There is a fully fenced in backyard which makes this place great for a dog. The basement provides a great flex space with a workout area equipped with spin bike, weights and a bench as well as a fireplace and flatscreen tv, full bathroom, large comfortable sectional couch with a double bed pull out and a desk/work and study from home area. There is parking for two vehicles however you'll enjoy this location and be able to walk to cafes, restaurants, the universities and hospitals. Ideally we would like to rent to a family, couple or mature students however, we would be open to renting it by the room if 2-3 individuals were opening to staying together. Please reach out.$1450 per room,.

Description:
Lovely 3 Bedroom and 1 bath semi-detached home for rent in Green Acres near Herring Cove Road, Halifax, Perfect for a family or students on sharing basis. 

Located at a 5-minute drive from all the shops (Canadian Tire, Lawton Drugs, No Frills, Dollarama, First Choice, McDonald’s, Tim Hortons, Subway etc.,) and other locally owned restaurants. 

Lots of natural light, 3 bedroom, and 1 bathroom with carpet free flooring. House includes spacious and bright living room, dining and kitchen. Access to fenced backyard through side entrance. Parking for a single car. Basement not included.

Appliances include Refrigerator/Freezer, Electric Stove/oven, Range hood, Washer and Dryer. 

Offering an incredibly central location, very close to Elizabeth Sutherland School and Rockingstone Heights School, Spryfield Lions Rink is a 3-minute drive from the house. Captain William Spry Community Centre is 5-minute drive. Bus stops right by the house, 2 min walk (route 9A & 9B). Kids Park in the next block. Close to Long Lake Provincial Park, William’s Lake, Colpitt Lake, and McIntosh Run Community Trail. 
 
Strictly No Smoking. Rent is $2300 per month, utilities not included. No pets please.

Must have good referral and good credit history. Message me & introduce yourself for more information.

Property Title: Entire House - A Haven for Roommates: Where Memories Are Shared
Description:
A Sanctuary for Companionship: Where Connections Blossom and Memories Are Made.
Nestled along the serene Debert River with stunning bay views, this enchanting cottage is more than a retreat—it’s a shared sanctuary for bonding, unwinding, and creating cherished memories. Whether you’re a group of friends, Silver Nesters, or Golden Girls, this property offers the perfect blend of economy, safety, and companionship. Here, you can escape loneliness by aging gracefully in place, surrounded by nature’s beauty and the warmth of connection. Wake up to sunlight streaming through the windows, the grandeur of the nearby Tidal Bay, and the harmony of birdsong. This is a place where laughter fills the air, friendships deepen, and life’s simple joys transform into unforgettable moments.
________________________________________
A Retreat Designed for Connection
Perfectly accommodating up to five roommates, this spacious 3,202 sqft farmhouse balances shared experiences with personal comfort. The five cozy bedrooms include:
•	A luxurious king-sized master suite
•	A serene queen-sized retreat
•	Three inviting double-bed rooms
With three full bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a welcoming living room, every detail is curated for comfort and connection. Fresh linens, plush towels, and essential toiletries are thoughtfully provided.
________________________________________
Shared Highlights
Luxury and Relaxation:
•	Enjoy starry nights in the private hot tub, sharing laughter and stories.
•	Fire up the BBQ for memorable group meals in the refreshing summer breeze.
•	Dive into the above-ground pool, perfect for warm-weather fun.
Scenic Outdoor Spaces:
•	Start your mornings with coffee on the tiered back deck, overlooking an expansive lawn
•	Explore 65 acres of  farmland, wooded trails, and the closeby tranquil riverbank.
•	Relive childhood fun in a seasonal corn maze, ideal for bonding adventures.
________________________________________
The Perfect Blend of Privacy and Adventure
While this retreat offers 65 acres of peaceful seclusion, it’s conveniently located for exploring local attractions:
•	9 minutes from Debert Airport
•	20 minutes from Ski Wentworth Resort, the province’s largest ski destination
•	2 minutes to all your grocery needs at Masstown Market
This unique combination ensures your stay can be as adventurous or as tranquil as you desire.
________________________________________
Seamless Living with Thoughtful Amenities
•	Spotless Comfort: Professionally cleaned spaces ensure a welcoming and pristine environment.
•	Modern Essentials: Stay connected with high-speed internet, and enjoy a fully equipped Chef’s double Oven kitchen featuring a propane cooktop, gas oven, dishwasher, and wine cooler.
•	Ample Parking: A spacious driveway accommodates up to five vehicles.
________________________________________
Celebrate, Laugh, and Reconnect
Whether celebrating milestones, escaping the daily grind, or simply spending quality time, this retreat sets the stage for unforgettable moments. Property Title: Great Room in spacious downtown house
Description:
Unfurnished bedroom in a fully furnished home!

	•	Size: ~192 sq. ft. with great natural light
	•	Storage: Spacious closet inside the room + exclusive use of an additional hallway closet across the door
	•	Location: Excellent access to local trails, walking distance to Knox Mountain, downtown beaches, and some of the city’s best breweries and restaurants

Amenities Include:

	•	In-suite laundry
	•	Air conditioning (AC)
	•	Wifi
	•	Dishwasher
	•	Spacious yard and deck
	•	Storage space
	•	Street parking

About the Housemates:
You’ll be sharing the home with 3 others (all in our 20s) and 3 pets—a friendly dog and 2 cats. We’re open to another pet, pending landlord approval and compatibility with our current furry tenants.

	•	One tenant works shift work and is only home 1–2 weeks per month.
	•	Another works 9–5 with a flexible mix of in-office and at-home days.
	•	The third works primarily regular weekday hours.

Outside of work, we enjoy staying active, camping, traveling, and socializing. Our weekends often include catching up with friends over wine or margaritas!

What We’re Looking For:
We’re hoping to find a like-minded individual who’s respectful, friendly, and can match the easy-going, vibrant energy of our home.

Property Title: 3 Bedroom 2 Bath Condo available for rent from 17-Dec-2024
Description:
*Announcement Rooms available starting Dec 11, 2024. Ideal for students from Mc Master University, Mohawk college doing internships, PHD, nursing students or Residency.
Short and Long term rentals available. Short term rental should be at least for 6 months.

Rent: $750/ month for 2 bedrooms each and $1150/ month for the master bedroom with the en-suite washroom. Utilities flexible and can be discussed upon contract.

This is a 3 bedroom condo so ideal for 3 or 4 students or Working professionals. 
Parking spots available on request.  Huge Patio with good day sunlight. Laundry on-site and parking spot available. 

Condo is clean and quiet, brand new and ready to move-in.

Get a Complimentary Locker for 1 Year with a 12-Month Lease!

Welcome to 1 Jarvis, located in the heart of Downtown Hamilton! This 3 bedrooms and 2 bathroom apartment, with 1 underground parking spot available upon request nestled in a vibrant and energetic neighborhood, this area offers a dynamic blend of local award-winning dining, premier shopping, parks, trails, and endless entertainment options. The unit itself is flooded with natural light, thanks to large floor-to-ceiling windows, and features sleek flooring, a modern kitchen, and a wrap-around balcony, perfect for hosting, entertaining, or simply relaxing. Parking is available upon request for $150/month. Convenient transit options are at your doorstep, including buses, GO Train, bike lanes, and accessible driving routes. For drivers, highways 403, QEW, Linc, and Red Hill provide easy access. You're also just minutes from McMaster University and Mohawk College, with the scenic beauty of the Hamilton Mountain and Lake Ontario nearby. This home offers the perfect balance of luxury and comfort. Make 1 Jarvis Street your new address! 

Appliances Included
Dishwasher, Dryer, Refrigerator, Washer, Microwave Built-in, Hood Fan, Garage door opener.
Access

Highway Nearby
1 JARVIS Street Unit# 824
Hamilton, Ontario L8R0A8
Contact: Priya Pai - Cell phone - 437-998-7097 or whats app: +1-437-998-7097.
Preference will be given to McMaster University and Mohawk College students and working professionals.

This home (apartment) is not shared with anyone.

Property Title: Master Bedroom 1 of 5 -A Haven for Roommates: Where Memories Are Shared
Description:
A Sanctuary for Companionship: Where Connections Blossom and Memories Are Made.
Nestled along the serene Debert River with stunning bay views, this enchanting cottage is more than a retreat—it’s a shared sanctuary for bonding, unwinding, and creating cherished memories. Whether you’re a group of friends, Silver Nesters, or Golden Girls, this property offers the perfect blend of economy, safety, and companionship. Here, you can escape loneliness by aging gracefully in place, surrounded by nature’s beauty and the warmth of connection. Wake up to sunlight streaming through the windows, the grandeur of the nearby Tidal Bay, and the harmony of birdsong. This is a place where laughter fills the air, friendships deepen, and life’s simple joys transform into unforgettable moments.
________________________________________
A Retreat Designed for Connection
Perfectly accommodating up to five roommates, this spacious 3,202 sqft farmhouse balances shared experiences with personal comfort. The five cozy bedrooms include:
• A luxurious king-sized master suite
• A serene queen-sized retreat
• Three inviting double-bed rooms
With three full bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and a welcoming living room, every detail is curated for comfort and connection. Fresh linens, plush towels, and essential toiletries are thoughtfully provided.
________________________________________
Shared Highlights
Luxury and Relaxation:
• Enjoy starry nights in the private hot tub, sharing laughter and stories.
• Fire up the BBQ for memorable group meals in the refreshing summer breeze.
• Dive into the above-ground pool, perfect for warm-weather fun.
Scenic Outdoor Spaces:
• Start your mornings with coffee on the tiered back deck, overlooking an expansive lawn
• Explore 65 acres of farmland, wooded trails, and the closeby tranquil riverbank.
• Relive childhood fun in a seasonal corn maze, ideal for bonding adventures.
________________________________________
The Perfect Blend of Privacy and Adventure
While this retreat offers 65 acres of peaceful seclusion, it’s conveniently located for exploring local attractions:
• 9 minutes from Debert Airport
• 20 minutes from Ski Wentworth Resort, the province’s largest ski destination
• 2 minutes to all your grocery needs at Masstown Market
This unique combination ensures your stay can be as adventurous or as tranquil as you desire.
________________________________________
Seamless Living with Thoughtful Amenities
• Spotless Comfort: Professionally cleaned spaces ensure a welcoming and pristine environment.
• Modern Essentials: Stay connected with high-speed internet, and enjoy a fully equipped Chef’s double Oven kitchen featuring a propane cooktop, gas oven, dishwasher, and wine cooler.
• Ample Parking: A spacious driveway accommodates up to five vehicles.
________________________________________

Description:
Escape to our rare Spectacular Geo Dome, nestled in the heart of Nova Scotia. With stunning panoramic views and unparalleled seclusion, this unique dome-shaped haven offers a once-in-a-lifetime experience. Sleep under the stars, and make use of the fully stocked kitchen & private bathroom. It offers an unforgettable Nova Scotia adventure, perfect for romance, family fun, or solo serenity. Experience the tranquility of nature alongside modern luxury comforts. Do not forget to enjoy the Corn Maze.
The space
 1 bedroom with a comfortable queen bed and a sofa bed in the living area
 1 well-appointed bathroom for your convenience.
 Relaxing living area with ample seating & a sofa bed
 A fully equipped kitchen for your culinary adventures.
 Dedicated dining area for shared meals.
 An office space, making it suitable for remote work.
 Step into the backyard and patio for fresh air and relaxation.
 Exciting Corn Maze for fun.
Guest access
The entire property will be yours during your stay.
Other things to note
- No Children under 10 years
- Strictly No Pets
- Corn Maze available only in summer (June - Aug)

I want to ensure that you have the best experience during your stay. my location offers the perfect blend of space and privacy, the spectacular dome spans an expansive 65 acres, providing you with ample room to explore, relax, and enjoy the great outdoors.

I'd like to inform you that, while my spectacular dome is quite extensive, I do have neighbors on both sides, located about 100 feet away. Rest assured, they are at a comfortable distance, and neither you nor they will be able to see each other. This ensures your privacy and a peaceful atmosphere during your stay. You won't be bothered by any neighbors, making it an ideal setting for a tranquil retreat.

I hope this information helps you feel even more at ease during your stay

Description: One bedroom in two bedroom Apt in Fairview/Clayton Park. Bus by apartment goes to downtown etc. or go to Lacewood Terminal where you can catch any bus to anywhere in HRM, lots of ethnic restaurants/grocery stores walking distance. Multicultural area. This apt has swimming pool and sauna that can be accessed. All utilities  including internet. Shared washroom and kitchen, living room is private.  Looking for easy going student or working woman who loves cats as I have one who is very friendly and thinks anyone in the apt is family ..lol. Laundry room on floor $1.50 wash/dry. Parking available if needed.  Very nice building respectful tenants. I am a mature women who is easy going and open minded. All I ask is that you clean up after yourself, keep your room. kitchen and bathroom clean. Smokers need to go outside (building rules). Credit check needed. Available immediately.

Property Title: Beautiful Home in Brampton 1 of 4
Description:
Enjoy the Master Bedroom with it's own en-suite in this stylish Brampton Home

Brampton: A Vibrant Hub of Culture and Creativity
Brampton is a dynamic city in the Greater Toronto Area where cultural richness meets cutting-edge innovation. Renowned for its vibrant arts scene and entrepreneurial spirit, Brampton fosters an interconnected creative ecology that pushes boundaries. From public art installations to performances at the iconic Rose Theatre, the city blends tradition with bold, youthful energy. Festivals like the Vibrant Brampton Festival and Carabram celebrate the city’s multicultural identity, offering a glimpse into its rich tapestry of global influences.
This multicultural melting pot is also a haven for food lovers, with a diverse culinary scene featuring everything from Caribbean and Indian delicacies to Middle Eastern and Italian cuisine. Brampton balances urban flair with natural beauty, offering serene spaces like Gage Park, the Claireville Conservation Area, and Chinguacousy Park—perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and those seeking inspiration in nature. These parks often double as venues for art festivals and seasonal events, connecting community and creativity.
Brampton’s youthful vibe and innovative energy make it a city where creativity thrives in both formal and informal ways. Downtown Brampton is alive with small businesses, pop-up shops, and entrepreneurial initiatives that reflect the city’s forward-thinking ethos. Whether you’re looking to explore, settle, or start a venture, Brampton’s unique mix of culture, nature, and innovation offers something for everyone.

Property Title: very comfy room in a house on an acreage
Description:
two story, three + bedroom home on an acreage with a barn for storage, approximately 6 kms from town

well appointed home with two living areas, a large outdoor patio that is partially covered to enjoy in the winter months with a propane heater and a propane fire pit as well as a BBQ right outside the kitchen door for easy access.  
has washer dryer in the entryway off the patio, leading into the kitchen on the upper floor.

entering the house downstairs has large entry way with plenty of storage and place to sit and put on your outdoor gear.  Biking and hiking, xcskiing and snowshoeing right outside the door.

upstairs has two bedrooms plus office, three piece bathroom with incredible view of the mountains as top half of shower stall is a window.  large well lit kitchen/living/dining room with TV, NetFlix, Amazon Prime and internet too. Principal room is on opposite side of the rented bedroom so plenty of privacy.

downstairs has another bedroom for rent, a large living room with Smart TV, separate large four piece bathroom, and a dedicated workout space for yoga, pilates, ballet or stretching. 

property is on 5 acres, minutes to the river for fishing or floating or just relaxing, trails for all sorts of activities are just outside the door or a very short drive.

Welcome to 1 Jarvis, located in the heart of Downtown Hamilton! This 3 bedrooms and 2 bathroom apartment, with 1 underground parking spot available upon request nestled in a vibrant and energetic neighborhood, this area offers a dynamic blend of local award-winning dining, premier shopping, parks, trails, and endless entertainment options. The unit itself is flooded with natural light, thanks to large floor-to-ceiling windows, and features sleek flooring, a modern kitchen, and a wrap-around balcony, perfect for hosting, entertaining, or simply relaxing. Parking is available upon request for $150/month. Convenient transit options are at your doorstep, including buses, GO Train, bike lanes, and accessible driving routes. For drivers, highways 403, QEW, Linc, and Red Hill provide easy access. You're also just minutes from McMaster University and Mohawk College, with the scenic beauty of the Hamilton Mountain and Lake Ontario nearby. This home offers the perfect balance of luxury and comfort. Make 1 Jarvis Street your new address! 

Appliances Included
Dishwasher, Dryer, Refrigerator, Washer, Microwave Built-in, Hood Fan, Garage door opener.

Property Title: Very large 1 Bedroom + Den Mainfloor Apartment
Description:
Currently available: a huge, bright apartment with access to laundry, parking and a large and long backyard, which is perfect for your kids and pets to play in!
If you value space and privacy, this is the right apartment for you! A fantastic and very spacious pet friendly one bedroom + den apartment which steps into a laundry room and shared backyard.
7 min walk to a plaza that has all amenities (groceries, pharmacy, banks, restaurants, Starbucks).
Very conveniently located for public transit: 30 to 90 sec wak to bus stop for #12 & #69 buses, & 17 min walk to Midland Go Station (about 15 mins to downtown by Go).
A fabulous tennis court, splash park, biking and walking trail are steps away. The home is also close to an amazing sandy beach, Bluffers Park, marinas & sailing/yacht clubs. Close to excellent schools (Chine Drive Public School around the corner, others include: John Leslie Public School & R H King Academy, St Theresa & Card. Newman).
Tenant pay 1/3 of monthly utility bills (hydro and gas).
Currently available. In the same house there is currently also a spacious basement studio apartment available for 1800/month inclusive of all utilities.
Parking available for an additional $100/month with 2 spots available.

Property Title: Spacious Private Studio Basement Apartment
Description:
Currently available: a very spacious & cosy studio-style basement apartment that has its own kitchen with new fridge, range and rangehood. The apartment has access to laundry, parking & a backyard. The home is close to all amenities & public transit, with a bus stop that is steps away & the Midland Go Station (~15 min to downtown) within walking distance.
The large backyard that is shared with upstairs tenants is perfect for your pets to play in. The garden also features a swing and large bbq area for relaxation & entertainment; think about all the fun you can have there with your friends during the long summer evenings!
A fabulous tennis court biking and walking trails are steps away. The house is also close to an amazing sandy beach, Bluffers Park, marinas & sailing/yacht clubs.
A 7 min walk to a plaza that has groceries (No Frills), pharmacy (Shoppers), Starbucks & restaurants.
In the same house there is currently a very spacious mainfloor apartment available as well for $2300/month. Both the basement apartment and mainfloor apartment step into the backyard.

Spacious, south-facing master bedroom available for rent in a well-maintained home shared with two female professionals. Located in Lower Mission, walking distance to KGH, Okanagan College, shops, and just a short hop to Pandosy or Downtown via neighbourhood e-scooters and e-bikes.
The large room (11'5" x 14') is fully furnished with a bed, dresser, nightstands, reading chair, desk, and large closet. Rent includes laundry, Smart TV with streaming services (Apple TV, Prime, Netflix) and parking. The home is quiet, tidy, and perfect for mature students or professionals.
Rent Details:
•	Rent includes Wi-Fi, all utilities, Smart TV with streaming services, laundry, and parking
•	Flexible lease dates - Minimum 4-month lease preferred. Available until June 2025. 
•	Renters insurance required – if you have a policy already in place, it will often allow to cover a second place for study or work at no extra charge. Please check your policy.
Non-smoking, non-party home. Single occupancy only. Must be clean, tidy, and have references.
Please contact with a bit about yourself and your preferred move dates.

This building is conveniently located steps to public transportation, within walking distance to local universities and to the Waterloo Campus of Conestoga College, and is a short drive to the region’s tech hub. The building's superior amenities include concierge, internet, weekly housekeeping, exercise/rec room, rooftop patio and guests suites. These amenities coupled with an appealing modern vibe, make it the perfect home for students and young professionals

Property Title: Fully Furnished Master Bedroom, own bathroom and office suite
Description:
$1,765 Master Bedroom, own bathroom and office suite
Master Bedroom, own bathroom and office Sublet in Stunning, Fully Furnished Condo – Steps from Oakridge Skytrain

Looking for a comfortable, stylish, and convenient place to call home? This top-floor master bedroom in a 2 bed/2 bath condo (with an office) could be perfect for you. Located directly across from the Oakridge Skytrain Station (Canada Line), you’ll enjoy easy access to everything Vancouver has to offer, with Langara College, Queen Elizabeth Park, and a host of local amenities—coffee shops, restaurants, a pharmacy, and more—just steps away.

**Apartment Highlights:**
- **Master Bedroom** with Private Bathroom (includes shower and tons of storage)
- Fully furnished: California King bed, 60” smart TV, massage chair, and more
- Massive closet (3x average size) with shoe racks, organizers, and dresser
- Bright, northwest-facing room with blackout curtains on the 4th (top) floor
- Fully stocked kitchen: blender, air fryer, pots, pans, cutlery—everything you need
- In-suite laundry, new appliances (fridge, stove, dishwasher)
- Spacious living room with dining table, bookshelf, 50” smart TV, and cozy couch
- Two extra storage closets
- Dedicated office space with desk and drawers
- High-speed internet included
- Parking spot and additional storage lockers available for a fee

**Sublet Details:**
- Renting out a fully furnished master bedroom with a private bathroom in a shared 2 bed/2 bath condo (plus an office)
- Available as early as January 10th 2025 ( arrangements can be made to move in earlier)
- Month-to-month lease
- Rent: $1,765/month + shared utilities (~$50-$60 for internet and hydro)
- Damage deposit: Half a month's rent
- Secure bike storage available
- Your only roommate works long hours (M-F, 8 am to 8 pm), so you’ll hardly ever see him. He’s clean, quiet, and respectful.
- No pets or smoking, please

Property Title: Beautiful spacious room for rent
Description:
Rooms for rent in a cozy 3-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom house available immediately. The rent includes heat, light, water, and WiFi. The house features a dishwasher, fridge stove,washer, and drye & pellet stove . The house is equipped with all dishes and utensils you need to cook. All you need is your clothes! There is also a patio with furniture, a fully fenced backyard with a fire pit and garden boxes. Parking is available for up to three cars in the driveway, with additional street parking.

Singles or couples are welcome. One room is furnished with a bed, bedframe, and dresser. The other room is unfurnished. The house is conveniently located close to all amenities, including a pharmacy, grocery store, gas stations, post office, and bus routes. Rent is $800per month for furnished bedroom & $750 for the unfurnished room. Both rooms come with utility’s included in rent.

Rent now or before April first and i’ll wave the damage deposit which is have of the rent of the room. 

If you're interested or have any questions, feel free to reach out! text or call 7097210793 or 9022259955

Property Title: 2 Bedrooms in East Hants
Description:
2 Private Furnished Rooms available February 1st

The home has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths and and is located in Antrim. Both of the upstairs bedrooms will be for rent. Bathroom will be shared by the occupants of these 2 rooms. Smaller room has a double bed and will be rented for $800 a month. Bigger room has a queen bed and dresser and will be rented for $850 a month. This includes all utilities - heat, hot water, power, and internet.

Home has a washer, dryer, dishwasher, and a back deck for your use. It is also equipped with exterior security cameras for safety and has 2 sheds that may be used for additional storage.

The home is a 20 min drive to the airport, Aerotech Park, Enfield, and Elmsdale. Transportation is required to live here as there are no nearby bus routes and Uber and taxis sometimes choose not to service this area. Off street parking in driveway is provided. Only single occupancy will be considered.

Property Title: Must love dogs and cats
Description:
Bungalow with walk out basement and fenced yard, located on a river with beautiful views and fields to walk and enjoy. 

The house was fully renovated on the main level. The bedroom and washroom are clean and updated. 

The guest bedroom is furnished with a queen sized bed, a small love seat, a desk and 32 inch TV. The washroom is beside the bedroom and will be exclusive to the renter. 

There are 4 dogs on the premisis, they are well behaved but bark and get excited when someone first arrives then settle after. There is also one fluffy cat. 

I work from home so I am here Monday to Friday 8-4. Ideally the renter would help us by letting the dogs in and out and giving them attention. When we travel the person could handle their needs so we would not have to get a house sitter. This would be reflected in the rent when this happens.

Property Title: Furnished Room with Private Bathroom in Shared Apartment at The Alexander – $1200 All-Inclusive
Description:
Welcome to your new home in the heart of downtown Halifax! This fully furnished room with a private bathroom offers the perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and convenience. Located in The Alexander, one of Halifax’s premier buildings, this space is ideal for students, young professionals, or anyone looking for a well-maintained apartment in a prime location.

The room is thoughtfully furnished with a comfortable bed, spacious desk, chair, and ample storage, making it move-in ready. You’ll also enjoy the luxury of a private bathroom—no sharing required. Shared spaces include a beautifully furnished lounge and a fully equipped kitchen, perfect for cooking, relaxing, or socializing. The apartment is air-conditioned and features in-suite laundry for added convenience. Fortnightly cleaning of the entire apartment is included, so you can enjoy a hassle-free and well-maintained living space.

Living in The Alexander comes with access to premium building amenities, including a gym, a common lounge, and a terrace—great for unwinding or entertaining. The building is quiet, secure, and features excellent sound insulation to ensure your privacy and peace of mind.

This apartment’s location is unbeatable. Situated just a two-minute walk from the Halifax waterfront and Dalhousie University Sexton Campus, everything you need is within easy reach. Enjoy proximity to some of Halifax’s best restaurants, cafes, shops, and public transit, making it an ideal home base for students or professionals.

The monthly rent is $1800 CAD all-inclusive, covering:
	•	All Utilities (power, air conditioning, and heating)
	•	Gigabit Fibe 1.5 Internet and Fibe TV Digital Advantage package (projector setup included)
	•	Fortnightly cleaning of the entire apartment.

Indoor parking and storage lockers can be negotiated for an additional fee but are not guaranteed. Move-in is available starting March 8th, with earlier dates negotiable upon request.

This is a rare opportunity to live in one of Halifax’s most sought-after buildings, with modern amenities and a central location. If this sounds like the perfect fit for you, contact me today for more details or to schedule a viewing.

Property Title: Student Room in Old Strathcona
Description:
Looking for student housing in Edmonton?

This semester, make the lively Old Strathcona district your campus by living at HI Edmonton! This convenient and friendly hostel combines welcoming vibes, a prime location in a trendy neighbourhood, and easy access to the city’s best student spots.

You'll be just steps from Whyte Avenue’s cafés, bars, and shops, and a short ride to the University of Alberta, MacEwan University, and NorQuest College—perfect for staying close to your classes and student life.

Here's all the little extras that you'll get by choosing to stay at the hostel during your semester:

Kitchen
Access to a large and fully-equipped kitchen, dining room and dry food storage lockers.

Wi-Fi
A reliable connection in the hostel's common spaces and in your room.

All-Day Coffee
Free coffee and tea are provided all day to fuel your study sessions.

Activities
Join the hostel's group activities to meet new people and explore the city.

HI Membership
Free 2-year HI Membership giving access to hundreds of discounts in Edmonton and the rest of Canada.

TV Room
A big screen to enjoy cozy movie nights or cheer on your favorite teams during sporting events.

Games Room
A lounge with a pool table and a ping pong table (all free!) to kick back, relax and meet people.

Linens
Bed linens, a duvet and a pillow are included, with fresh linen service upon request.

Laundry Room
Access to our coin-operated laundry room everyday from 7am to 11pm.

Property Title: Cozy Urban Retreat
Description:
Stunning Downtown Kelowna Condo

This sleek, modern condo offers a bright and airy living space with floor-to-ceiling windows that flood the room with natural light and stunning city views. Enjoy the best of both worlds—luxury living and a prime location just steps away from Kelowna’s vibrant downtown scene.

Equipped with high-end appliances, the kitchen is a chef’s dream, perfect for preparing meals or entertaining. The condo is within walking distance to the beach, charming coffee shops, funky breweries, and a variety of local eateries—everything you need for a perfect urban lifestyle. Whether you’re looking for a peaceful retreat or an exciting city escape, this home offers it all.

Perfect for a Student, Traveler, or Short-Term Visitor

This cozy, well-located condo is ideal for someone who needs a small, functional space for a short stay. 

Whether you’re a student looking for an affordable place to study, someone between homes, or just visiting for the summer, this space offers everything you need without the excess.

Key Features:

Compact layout, perfect for minimalistic living.

Best suited for those who don’t need a large bed or an abundance of personal belongings.

No closet or window—ideal for someone who doesn’t mind a smaller, cozier environment.

Short-term rental suitable for students or travelers needing a temporary home.

Property Title: Stunning sunsets over mountains
Description:
Tucked away in a sought-after corner of the South BX, home on its quiet cul-de-sac has everything—peace, privacy, and space! It’s the ideal spot to embrace the best of Okanagan living. 
Wake up to brilliant west-facing views across the valley and stunning sunsets over the mountains.  Enjoy a hot tub in the winter and a saltwater in-ground pool to keep Okanagan cool EVERY summer. Explore nearby Kal Park trails, the Monashees, or fabulous lakes—All are just minutes away from the Okanagan College

Property Title: Upper rm for a Female roomie - 3 BR shared Tuxedo townhouse
Description:
Amazing location, room and amazing roomie wanted, to join our great little home! Are you that person? :)

We are seeking a female roommate to share this adorable and spacious 3-bedroom townhome: a bright home in an inner city neighbourhood with great access to major routes. Bedroom is on the upper level with a bright sunny window with triple-panes, a gorgeous attached full bath and large closet. The home design allows for personal space, while also common interaction with a shared open-concept kitchen, living room and dining room on the main level.

House features:

Large, triple-pane windows in all rooms bring in plenty of daylight
Large, open kitchen with brand new cook-top stove and large island
Beautiful new front-loading HE (high efficiency) washer and dryer
Stainless steel dishwasher, microwave, fridge
Sunny South facing balcony
Shared living room & dining room
Rent is plus 1/3 utilities: heat, water, electricity. $75-$100/mo approx. Internet at $20/mo (1Gbps high speed)
2 mins walk to Calgary transit on Centre Street or Edm Tr
Within walking distance: Dairy Queen, Safeway, Cafe Rosso & other restaurants - within 5 mins. walking. Nearby: Co-op, Peters Drive-in.
Close: 16th Ave, 14th St., Deerfoot Trail, Kensington, Crescent Heights, McKnight Tr.
The house is in a great, central location –very close to downtown, quick access to Deerfoot Trail, 14th Street, 16th Ave and Edmonton Trail. And, there's street parking beside the townhome.

Looking for someone who's clean, responsible and peaceable. As well as someone who is kind, respectful, calm and a good mix of sociable yet quiet.
No smoking. No pets. No drugs. No mess.

A bit about me: I am a professional young woman passionate about my career, friends and my faith in Jesus. I love to workout, be in the outdoors, try new things, get together with friends and hike. I balance work and staying active outside, so I'm not home all the time but do enjoy chatting when home or over dinner prep. The other roommate is a young professional as well and is passionate about her career in healthcare and adventuring. We are excited for you to join us!

I'd love to get to know you! In your email response, please include:

Full Name, and potential date of move in.
Describe yourself in 5 words.
Employment info or study status; and
What you're looking for in your next home.
To secure this room, a Rental Application, Landlord Reference and Employment Verification will be required (credit check may be required).

I look forward to learning a bit about yourself and meeting you! Happy to answer any questions :)

Thanks!
-K

Property Title: Furnished newly Renovated Bachelor Apartment for Rent in Green Acres
Description:
Furnished Newly Renovated Basement Bachelor unit for Rent in Green Acres, Halifax.
Ideal for Couple, professional or student (sharing), with a separate entrance.

Property Highlights:
Location: Furnished basement unit in Green Acres, near Herring Cove Road, Halifax.
Convenience: 5-minute drive to essential shops and services, including Canadian Tire, Lawton Drugs, No Frills, Dollarama, McDonald’s, Tim Hortons, Subway, and other local restaurants.
Quick access to schools, parks, and community amenities.
Public Transit: 2-minute walk to bus stops (Routes 9A & 9B).

Features:
Natural Light: Bright and spacious with carpet-free flooring.
Rooms: 1 Bachelor room, 1 bathroom.
Living Spaces: Includes a living room/bedroom, small dining area, and kitchen.
Outdoor Access: Fenced backyard with main entrance through the side door.
(brand new flooring with fresh paint throughout the unit)

Appliances and amenities Provided:
Brand new Refrigerator/Freezer
Brand new Electric glass cooktop with rangehood
Brand new Microwave
Brand new Washer and Dryer
Brand new Double Bed and Mattress

Schools: Close to Elizabeth Sutherland School and Rockingstone Heights School.

Recreation:
3-minute drive to Spryfield Lions Rink.
5-minute drive to Captain William Spry Community Centre.
Walking distance to a kids' park (next block).
Nature: Proximity to Long Lake Provincial Park, William’s Lake, Colpitt Lake, and McIntosh Run Community Trail.


Rental Details:

Monthly Rent: $1400 (utilities not included).
Availability: Immediate Occupancy
Restrictions: No smoking, Cat Friendly

Requirements:
Good references.
Good credit history and proof of income

$1050/ person or $1200/ 2 person all included ( electricity, water, heating, air conditioning, wifi, gas ), can stay max 2 person.

You will have your own furnished bedroom with the queen size bed, bed sheet, pillows, blanket, TV, coffee tables, bed lamps, working desk, small sofa bed. 

Share a washroom with another ternant in the next room, and share kitchen and laundry with another couple on the main floor.

No pets, no parties, no smoking or vaping. We are looking for clean, respectful, peaceful and responsible ternant/ ternants. Professional workers, Students and Newcomers are welcome. Income proof must be provided.

Property Title: Lovely & Bright Room Centrally Located (almost fully private bath)
Description: This lovely and bright fully-furnished room in a small-dog (one) friendly environment is ideal for someone seeking a quiet space on a short-term basis. The room has a mostly private bath, meaning that the apartment has two bathrooms, with the one bathroom used for this rental being almost exclusive for the room being rented out. However, as the bathroom is off the main hallway of the unit, it may be used on occasion if, for example, a person comes over for lunch and needs the use of a restroom, but this would be rare. The price includes many amenities (tv, Internet, heat, lights, pool, communal washing and drying facilities) and common supplies for cleaning, use of kitchen and kitchen and dining ware, as well as a set of sheets, a comforter, and pillow. It is essential that all persons in the unit are dog lovers. There is no need for dog walking, feeding, and such, but the unit is not suitable for someone who bothered by a pet. An agreement must be signed, with identification and letters of recommendation also required along with first and last month's payment. A security deposit is also required which is returned upon departure if no damage has been incurred and assuming 30 day's notice has been given.

Property Title: Nice Size Bedroom in renovated 4 plex
Description:
Room for rent in an updated 4 plex. 3 level corner unit. Not just a one level apartment, no one living above or below. Available Mar 1st for 3 - 4 months. $750 per month plus utilities. 

Kitchen and living room on main floor, bedrooms and full bathroom upstairs. Laundry, storage and half bathroom in basement.

Great location for transit to downtown, 17th Ave or any shopping. Walking distance to 7-11, Timmie’s and a little shopping centre. 

We’re a couple in our 40s. We work full time. Looking for someone who also works full time. That way we each get to enjoy the suite alone at times when we come and go. 

We just moved in 2 weeks ago. Still getting things put away and set up. There is room if you have a few things of your own. Lots of storage in the basement too. 

We cook most days so there are dishes around. Just something to know. Don’t really drink. Mary jane friendly. Pretty quiet other than that. Just work, watch shows or movies, and rest. Pretty laid back. My vice is Crumbl cookies and they just added a location right by my work! 

Tell me a bit about yourself and if it sounds like a fit we can meet to see if we click and go from there.

Property Title: 2 bedrooms, furnished
Description:
We have 2 bedrooms available to rent. One is sllightly larger than the other. Each room has a king-size bed, mattress, basic beddings, bed drawers, a closet, shelves, a desk and a chair. A separate full bathroom is shared by the occupants of the 2 rooms. These rooms are part of 4-bedroom, 3.5 bathroom main house.

Monthly rent is $1000 for the larger room and $950 for the other room. Each room is available for one occupant only. An additional montlly utility charge of $100 is applied for each room to cover water, natural gas and electricity costs 

Other shared areas include kitchen and breakfast area, family room, living room, laundry room and backyard. Shared appliances include stove, dishwasher, microwave, fridge, laundry washer and dryer.

The house is located in the Vellore Village area in Vaughan. The closest intersections are Westo Road and Major Mackenzie Drive, Highway 400 and Major Mackenzie Drive. A Walmart Supercentre, and Freshco grocery store are within walking distances. Cortellucci Vaughan Hospital, Canada's Wonderland, and other major grocery stores are about 2 kilometres away. Two primary and two secondary schools are all walking distances away. York Regional Transit (YRT) provides local public transportation, including single-ticket connections to Toronto's TTC through Vaughan Metro Centre subway station.

Property Title: Large bedroom with ensuite and walk-in closet with professional woman in Dartmouth
Description:
I live in a Cape Cod style, 2-storey, single-family home in a quiet residential neighbourhood.  I am renting the master bedroom, which is approximately 23 ft by 10 ft.  It has a walk-in closet and a private ensuite bathroom with toilet, sink and stand-up shower stall.  The room is furnished with a twin bed, a table and chair, a night stand and a dresser with mirror.  I can provide bed linens and towels, or you can use your own.  This bedroom has a heat pump so you can control the heating and cooling in your own bedroom. There is also a ceiling fan. This room has 4 windows with window coverings. Please note, there are no electrical outlets in the ensuite bathroom.  This room is on the upper level of the house.  At times, there may be a student or another renter occupying one of the other bedrooms on this level.
The common areas of the house on the main level include a living room, dining room, kitchen and 2-piece bathroom. The common areas of the house in the basement include the laundry room.
The house is close to Halifax Transit route 65 and 165. The bus stop is a 3 minute walk from the house.
A little bit about myself: I am a 45 year-old, single professional woman and I have a dog. She is a female Labradoodle and she is friendly. I work full-time regular hours, M-F.  I leave for work around 6:30 am and return around 4:30 or 5:00 pm.

Property Title: Home Suite Home 2025-2026
Description:
Move in your new home this April 01/02!
Location: centralize, easy access to major bus stops, pizza, cafe, restaurants/fast foods, clinic, playground (2), coin laundrette etc  – nice stroll to Uptown, Tillicum, Mayfair Mall.

2 beds, 1 bath, approx. 600 sqft. Unfurnished. Ground level entrance to partial basement. $1,990 for 1 or 2 occupants, $2,100 if 3 occupants (e.g. couple and a relative). Suite has 7 windows and is very bright in summer (some photos here taken in the evening). 1 year tenancy preferred. One front parking.

STUDENTS: please note there is a 26 straight bus in front of the house but it takes 20-25 mins sometimes to get there if traffic is busy so not advisable, find some place closer if you are in UVic. Okay if you are driving.

** WORKING FOLKS: preferably have lived in Victoria and be in a job for more than three months. If relocating, okay with employer's supporting letter. Usual three months payslips and minimum two employer references, and three previous landlord references. 
   
PETS: one well trained, well behaved cat or a very small dog only, with pet deposit. Other kind of pets, please text me.

BTW, my home flies with pride my Rainbow flag in the front porch.  

Pls message me on Happipad. You can also text me directly (778)977-7103 for viewing options. Current tenants still in till end of March so please text to arrange. Thank you.

Property Title: Cosy Artsy Chill Spot Downtown
Description:
The Apartment is located near downtown and the elegant riverside core of old Ottawa, with Gothic-style architecture, the Parliament Hill, and all the adventures downtown has to offer.

Using the train station right on the other side of the street, opposite the building, you're only minutes away from the heart of downtown Ottawa where you can explore the CF Rideau Centre, the stone-built Bytown Museum and The National Arts Centre which hosts ballets, symphonies and Broadway shows and more.

But if you prefer to stay cozy, you get a clean and safe space with a balcony overlooking most parts of the city.

Finally, if you get hungry, there's lots of food around!

Property Title: Clean bedroom with private deck on a family farm.
Description: My two sons and I have a cattle farm in the Ottawa River Valley about an hour from Ottawa. We are on the atv trails and within easy reach of Algonquin Park for back country canoe camping. Ample work exists in our community with Shawville seven minutes away. The home is 8000 sq feet and sports a full billiards table, volleyball, two tv rooms, two bathrooms and in the heart of the natural beauty of the Pontiac region. The English high school in Shawville offers a first class education and the town is both English and French speaking where a knowledge of French is not necessary. We are an outdoors orientated adventure family with German Shepherd dogs and Highland cattle. Our eggs and meat are grown on site as are our vegetables.

Property Title: your own bedroom with a view
Description: Brand new built suite is beautifully designed with a coal mine theme. This suite in nestled away on a dead-end street on the Red Deer River. Surrounded by wildlife and a symphony of birds singing. It is quiet and picturesque with a view of the coulees, river, and trees. With your own entrance, and access to the river you can live like you are on holidays. The living room has a 9ft ceiling and a large window that provides lots of natural light. Each bedroom also has large windows providing a small view. This property is only 10 minutes to Downtown Drumheller, 5 minutes to the Willow Creek Hoodoos, 8 min to Atlas Coal Mine, and an opportunity to bike over the 11 bridges into the town of Wayne while you visit the Last Chance Salon.  On a hot day you can go for a swim in the river, fish, or adventure out for a canoe ride. The owners are a quiet couple with two friendly non shedding dogs and occasionally have their children and grandchildren visit. There is no smoking or pets allowed and owners would request that noise volume is low to be sensitive to all living in the home. Also, to respect the other renter please keep the suite and outdoor area tidy. You have your own dishwasher, washer and dryer, a furnace just for suite, central air, and a cozy electric fireplace for winter months. The home has town water but is on a septic tank, therefore it would be appreciated if water usage is minimal. We are looking for renters that will value the quiet beauty or our restful home.
