Description: I am looking for a clean, tidy, and friendly roommate to share a spacious, two-floor, two-bedroom, one-bath apartment in a prime South End location. Downstairs is one big open-concept living room/kitchen; upstairs is the bathroom and both bedrooms. The apartment is just steps from Sobeys, NSLC, Uncommon Grounds, and the South Park Street bus lines. It's a 10-minute walk to SMU and a 15-20-minute walk to Dal. The apartment features large windows, high ceilings, wooden floors and finishings, along with a small balcony on the lower floor. The space is fully furnished with a table, chairs, and couch as well as appliances. Only the bedroom will be unfurnished. The lease runs from June 1st, 2025 to May 31st, 2026, with the option to take over tenancy on May 1st, 2025. Coin-operated laundry is shared amongst tenants in the building. Most utilities are included except for electricity and wifi (shared evenly and varies monthly). Pets are allowed with landlord permission as well as parking at an extra charge/per month. Please reach out if you're interested or need more information. Thank you!

Property Title: your own bedroom with a closet
Description: Brand new built suite is beautifully designed with a coal mine theme. This suite in nestled away on a dead-end street on the Red Deer River. Surrounded by wildlife and a symphony of birds singing. It is quiet and picturesque with a view of the coulees, river, and trees. With your own entrance, and access to the river you can live like you are on holidays. The living room has a 9ft ceiling and a large window that provides lots of natural light. Each bedroom also has large windows providing a small view. This property is only 10 minutes to Downtown Drumheller, 5 minutes to the Willow Creek Hoodoos, 8 min to Atlas Coal Mine, and an opportunity to bike over the 11 bridges into the town of Wayne while you visit the Last Chance Salon.  On a hot day you can go for a swim in the river, fish, or adventure out for a canoe ride. The owners are a quiet couple with two friendly non shedding dogs and occasionally have their children and grandchildren visit. There is no smoking or pets allowed and owners would request that noise volume is low to be sensitive to all living in the home. Also, to respect the other renter please keep the suite and outdoor area tidy. You have your own dishwasher, washer and dryer, a furnace just for suite, central air, and a cozy electric fireplace for winter months. The home has town water but is on a septic tank, therefore it would be appreciated if water usage is minimal. We are looking for renters that will value the quiet beauty or our restful home.

Property Title: Private bedroom and Loft, seaside in Arisaig
Description:
Location is 200 ft from the water with ocean views from many windows including access to a massive deck and sunroom. Newly constructed home with a 640 SF loft containing a large furnished bedroom, large bathroom- shower, and open area ready to welcome an individual seeking accommodations for short- or long-term time periods.

The Loft offers relative privacy, magnificent ocean views and would be perfect for studying, writing, sketching or name your relaxing desire. There is a provided desk with lamp. The open area is ample space for you to bring: a large comfy sitting chair, side table and footstool.
Watch the boats come and go from the view of the working wharf. Watch Eagles land on the beach right from the Loft view, living room windows or deck side.

At your whim, there is access to wilderness & nature via a short walk to the Provincial Day Park. The Community Centre offers indoor/outdoor Pickleball Courts, Basketball, Shuffleboard and walking trails.
The Park is known for its fascinating geology and fossils; an interpretive kiosk examines highlights of the four million years of earth history found here. Pleasant 1.5 km walking trail through forest, and to shore access. Geocaching opportunities as well as snowshoeing and cross-country skiing.

14-minute drive to LBR Gas Bar, NSLC and Variety store as well as Your Place Eatery food truck. 
Steinhart Distillery is a 3-minute drive away and often hosts live music.  Knoydart Farm Cheese (Organic) is within 7 minutes.  

StFX campus is a 25-minute drive along Hwy 245.

Property Title: Two bedrooms in Drumheller with shared bathroom, living room, and kitchenette
Description:
We have a nice house in the Riverside area of Drumheller. There are 2 rental rooms in the downstairs, with a shared bathroom, a shared living room and a shared kitchenette. The laundry facilities are also shared with the host. We can work out a schedule for times to use the laundry machines.. The kitchen has a Ninja Air Fryer, a microwave, a toaster, a toaster oven, a kettle, and a coffee maker. There is a set of dishes and a set of cutlery. There are 2 small fridges, so you don't have to share.
Entrance is by a separate door to the backyard. There is ample street parking. The Red Deer River is just steps away. There is a lovely walking/cycling trail nearby, and a frisbee golf course. You can walk downtown in about 15 minutes.

Property Title: Single Bedroom with Personal Washroom
Description: (CURRENTLY ONLY THREE ROOMS AVAILABLE) Hello, you can rent one or more bedrooms in a 5-Bedroom 4-Bathroom single house at 695 Concordia Street near UBCO. It is fully furnished with a full-sized kitchen and five standard appliances. It is available from now until the end of August 2025. The house has lots of extra space including a main-floor living room, a basement family room, a main-floor office, and a double garage. It is also only a 15-minute walking distance to UBC Okanagan buildings and close to the 87 UBCO bus stop. The monthly rent is ranging between $1000 to $1200 a month depending on the bedroom and the price is negotiable. The monthly rent includes high-speed internet, water, gas, heating/AC, a double-car garage, and driveway parking. The minimum rental period is one month. Some conditions are no smoking, no excessive parties, no pets, and no illegal substance use. Perfect for UBCO students and parents for a summer stay. Please text or call 647-937-4226 or email neh.roberts@gmail.com about any inquiries about the home. Thank you!

Property Title: Two room suite with separate entrance, kitchenette and four piece bathroom
Description: Waterfront home in central Parksville and within easy walking distance to all the amenities as well as the beach. Bus service to Nanaimo or Qualicum is also a short walk away. The suite is attached to the garage with off street parking available as well as secure storage for bikes and other sports equipment. The suite has a loft bed, a couch, a small television, a storage cupboard as well as a small closet with a full length mirror. The bathroom with shower is adjoining. As part of the suite there is a fully equipped kitchenette (including a microwave, a toaster oven, an induction hot plate, an air fryer and a small fridge) as well as a table that can also be used as a work area. The suite is bright with many windows as well as two entrance doors. The lighting in the suite is also more than sufficient with lamps and dual switch overhead or pot lights. It is also very private. Arrangements can be made to have laundry done by the host or independently once weekly. Linens and towels will be changed bimonthly on request . With prior notice the oven in the main house kitchen can also be used. The house is in a very safe neighbourhood. There is also no noticeable street noise or lights. As a result it is ideal for quiet and restful sleeps. If the host and renter are compatible the option to extend the rental term in three month contracts is available. The suite is suitable for mature students, essential workers, individuals on locums or short term contracts as well as those considering relocating to the Parksville area. As long as a renter can manage a loft bed any age is welcome. ( If a couple requests accommodation the rent would be $1400).

Property Title: Developed basement with two bedrooms, one already furnished, waterfront property with full yard access.
Description: Available May 05 but could be sooner as I have a large pool table still that has to be moved. Developed 700 ft2  basement with two rooms; one is furnished and is the one being rented, the other is currently unfurnished (could be furnished fairly quickly) and may be rented out to another tenant in the future. This is a large rural riverfront acreage 10 kilometers west of downtown Drumheller so you will need a vehicle or be a dedicated bicyclist (11 km to Royal Tyrell Museum). There is a private bathroom with large walk in shower. Sitting area with couches, TV and gas fireplace, dining area with table, a wet bar with sink, private full sized fridge, microwave, kettle, etc. Access to full kitchen and laundry facilities upstairs. You have access to the BBQ, yard, garden and fire pit area. You MUST like animals, I have a cat and dog and I may ask you to take care of them if I am away, this is not a lot of work, they have their own door outside. I am open to any demographic but would prefer a longer term tenant.

Property Title: Cozy Basement Apartment
Description:
Luxurious Lakeside Retreat in Chestermere

Welcome to your perfect getaway at South Shore Court, a stunning 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home nestled in the serene community of Chestermere, Alberta. This spacious and modern retreat offers unparalleled comfort and convenience, ideal for singles, couples, or professionals seeking a blend of relaxation and easy access to Calgary’s top attractions.

Property Highlights





Spacious & Modern: Over 650 sq. ft. of beautifully designed living space, featuring a bright open-concept layout with high-end finishes, a gourmet kitchen, and a cozy living area.



Sleeps 2 Comfortably:  One luxurious suite with a bathroom.



Lakeside Living: Located steps from Chestermere Lake, enjoy scenic views and access to water activities like kayaking, paddleboarding, and lakeside strolls.



Entertainment & Amenities: Equipped with high-speed WiFi, smart TV, and an in-suite laundry.



Free Parking: Ample parking space, including a driveway, for hassle-free arrivals.

Prime Location & Nearby Attractions

Situated in the tranquil South Shore community of Chestermere, this home offers the perfect balance of peaceful retreat and proximity to urban conveniences:





Chestermere Lake (2-minute walk): Enjoy swimming, boating, or relaxing by the water at this picturesque lake, a cornerstone of the community.



Downtown Calgary (20-minute drive, ~25 km): Explore the vibrant heart of Calgary, including the Calgary Tower, Glenbow Museum, and trendy dining along 17th Avenue.



Calgary International Airport (YYC) (20-minute drive, ~22 km): Convenient for travelers, with easy access via major highways.



Calgary Stampede Grounds (20-minute drive, ~24 km): Experience the world-famous rodeo and festival, just a short drive away, or take the C-Train from downtown for stress-free access.



No Frills (8-minute drive, ~6 km): Stock up on groceries at this nearby budget-friendly supermarket in Chestermere.



Costco Wholesale (15-minute drive, ~12 km): Located in East Hills, Calgary, for all your bulk shopping needs.



Local Amenities: Walk to nearby cafes, restaurants, and shops in Chestermere’s charming downtown, or visit the Chestermere Recreation Centre (5-minute drive) for fitness and community activities.



Outdoor Adventures: A gateway to the Rockies, with Banff National Park (~1.5-hour drive) and Kananaskis Country (~1-hour drive) for hiking, skiing, and breathtaking scenery.

Why Choose This Home?

This Chestermere gem combines the tranquility of lakeside living with seamless access to Calgary’s urban energy. Whether you’re attending the Calgary Stampede, exploring downtown, or seeking a relaxing retreat after a day of adventure, this home is your ideal base. Perfect for families, friends, or business travelers, it offers modern comforts, thoughtful touches, and a location that keeps you close to everything.

Book now to experience the best of Chestermere and Calgary from this luxurious lakeside haven!

Property Title: 1 Bedroom plus Den with two washrooms
Description: Well situated and meticulously designed 1 bedroom + den and 2 washroom oasis within urban desert. A corner unit with no one to share the balcony with atop Eglinton LRT System this spacious, modern and bright unit offers open concept living/dinning room and a fully functional Kitchen with built in appliances and high-end laundry. 4 pc ensuite washroom in the main bedroom and a 3 pc washroom services the guests laid out with privacy in mind. Commuting to nearby shops at donmills has never been effortless. Quartz countertops and ceramic adorn this unit with pot lights through out. With 24/7 security at the desk, and all inclusive resort like living makes this a safe haven for any student and professional alike. This no pets, no smoking residential tower is not to be missed. This west open sunny condo unit features unobstructed views of uptown & downtown Toronto. Location is beautiful North York in a new building, Superstore across the st. Many amenities but no smoking. Not to be missed.
